SA20asmahsbu:35: AMsa_1.3 yathā bimbaṃ bhūṣāprakṛtiguṇavad darpaṇagataṃ viśiṣṭaṃ prāmodyaṃ janayati nṛṇāṃ darśanavaśāt /

SA20asmahsbu:38_0: yathā bimbaṃ bhūṣāprakṛtiguṇavad darśaṇagataṃ darśanavaśād viśiṣṭaṃ prāmodyaṃ janayaty

SA20asmahsbu:53: naivedaṃ mahāyānaṃ buddhavacanaṃ kutas tasyāyam anuśaṃso bhaviṣyatīty atra vipratipannas tasya buddhavacanatvaprasādhanārthaṃ kāraṇavibhājyam ārabhya ślokaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:54: AMsa_1.7 ādāv avyākaraṇāt samapravṛtter agocarāt siddheḥ /

SA20asmahsbu:57: kasmād ādau bhavatā na vyākṛtam anāgatabhayavat /
SA20asmahsbu:58: samapravṛtteḥ samakālaṃ ca śrāvakayānena mahāyānasya pravṛtter upalabhyate na paścād iti katham asyābuddhavacanatvaṃ vijñāyate /

SA20asmahsbu:72: AMsa_1.8 pratyakṣacakṣuṣo buddhāḥ śāsanasya ca rakṣakāḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:76: tribhiḥ kāraṇair anāgatasya mahataḥ śāsanopadravasyopkeṣā na yujyate /

SA20asmahsbu:81: AMsa_1.9 vaikalyato virodhād anupāyatvāt tathāpy anupadeśāt /

SA20asmahsbu:91: tathāpy anupadeśān na śrāvakayānam eva mahāyānaṃ bhavitum arhati /
SA20asmahsbu:92: na hi sa tādṛśa upadeśa etasminn upalabhyate /
SA20asmahsbu:93: viruddham vā cānyonyaṃ śrāvakayānaṃ cety anyonyavirodhe ślokaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:95: upastambhasya kālasya yat hīnaṃ hīnam eva tat //

SA20asmahsbu:132: AMsa_1.14 tadasthānatrāso bhavati jagatāṃ dāhakaraṇo mahāpuṇyaskandhaprasavakaraṇād dīrghasamayam /
SA20asmahsbu:133: agotro 'sanmitro 'kṛtamatir apūrvācitaśubhas trasaty asmin dharme patati mahato 'rthād gata iha //

SA20asmahsbu:146: yathākhyānaṃ nārthād bhagavati ca bhāvātigahanāt na dharme 'smiṃs trāso bhavati viduṣāṃ yonivicayāt //

SA20asmahsbu:159: [Msa_7] evaṃ yoniśaḥ pravicayād viduṣāṃ trāso na bhavati /

SA20asmahsbu:165: śrutaṃ niśrityādau manaskāraḥ prabhavati yo yoniśa ity arthaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:166: yoniśo manasikārāt tatvārthaviṣayaṃ jñānaṃ prabhavati lokottarā samyagdṛṣṭis tatas tat phalasya dharmasya prāptis tatas tasmin prāpte matir vimuktijñānaṃ prādurbhavati /

SA20asmahsbu:170: AMsa_1.17 ahaṃ na boddhā na gabhīraboddhā buddho gabhīraṃ kim atarkagamyaṃ /

SA20asmahsbu:172: yadi tāvad aham asya na boddhety uttrāsapadaṃ tan na yuktaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:173: atha buddho 'pi gambhīrasya padārthasya na boddhā sa kiṃ gabhīraṃ deśayiṣyatīty uttrāsapadaṃ tad ayuktaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:174: atha gambhīraṃ kasmād atarkagamyaṃ ity uttrāsapadaṃ tan na yuktaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:175: atha kasmād gabhīrārthavidām evam mokṣo na tārkikāṇām ity uttrāsapadaṃ tan na yuktaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:177: AMsa_1.18 hīnādhimuktaḥ sunihīnadhātor hīnaiḥ sahāyaiḥ parivāritasya /

SA20asmahsbu:182: AMsa_1.19 śrutānusāreṇa hi buddhimattāṃ labdhvā śrute yaḥ prakaroty avajñāṃ /

SA20asmahsbu:184: kāmaṃ tāvad adhimuktir na syād aśrutānāṃ tu sūtrāntānām aviśeṣeṇa pratipakṣo na yuktiḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:185: [Msa_8] śrutānusāreṇaiva hi buddhimattvaṃ labdhvā yaḥ śruta evāvajñāṃ karoti mūḍhaḥ sa saty evāvaśiṣṭe śrute vicitre cāprameye ca kutaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:186: kāraṇān niścayam eti na tad buddhavacanam iti /

SA20asmahsbu:188: yad api ca śrutaṃ tad yoniśo manasi kartavyaṃ nāyoniśa ity ayoniśomanasikārādhīnave ślokaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:189: AMsa_1.20 yathārute 'rthe parikalpyamāne svapratyayo hānim upaiti buddheḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:190: svākhyātatāṃ ca kṣipati kṣatiṃ ca prāpnoti dharme pratighāvatīva //

SA20asmahsbu:240: AMsa_3.1 satvāgratvaṃ svabhāvaś ca liṅgaṃ gotraprabhedatā /

SA20asmahsbu:245: AMsa_3.2 dhātūnām adhimukteś ca pratipatteś ca bhedataḥ /

SA20asmahsbu:312_1: cittasya hi saṃsthitiḥ samādhiḥ mahāsatvaparipākanimittatvāc ca bahusatvaparipācanāt /
SA20asmahsbu:314: AMsa_3.11 aikāntiko duścarite 'sti kaścit kaścit samudghātitaśukladharmā /
SA20asmahsbu:322: [Msa_13] atyantāparinirvāṇadharmā tu hetuhīno yasya parinirvāṇagotram eva nāsti /
SA20asmahsbu:324: AMsa_3.12 gāmbhīryāudāryavāde parahitakaraṇāyodite dīrghadharme ajñātvaivādhimuktir bhavati suvipulā saṃprapattikṣamā ca /
SA20asmahsbu:325: saṃpattiś cāvasāne dvayagataparamā yad bhavaty eva teṣāṃ tajjñeyaṃ bodhisatvaprakṛtiguṇavatas tatprapuṣṭāc ca gotrāt //
SA20asmahsbu:326: yadgābhīryāudāryavādini parahitakriyārthamukte vistīrṇe mahāyānadharme gāmbhīryāudāryārtham ajñātvaivādhimuktir vipulā bhavati /
SA20asmahsbu:328: saṃpattiś cāvasāne mahābodhirdvayagatāyāḥ saṃpatteḥ paramā tatprakṛtyā guṇavataḥ paripuṣṭasya ca bodhisatvagotrasya māhātmyaṃ veditavyaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:329: dvayagatā iti dvaye laukikāḥ śrāvakāś ca /
SA20asmahsbu:334: svaparahitaphalasya bodhivṛkṣasya praśastamūlatvam anena bodhisatvagotraṃ saṃdarśitaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:345: [Msa_14] so 'yaṃ trividho guṇāḥ paridīpitaḥ puruṣakāraguṇo dvābhyāṃ padābhyām arthakriyāguṇaḥ phalaparigrahaguṇaś ca dvābhyāṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:347: iti triguṇā dvayālambanā ca cetanā cittotpāda ity ucyate /
SA20asmahsbu:366: kiṃmūla eṣa caturvidho bodhisatvānāṃ cittotpādaḥ kimāśayaḥ kimadhimokṣaḥ kimālambanaḥ kiṃyānaḥ kiṃpratiṣṭhaḥ kimādīnavaḥ kimanuśaṃsaḥ kiṃniryāṇaḥ kiṃparyavasāna iti /
SA20asmahsbu:381: yasyāṃ bhūmau yaḥ prayuktas tasya tadbhūmiparyavasānaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:383: AMsa_4.7 mitrabalād hetubalān mūlabalāc chrutabalāc chubhābhyāsāt /
SA20asmahsbu:386: yo hi parākhyānāc cittotpādaḥ paravijñāpanāt sa ucyate samādānasāṃketikaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:387: sa punar mitrabalād vā bhavati kalyāṇamitrānurodhāt /
SA20asmahsbu:390: chrutabalād vā tatra tatra dharmaparyāye bhāṣyamāṇe bahūnāṃ bodhicittotpādāt /
SA20asmahsbu:391: śubhābhyāsād vā dṛṣṭa iva dharme satataśravaṇodgrahaṇadhāraṇādibhiḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:396: AMsa_4.9 dharmeṣu ca satveṣu ca tatkṛtyeṣūttame ca buddhatve /
SA20asmahsbu:398: AMsa_4.10 janmāudāryaṃ tasminn utsāhaḥ śuddhir āśayasyāpi /
SA20asmahsbu:409: sa ca pāramārthikaś cittotpādaḥ pramuditāyāṃ bhūmāv iti /
SA20asmahsbu:413: satvakṛtyeṣu samacittatā ātmana iva teṣāṃ duḥkhakṣayākāṅkṣaṇāt /
SA20asmahsbu:415: tasminn eva ca pāramārthikacottotpāde ṣaḍarthā veditavyāḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:416: janma audāryam utsāha āśayaśuddhiḥ pariśiṣṭakauśalyaṃ niryāṇaṃ ca /
SA20asmahsbu:423: kathaṃ manasikāreṇa tasya bhūmivyavasthānasya kalpanājñānāt kalpanāmātram etad iti /
SA20asmahsbu:434: AMsa_4.19 yānasamo vijñeyo gandharvasamaś ca vetasagacetasaḥprabhavaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:436: AMsa_4.20 meghasadṛśaś ca kathitaś cittotpādo jinātmajānāṃ hi /
SA20asmahsbu:437: tasmāt tathā guṇāḍhyaṃ cittaṃ muditaiḥ samutpādyam //
SA20asmahsbu:439: āśayasahagataś ca cittotpādaḥ kalyāṇasuvarṇasadṛśo hitasukhādhyāśayasya vikārābhajanāt /
SA20asmahsbu:466: mahārhacittodayavarjitā janāḥ śamaṃ gamiṣyanti vihāya tat sukham //
SA20asmahsbu:467: tena cittotpādena varjitāḥ satvāś caturvidhaṃ sukhaṃ na labhante yad bodhisatvānāṃ parārthacintanāt sukhaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:470: yac ca paramatvasya dharmanairātmyasya saṃdarśanāt sukhaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:472: AMsa_4.22 sahodayāc cittavarasya dhīmataḥ susaṃvṛtaṃ cittam anantaduṣkṛtāt /
SA20asmahsbu:473: sukhena duḥkhena ca modate sadā śubhī kṛpāluś ca vivardhanadvayam //
SA20asmahsbu:474: tasya cittavarasya sahodayāt bodhisatvasya susaṃvṛtaṃ cittaṃ bhavaty anantasatvādhiṣṭhānād [Msa_18] duṣkṛtād ato 'sya durgatito bhayaṃ na bhavati /
SA20asmahsbu:475: sa ca dvayaṃ vardhayan śubhaṃ ca karma kṛpā ca nityaṃ ca śubhī bhavati kṛpāluś ca tena ca sadā modate /
SA20asmahsbu:480: AMsa_4.23 yad ānapekṣaḥ svaśarīrajīvite parārtham abhyeti paraṃ pariśramam /
SA20asmahsbu:481: paroghātena tathāvidhaḥ kathaṃ sa duṣkṛte karmaṇi saṃpravatsyati //
SA20asmahsbu:482: asya piṇḍārtho yasya para eva priyataro nātmā parārthaṃ svaśarīrajīvite ānapekṣatvāt abhyeti paraṃ pariśramam /
SA20asmahsbu:483: sa katham ātmārthaṃ paroghātena duṣkṛte karmaṇi pravatsyatīti /
SA20asmahsbu:485: AMsa_4.24 māyopamān vīkṣya sa sarvadharmān udyānayātrām iva copapattīḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:486: kleśāc ca duḥkhāc ca bibheti nāsau saṃpattikāle 'tha vipattikāle //
SA20asmahsbu:487: AMsa_4.25 svakā guṇāḥ satvahitāc ca modaḥ saṃcintyajanma rddhivikurvitaṃ ca /
SA20asmahsbu:489: māyopamasarvadharmalakṣaṇāt sa bodhisatvaḥ saṃpattikāle kleśebhyo na bibheti /
SA20asmahsbu:496: AMsa_4.26 parārtham udyogavataḥ kṛpātmano hy avīcir apy eti yato 'sya ramyatām /
SA20asmahsbu:497: kutaḥ punas trasyati tādṛśo bhavan parāśrayair duḥkhasamudbhavair bhave //
SA20asmahsbu:498_0: api ca yasya parārtham udyogavataḥ karuṇātmatvād avīcir apy ramyaḥ sa kathaṃ parārthanimittair
SA20asmahsbu:498_1: duḥkhotpādair bhave punas trāsam āpatsyate yato 'sya duḥkhatrāsaḥ syāc cittasya vyāvṛttir bhavati /
SA20asmahsbu:501: parasya kṛtye samupasthite punaḥ paraiḥ samādāpanato 'tilajjanā //
SA20asmahsbu:503: yasya mahākaruṇācāryeṇa nityoṣito ātmā paraduḥkhaiś ca duḥkhitaṃ cetas tasyotpanne parārthaṃ karaṇīye yadi paraiḥ samādāpanā kartavyā bhavati atilajjanā /
SA20asmahsbu:505: AMsa_4.28 śirasi vinihitoccasatvabhāraḥ śithilagatir na hi śobhate 'grasatvaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:507_0: śirasi mahāntaṃ satvabhāraṃ vinidhāya bodhisatvaḥ śithilaṃ parākramamāṇo na śobhate
SA20asmahsbu:507_1: śataguṇaṃ hi sa vīryaṃ kartum arhati śrāvakavīryāt tathā hi svaparavavidhair vividhair
SA20asmahsbu:521: AMsa_5.2 paratralabdhvātmasamānacittatāṃ svato 'dhi vā śreṣṭhatareṣṭatāṃ pare /
SA20asmahsbu:523: paratrātmasamānacittatāṃ labdhvā 'dhimuktito vā sāṃketikacittotpādalābhe jñānato vā pāramārthikacittotpādalābhe /
SA20asmahsbu:524: ātmato vā punaḥ paratra viśiṣṭatarām iṣṭatāṃ labdhvā tenaiva ca kāraṇenātmanaḥ parārthe viśiṣṭasaṃjñino bodhisatvasya [Msa_20] kaḥ svārthaḥ parārtho vā /
SA20asmahsbu:527: AMsa_5.3 paratra loko na tathātinirdayaḥ pravartate tāpanakarmaṇā ripau /
SA20asmahsbu:528: yathā parārthaṃ bhṛśaduḥkhatāpane kṛpātmakaḥ svātmani saṃpravartate //
SA20asmahsbu:529: yathā svātmanaḥ parārtho viśiṣyate tat sādhayati parārtham ātmano 'tyarthaṃ saṃtāpanāt /
SA20asmahsbu:533: AMsa_5.5 guṇair viśiṣṭaiḥ samudāgamas tathā kulodayo vyākaraṇābhiṣiktatā /
SA20asmahsbu:534: tathāgatajñānam anuttaraṃ padaṃ parārtha eṣa tryadhiko daśātmakaḥ //
SA20asmahsbu:535: trividhe satvanikāye hīnamadhyaviśiṣṭagotrasthe trayodaśavidho bodhisatvasya parārthaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:545: aṣṭamyāṃ bhūbhau vyākaraṇaṃ daśamyām abhiśekaś ca /
SA20asmahsbu:546: saha tathāgatajñānenety eṣa triṣu gotrastheṣu yathāyogaṃ trayodaśavidhaḥ parārtho bodhisatvasya /
SA20asmahsbu:548: AMsa_5.6 janānurūpāviparītadeśanā nirunnatā cāpy amamā vicakṣaṇā /
SA20asmahsbu:549: kṣamā ca dāntā ca sudūragā 'kṣayā jinātmajānāṃ pratipattir uttamā //
SA20asmahsbu:550: yathā 'sau parārthapratipattiḥ saṃpannā bhavati tathā saṃdarśayati /
SA20asmahsbu:555: na ṛddhā manyate na cāvatāritān satvān mamāyati /
SA20asmahsbu:561: na hy adūragatayā pratipattyā kulodayādayaḥ pareṣāṃ kartuṃ śakyāḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:562: sarvā caiṣā parārthapratipattir bodhisatvānām akṣayā [Msa_21] bhavaty abhyupagatasatvākṣayatvād ato 'pi saṃpannā veditavyā /
SA20asmahsbu:564: AMsa_5.7 mahābhaye kāmijanaḥ pravartate cale viparyāsasukhe bhavapriyaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:565: pratisvam ādhipraśame śamapriyaḥ sadā tu sarvādhigame kṛpātmakaḥ //
SA20asmahsbu:566: AMsa_5.8 jano vimūḍhaḥ svasukhārtham udyataḥ sadā tad aprāpya paraiti duḥkhatām /
SA20asmahsbu:567: sadā tu dhīro hi parārtham udyato dvayārtham ādhāya paraiti nirvṛtim //
SA20asmahsbu:569: calaṃ viparyāsasukhaṃ rūparūpyabhavapriyāṇām anityatvāt paramārthaduḥkhatvāc ca saṃskāraduḥkhatayā /
SA20asmahsbu:571: vimūḍho janaḥ sadā svasukhārthaṃ pratipannaḥ sukhaṃ nāpnoti duḥkham evāpnoti /
SA20asmahsbu:572: bodhisatvas tu parārthaṃ pratipannaḥ svaparārthaṃ saṃpādya nirvṛtisukhaṃ prāpnoty ayam asyāparaḥ pratipattiviśeṣaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:574: AMsa_5.9 yathā yathā hy akṣavicitragocare pravartate cāragato jinātmajaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:575: tathā tathā yuktasamānatāpadair hitāya satveṣv abhisaṃskaroti tat //
SA20asmahsbu:576: yena yena prakāreṇa cakṣurādīndriyagocare vicitre bodhisatvaḥ pravartate /
SA20asmahsbu:577: īryāpathavyāpāracāre vartamānas tena tena prakāreṇa saṃbaddhasādṛśyavacanair hitārthaṃ satveṣu tat sarvam abhisaṃskaroti /
SA20asmahsbu:580: AMsa_5.10 sadā 'svatantrīkṛtadoṣacetane jane na saṃdoṣam upaiti buddhimān /
SA20asmahsbu:581: akāmakāreṇa hi viprapattayo jane bhavantīti kṛpāvivṛddhitaḥ //
SA20asmahsbu:582: sadā kleśair asvatantrīkṛtacetane jane na saṃdoṣam upaiti bodhisatvaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:586: AMsa_5.11 bhavagati sakalābhibhūyagantrī paramaśamānugatā prapattir eva /
SA20asmahsbu:587: vividhaguṇagaṇair vivardhamānā jagad upaguhya sadā kṛpāśayena //
SA20asmahsbu:589: abhibhavamāhātmyaṃ sakalaṃ bhavatrayaṃ gatiṃ ca pañcavidhām abhibhayagamanāt /
SA20asmahsbu:591: rūpaṃ cet subhūta bhāvo 'bhaviṣyan nābhāvā nadaṃ mahāyānaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuralokam abhibhūya niryāsyatīti vistaraḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:598: AMsa_6.1 na san na cāsan na tathā na cānyathā na jāyate vyeti na cāvahīyate /
SA20asmahsbu:599: na vardhate nāpi viśudhyate punar viśudhyate tatparamārthalakṣaṇaṃ //
SA20asmahsbu:605: na jāyate na ca vyety anabhisaṃskṛtatvād dharmadhātoḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:606: na hīyate na ca vardhate saṃkleśavyavadānapakṣayor nirodhotpāde tadavasthatvāt /
SA20asmahsbu:607: na viśudhyati prakṛtyasaṃkliṣṭatvāt na ca na viśudhyati āgantukopakleśavigamāt /
SA20asmahsbu:608: ity etat pañcavidham advayalakṣaṇaṃ paramārthalakṣaṇaṃ veditavyaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:610: AMsa_6.2 na cātmadṛṣṭiḥ svayam ātmalakṣaṇā na cāpi duḥsaṃsthitatā vilakṣaṇā /
SA20asmahsbu:611: dvayān na cānyad bhrama eṣa tatūditas tataś ca mokṣo bhramamātrasaṃkṣayaḥ //
SA20asmahsbu:615: tathā hi sā vilakṣaṇā ātmalakṣaṇāt parikalpitāt /
SA20asmahsbu:617: nāpy ato dvayād anyad ātmalakṣaṇam upapadyate /
SA20asmahsbu:619: bhrama eṣa tūtpanno yeyam ātmadṛṣṭis tasmād eva cātmābhāvān mokṣo 'pi bhramamātrasaṃkṣayo veditavyo na tu kaścin muktaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:621: AMsa_6.3 kathaṃ jano vibhramamātram āśritaḥ paraiti duḥkhaprakṛtiṃ na saṃtatām /
SA20asmahsbu:622: avedako vedaka eva duḥkhito na duḥkhito dharmamayo na tanmayaḥ //
SA20asmahsbu:623: AMsa_6.4 pratītyabhāvaprabhave kathaṃ janaḥ samakṣavṛttiḥ śrayate 'nyakāritam /
SA20asmahsbu:624: tamaḥ prakāraḥ katamo 'yam īdṛśo yato 'vipaśyan sadasan nirīkṣate //
SA20asmahsbu:625: kathaṃ nāmāyaṃ loko bhrāntimātram ātmadarśanaṃ niśritya satatānubaddhaṃ duḥkhasvabhāvaṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ na paśyati /
SA20asmahsbu:631: yadā ca loko bhāvānāṃ pratītyasamutpādaṃ pratyakṣaṃ paśyati taṃ taṃ pratyayaṃ pratītya te te bhāvā bhavantīti /
SA20asmahsbu:632: tat katham etāṃ dṛṣṭiṃ śrayate 'nyakāritaṃ darśanādikaṃ na pratītyasamutpannam iti /
SA20asmahsbu:633: katamo 'yam īdṛśas tamaḥprakāro lokasya yad vidyamānaṃ pratītyasamutpādam avipaśyan na vidyamānam ātmānaṃ nirīkṣate /
SA20asmahsbu:634: śakyaṃ hi nāma tamasā vidyamānam adraṣṭuṃ syān na tvavidyamānaṃ draṣṭum iti /
SA20asmahsbu:636: AMsa_6.5 ta cāntaraṃ kiṃcana vidyate 'nayoḥ sadarthavṛttyā śamajanmanor iha /
SA20asmahsbu:637: tathāpi janmakṣayato vidhīyate śamasya lābhaḥ śubhakarmakāriṇām //
SA20asmahsbu:638: na cāsti saṃsāranirvāṇayoḥ kiṃcin nānākaraṇaṃ paramārthavṛttyā nairātmyasya samatayā /
SA20asmahsbu:639: tathāpi janmakṣayān mokṣaprāptir bhavaty eva śubhakarmakāriṇāṃ ye mokṣamārgaṃ bhāvayanti /
SA20asmahsbu:641: AMsa_6.6 saṃbhṛtya saṃbhāram anantapāraṃ jñānasya puṇyasya ca bodhisatvaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:642: dharmeṣu cintāsuviniśriś citatvāj jalpānvayām arthagatiṃ paraiti //
SA20asmahsbu:644: AMsa_6.7 arthān sa vijñāya ca jalpamātrān saṃtiṣṭhate tannibhacittamātre /
SA20asmahsbu:645: pratyakṣatām eti ca dharmadhātus tasmād viyukto dvayalakṣaṇena //
SA20asmahsbu:646: AMsa_6.8 nāstīti cittāt param etya buddhyā cittasya nāstitvam upaiti tasmāt /
SA20asmahsbu:648: AMsa_6.9 akalpanājñānabalena dhīmataḥ samānuyātena samantataḥ sadā /
SA20asmahsbu:650: ekena saṃbhṛtasaṃbhāratvaṃ dharmacintāsuviniśritatvaṃ samādhiniśrityabhāvanāt manojalpāc ca teṣāṃ dharmāṇām arthaprakhyānāvagamāt tatpraveśaṃ darśayati /
SA20asmahsbu:652: dvitīyena manojalpamātrānarthān viditvā tadābhāse cittamātre 'vasthānamiyaṃ bodhisatvasya nirvedhabhāgīyāvasthā /
SA20asmahsbu:653: tataḥ pareṇa dharmadhātoḥ pratyakṣato gamane dvayalakṣaṇena viyukto grāhyagrāhakalakṣaṇena iyaṃ darśanamārgāvasthā /
SA20asmahsbu:654: tṛtīyena yathāsau dhamadhātuḥ pratyakṣatām eti tad darśayati /
SA20asmahsbu:656: cittād anyadālambanaṃ grāhyaṃ nāstīty avagamya buddhyā tasyāpi cittamātrasya nāstitvāvagamanaṃ grāhyaṃbhāve grāhakābhāvāt /
SA20asmahsbu:657: dvaye cāsya nāstitvaṃ viditvā dharmadhātau avasthānam atadgatir grāhyagrāhakalakṣaṇābhyāṃ rahita evaṃ dharmadhātuḥ pratyakṣatām eti /
SA20asmahsbu:659_0: sadā sarvatra samatānugatenāvikalpajñānabalena yatra tatsamatānugataṃ paratantre
SA20asmahsbu:659_1: svabhāve tadāśrayasya dūra-anupraviṣṭasya doṣasaṃcayasya dauṣṭhulyalakṣaṇasya mahāgadeneva viṣasya nirasanāt /
SA20asmahsbu:662: smṛtim agatim avagamya kalpamātrāṃ vrajati guṇārṇavapāramāśudhīraḥ //
SA20asmahsbu:663_0: buddhavihite sudharme suvyavasthāpite sa paramārthajñānapraviṣṭo bodhisatvaḥ saṃpiṇḍitadharmālambanasya
SA20asmahsbu:663_1: mūlacittasya dharmadhātau matim upanividhāya yā smṛtir upalabhyate tāṃ sarvāṃ smṛtipravṛttiṃ
SA20asmahsbu:663_2: kalpanāmātrām avagacchaty evaṃ guṇārṇavasya pāraṃ buddhatvam āśu vrajatīty etat paramārthajñānasya māhātmyaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:670: jñānaṃ hi sarvatragasaprabhedeṣv avyāhataṃ dhīr agataḥ prabhāvaḥ //
SA20asmahsbu:672: vāci jñānaṃ divyaśrotrābhijñāyāṃ vācaṃ tatra gatvopapannā bhāṣante /
SA20asmahsbu:676: niḥsaraṇe jñānam āsravakṣayābhijñā yathā satvā upapattito niḥsarantīti /
SA20asmahsbu:677: eṣu ṣaṭsvartheṣu sarvatra lokadhātau sapramedeṣu padāparokṣam avyāhataṃ jñānaṃ sa prabhāvo bodhisatvānāṃ ṣaḍabhijñāsaṃgṛhītaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:680: AMsa_7.2 dhyānaṃ caturthaṃ suviśuddham etya niṣkalpanājñānaparigraheṇa /
SA20asmahsbu:682: yena niśrayeṇa yena jñānena yena manasikāreṇa tasya prabhāvasya samudāgamas tatsaṃdarśayati /
SA20asmahsbu:684: AMsa_7.3 yenāryadivyāpratimair vihārair brāhmaiś ca nityaṃ viharaty udāraiḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:685: buddhāṃś ca satvāṃś ca sa dikṣu gatvā saṃmānayaty ānayate viśuddhim //
SA20asmahsbu:687: ātmana āryādisukhavihāram atulyaṃ cotkṛṣṭaṃ ca lokadhātvantareṣu gatvā buddhānāṃ pūjanaṃ satvānāṃ viśodhanaṃ ca /
SA20asmahsbu:690: AMsa_7.4 māyopamān paśyati lokadhātūn sarvān sasatvān savivartanāśān /
SA20asmahsbu:691: saṃdarśayaty eva ca tān yatheṣṭaṃ vaśī vicitrair api sa prakāraiḥ //
SA20asmahsbu:693: svayaṃ ca sarvalokadhātūnāṃ sasatvānāṃ savivartasaṃvartānāṃ māyopamatvadarśanāt /
SA20asmahsbu:700: AMsa_7.5 raśmipramokṣair bhṛśaduḥkhitāṃś ca āpāyikān svargagatān karoti /
SA20asmahsbu:706: AMsa_7.6 samādhivikrīḍitam aprameyaṃ saṃdarśayaty agragaṇasya madhye /
SA20asmahsbu:708: aprameyasamādhivikrīḍitasaṃdarśanāt buddhaparṣanmaṇḍalamadhye trividhena nirmāṇena sadā satvārthakaraṇāc ca /
SA20asmahsbu:713: AMsa_7.7 jñānavaśitvāt samupaiti śuddhiṃ kṣetraṃ yathākāmanidarśanāya /
SA20asmahsbu:714: abuddhanāmeṣu ca buddhanāma saṃśrāvaṇāt tān kṣipate 'nyadhātau //
SA20asmahsbu:717: satvapariśodhanayā ca buddhanāmavirahiteṣu [Msa_27] lokadhātuṣūpapannānāṃ satvānāṃ buddhanāmasaṃśrāvaṇayā prasādaṃ grāhayitvā tadavirahiteṣu lokadhātuṣūpapādanāt /
SA20asmahsbu:719: AMsa_7.8 śakto bhavaty eva ca satvapāke saṃjātapakṣaḥ śakunir yathaiva /
SA20asmahsbu:720: buddhāt praśaṃsāṃ labhate 'timātrām ādeyavākyo bhavati prajānām //
SA20asmahsbu:724: AMsa_7.9 ṣaḍdhāpy abhijñā trividhā ca vidyā aṣṭau vimokṣā 'bhibhuvas tathā'ṣṭau /
SA20asmahsbu:725: daśāpi kṛtsnāyatanāny ameyāḥ samādhayo dhīragataḥ prabhāvaḥ //
SA20asmahsbu:728: evaṃ ṣaḍarthena vibhāgalakṣaṇena prabhāvaṃ darśayitvā tanmāhātmyodbhāvanārthaṃ ślokaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:729: AMsa_7.10 sa hi paramavaśitvalabdhabuddhir jagadavaśaṃ svavaśe vidhāya nityam /
SA20asmahsbu:730: parahitakaraṇaikatābhirāmaś carati bhaveṣu hi siṃhavat sudhīraḥ //
SA20asmahsbu:732: vaśitāmāhātmyaṃ svayaṃ paramajñānavaśitvaprāptyā kleśāsvavaśasya jagataḥ svavaśe sthāpanāt /
SA20asmahsbu:739: AMsa_8.1 rūciḥ prasādaḥ praśamo 'nukampanā kṣamātha medhā prabalatvam eva ca /
SA20asmahsbu:742_0: rucir mahāyānadeśanādharme prasādas taddeśike praśamaḥ kleśānām anukampā satveṣu
SA20asmahsbu:742_1: kṣamā duṣkaracaryāyāṃ medhā grahaṇadhāraṇaprativedheṣu prabalatvam adhigame ahāryatā
SA20asmahsbu:744: eṣa samāsena bodhisatvānāṃ navaprakāra ātmaparipāko veditavyaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:754: yaś ca tasyāḥ paripāka ugravīryaparārdhaniṣṭhāyuktaḥ svabhāvaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:758: jinātmaje śāstari saṃprapattaye mataṃ hi samyakparipākalakṣaṇam //
SA20asmahsbu:759: tatparipāko 'pi kāraṇataḥ svabhāvataḥ karmataś ca paridīpitaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:760: guṇajñatā ity api sa bhagavāṃs tathāgata iti vistareṇa kāraṇaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:765: jīnātmaje kleśavinodanāya tan mataṃ hi samyakparipākalakṣaṇam //
SA20asmahsbu:767: tatparipāko 'pi kāraṇataḥ svabhāvataḥ karmataś ca paridīpitaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:772: AMsa_8.5 kṛpā prakṛtyā paraduḥkhadarśanaṃ nihīnacittasya ca saṃpravarjanam /
SA20asmahsbu:774: svaprakṛtyā ca gotreṇa paraduḥkhadarśanena nihīnayānaparivarjanatayā ca paripacyata iti kāraṇaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:778: AMsa_8.6 dhṛtiḥ prakṛtyā pratisaṃkhyabhāvanā suduḥkhaśītādyadhivāsanā sadā /
SA20asmahsbu:780: dhṛtiḥ sahanaṃ kṣāntir iti paryāyās tatparipāke gotraṃ pratisaṃkhyānaṃ bhāvanā ca kāraṇaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:784: AMsa_8.7 vipākaśuddhiḥ śravaṇādyamoṣatā praviṣṭatā sūktaduruktayos tathā /
SA20asmahsbu:785: smṛter mahābuddhyudaye ca yogyatā sumedhatāyāḥ paripākalakṣaṇam //
SA20asmahsbu:787: śrutacintitabhāvitacirakṛtacirabhāṣitānām asaṃmoṣatā subhāṣitadurbhāṣitārthasupraviṣṭatā ca smṛter medhāparipākasvabhāvaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:790: AMsa_8.8 śubhadvayena dvayadhātupuṣṭatā phalodaye cāśrayayogyatā parā /
SA20asmahsbu:792: tatra puṇyajñānadvayena tasya puṇyajñānadvayasya bījapuṣṭatā tatparipāke kāraṇaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:800: māranirantarāyatā svabhāvo yadā māro na punaḥ śaknoty antarāyaṃ kartuṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:804: jinātmaje hy aṅgasamanvaye punar mataṃ hi samyakparipākalakṣaṇam //
SA20asmahsbu:809: AMsa_8.11 iti navavidhavas tu pācitātmā paraparipācanayogyatām upetaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:816: AMsa_8.12 vraṇe 'pi bhojye paripāka iṣyate yathaiva tatsrāvaṇabhogayogyatā /
SA20asmahsbu:821: evaṃ satvānām āśraye vraṇabhojanasthānīye srāvaṇasthānīyaṃ vipakṣaśamanaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:824: vipakṣapratipakṣāv atra pakṣadvayaṃ veditavyaṃ / dvitīyaḥ ślokaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:825: AMsa_8.13 vipācanoktā paripācanā tathā prapācanā cāpy anupācanāparā /
SA20asmahsbu:826: supācanā cāpy adhipācanā matā nipācanotpācananā ca dehiṣu //
SA20asmahsbu:838: AMsa_8.14 hitāśayeneha yathā jinātmajo vyavasthitaḥ sarvajagadvipācayan /
SA20asmahsbu:839: tathā na mātā na pitā na bandhavaḥ suteṣu bandhuṣv api suvyavasthitāḥ //
SA20asmahsbu:840: AMsa_8.15 tathājano nātmani vatsalo mataḥ kuto 'pi susnigdhaparāśraye jane /
SA20asmahsbu:841: yathā kṛpātmā parasatvavatsalo hite sukhe caiva niyojanātmataḥ //
SA20asmahsbu:843: yādṛśenāśayena bodhisatvaḥ satvān paripācayati tam āśayaṃ darśayati /
SA20asmahsbu:845: ātmavatsalas tu loka ātmānaṃ hite ca sukhe ca saṃniyojayati /
SA20asmahsbu:846: avaśiṣṭaiḥ ślokair yena prayogeṇa satvān paripācayati taṃ pāramitāpratipattyā saṃdarśayati /
SA20asmahsbu:847: yādṛśena dānena yathā satvān paripācayati tad ārabhya ślokaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:848: AMsa_8.16 na bodhisatvasya śarīrabhogayoḥ pareṣv adeyaṃ punar asti sarvathā /
SA20asmahsbu:849: anugraheṇa dvividhena pācayan paraṃ samair dānaguṇair na tṛpyate //
SA20asmahsbu:855: yādṛśena śīlena yathā satvān paripācayati tad ārabhya ślokaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:856: AMsa_8.17 sadā prakṛtyādhyavihiṃsakaḥ svayaṃrato 'pramatto 'tra paraṃ niveśayan /
SA20asmahsbu:869: yādṛśyā kṣāntyā yathā satvān paripācayati tad ārabhya ślokaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:870: AMsa_8.18 pare 'pakāriṇyupakāribuddhimān pramarṣayann ugram api vyatikramam /
SA20asmahsbu:876: saṃparāyānugraheṇa copāyajñas tair apakāramarṣaṇair āvarjyāpakāriṇāṃ kuśale samādāpanāt /
SA20asmahsbu:877: yādṛśena vīryeṇa yathā satvān paripācayati tad ārabhya ślokaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:878: AMsa_8.19 punaḥ sa yatnaṃ paramaṃ samāśrito na khidyate kalpasahasrakoṭibhiḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:879: jinātmajaḥ satvagaṇaṃ prapācayan paraikacittasya śubhasya kāraṇāt //
SA20asmahsbu:883: kuśalacittasaṃniyojanāt dṛṣṭadharmasaṃparāyānugraheṇeti yādṛśena dhyānena yathā satvān paripācayati tad ārabhya ślokaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:884: AMsa_8.20 vaśitvam āgamya manasy anuttaraṃ paraṃ samāvarjayate 'tra śāsane /
SA20asmahsbu:885: nihatya sarvām avamānakāmatāṃ śubhena saṃvardhayate ca taṃ punaḥ //
SA20asmahsbu:886: prāptānuttaravaśitvena dhyānena nirāmiṣeṇa ca nihatasarvāvamānābhilāṣeṇa paripācayati /
SA20asmahsbu:887: buddhaśāsane parasyāvarjanād āvarjitasya ca kuśaladharmasaṃvardhanāt paripācayati /
SA20asmahsbu:888: yādṛśyā prajñayā yathā satvān paripācayati tadārabhya ślokaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:889: AMsa_8.21 sa tatvabhāvārthanaye suniścitaḥ karoti satvān suvinītasaṃśayān /
SA20asmahsbu:890: tataś ca te tajjinaśāsanād arād vivardhayante svaparaṃ guṇaiḥ śubhaiḥ //
SA20asmahsbu:891: sa bodhisatvas tatvārthanaye cābhiprāyārthanaye ca suviniścitayā prajñayā paripācayati /
SA20asmahsbu:893: tataś ca śāsanabahumānāt teṣām ātmaparaguṇasaṃvardhakatvena / niyamanaślokaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:894: AMsa_8.22 iti sugatigatau śubhatraye vā jagad akhilaṃ kṛpayā sa bodhisatvaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:896: anena yatra ca vinayati sugatigamane yānatraye vā /
SA20asmahsbu:901: yāvantaṃ ca kālaṃ tatparidīpanāt samāsena paripākamāhātmyaṃ darśayati /
SA20asmahsbu:902: tatra tanuḥ prakāro 'dhimukticaryābhūmau bodhisatvasya paramo 'ṣṭamyādiṣu vimadhyamaḥ saptasu veditavyaḥ yāval lokasya bhāvas tatsamānayā gatyā atyantam ity arthaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:906: sarvākārajñatāyāṃ dvau ślokau / tṛtīyas tayor eva nirdeśabhūtaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:911: AMsa_9.3 kṛtvā duṣkaram adbhutaṃ śramaśataiḥ saṃcityasarvaśubhaṃ kālenottamakalpayānamahatā sarvāvṛtīnāṃ kṣayāt /
SA20asmahsbu:912: sūkṣmasyāvaraṇasya bhūmiṣu gatasyotpāṭanād buddhatā ratnānām iva sā prabhāvamahatāṃ peṭā samuddhātitā //
SA20asmahsbu:913: samudāgamataḥ svabhāvata aupamyataś ca buddhatvam udbhāvitaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:914: yāvadbhir duṣkaraśatair yāvadbhiḥ kuśalasaṃbhārair yāvatā kālena yāvataḥ kleśajñeyāvaraṇasya prahāṇāt samudāgacchatyayaṃ samudāgamaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:918: AMsa_9.4 sarvadharmāś ca buddhatvaṃ dharmo naiva na kaścana /
SA20asmahsbu:919: śukladharmamayaṃ tac ca na ca tais tannirūpyate //
SA20asmahsbu:922_0: sarvadharmāś ca buddhatvaṃ tathatāyā abhinnatvāt tadviśuddhiprabhāvitatvāc ca buddhatvasya
SA20asmahsbu:922_1: na ca kaś ciddharmo 'sti parikalpitena dharmasvabhāvena śukladharmamayaṃ ca buddhatvaṃ
SA20asmahsbu:923: na ca tais tān nirdiśyate pāramitādīnāṃ pāramitādibhāvenāpariniṣpatter idam advayalakṣaṇaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:925: deśanā dharmaratnānāṃ tatprabhavatvāt kuśalasasyānāṃ ca vineyasaṃtānakṣetreṣu /
SA20asmahsbu:926: AMsa_9.6 buddhatvaṃ sarvadharmaḥ samuditam atha vā sarvadharmavyapetaṃ prodbhūter dharmaratnapratatasumahato dharmaratnākarābham /
SA20asmahsbu:927: bhūtānāṃ śuklasasya prasavasumahato hetuto meghabhūtaṃ dānād dharmāmbuvarṣapratatasuvihitasyākṣayasya prajāsu //
SA20asmahsbu:928: anena tṛtīyena ślokena tam evārthaṃ nirdiśati /
SA20asmahsbu:929: sumahataḥ pratatasya dharmaratnasya prodbhūter nimittatvād ratnākarābhaṃ bhūtānāṃ mahataḥ śuklasasya prasavahetutvān meghabhūtaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:930: mahataḥ suvihitasyākṣayasya dharmāmbuvarṣasya dānāt prajāsv ity ayam atra padavigraho veditavyaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:932: AMsa_9.7 paritrāṇaṃ hi buddhatvaṃ sarvakleśagaṇāt sadā /
SA20asmahsbu:936: satkāyād dhīnayānāc ca tasmāc charaṇam uttamam //
SA20asmahsbu:938: tatra sarvopadravaparitrāṇatvaṃ [Msa_35] yad buddhānubhāvena andhāś cakṣūṃṣi pratilabhante badhirāḥ śrotraṃ vikṣiptacittāḥ svasthacittamītayaḥ śāmyantīty evam ādi /
SA20asmahsbu:939: apāyaparitrāṇatvaṃ buddhaprabhayā tadgatānāṃ mokṣaṇāt tadagamane ca pratiṣṭhāpanāt /
SA20asmahsbu:943: AMsa_9.9 śaraṇam anupamaṃ tacchreṣṭhabuddhatvam iṣṭaṃ jananamaraṇasarvakleśapāpeṣu rakṣā /
SA20asmahsbu:945: anena tṛtīyena tasyaiva śaraṇatvasyānupamaśreṣṭhasya cānuttaryaṃ tenaivārthena darśayati /
SA20asmahsbu:946: AMsa_9.10 bauddhair dharmair yac ca susaṃpūrṇaśarīraṃ yat saddharme vetti sa satvān pravinetum /
SA20asmahsbu:947: yātaṃ pāraṃ yatkṛpayā sarvajagatsu tad buddhatvaṃ śreṣṭham iha eṣyaṃ śaraṇānām //
SA20asmahsbu:948: anena caturthena yaiḥ kāraṇais tat tathānuttaraṃ śaraṇaṃ bhavati tat saṃdarśayati /
SA20asmahsbu:950: svārthaniṣṭhām adhikṛtya saddharmasatvavinayopāyajñānāt karuṇāpāragamanāc ca parārthaniṣṭhām adhikṛtya /
SA20asmahsbu:951: AMsa_9.11 ālokāt kālāt sarvasatvānāṃ buddhatvaṃ śaraṇaṃ mahat /
SA20asmahsbu:953: anena pañcamena ślokena yāvantaṃ kālaṃ yāvatāṃ satvānāṃ yatrārthe śaraṇaṃ bhavati tat samāsena darśayati /
SA20asmahsbu:956: AMsa_9.12 kleśajñeyavṛtīnāṃ satatam anugataṃ bījam utkṛṣṭakālaṃ yasminn astaṃ prayātaṃ bhavati suvipulaiḥ sarvahāniprakāraiḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:957: buddhatvaṃ śukladharmapravaraguṇayutā āśrayasyānyathāptis tatprāptir nirvikalpād viṣayasumahato jñānamārgāt suśuddhāt //
SA20asmahsbu:964: AMsa_9.13 sthitaś ca tasmin sa tathāgato jagan mahācalendrastha ivābhyudīkṣate /
SA20asmahsbu:965: śamābhirāmaṃ karūṇāyate janamaghābhirāme 'nyajane tu kā kathā //
SA20asmahsbu:967: tatstho hi mahācalendrastha iva dūrāntaranikṛṣṭaṃ lokaṃ paśyati /
SA20asmahsbu:968: dṛṣṭvā ca karuṇāyate śrāvakapratyekabuddhān api prāg eva tadanyān /
SA20asmahsbu:969: AMsa_9.14 pravṛttir ūddhittir avṛtir āśrayo nivṛttir āvṛttir atho dvayādvayā /
SA20asmahsbu:970: samāviśiṣṭā api sarvagātmikā tathāgatānāṃ parivṛttir iṣyate //
SA20asmahsbu:972: sā hi tathāgatānāṃ parivṛttiḥ parārthavṛttir iti pravṛttiḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:983: AMsa_9.15 yathāmbaraṃ sarvagataṃ sadāmataṃ tathaiva tat sarvagataṃ sadāmatam /
SA20asmahsbu:984: yathāmbaraṃ rūpagaṇeṣu sarvagaṃ tathaiva tat satvagaṇeṣu sarvagam //
SA20asmahsbu:985: anena caturthena tatsvabhāvasya buddhatvasya sarvagatatvaṃ darśayati /
SA20asmahsbu:987: satvagaṇeṣu sarvagatatvaṃ buddhatvasyātmatvena sarvasatvopagamane pariniṣpattito veditavyaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:988: AMsa_9.16 yathodabhājane bhinne candrabimbaṃ na dṛśyate /
SA20asmahsbu:989: tatha duṣṭeṣu satveṣu buddhabimbaṃ na dṛśyate //
SA20asmahsbu:991: anena pañcamena sarvagatatve 'pyabhājanabhūteṣu satveṣu abuddhabimbadarśanaṃ dṛṣṭāntena sādhayati /
SA20asmahsbu:992: AMsa_9.17 yathāgnir jvalate 'nyatra punar anyatra śāmyati /
SA20asmahsbu:994: anena ṣaṣṭhena buddhavineyeṣu satsu buddhotpādāt taddarśanaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:997: AMsa_9.18 aghaṭitebhyas tūryebhyo yathā syāc chabdasaṃbhavaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:999: AMsa_9.19 yathā maṇer vinā yatnaṃ svaprabhāvasanidarśanam /
SA20asmahsbu:1001: ābhyāṃ ślokābhyām anābhogena buddhakāryaṃ sādhayaty aghaṭitatūryaśabdamaṇiprabhāvasādharmyeṇa /
SA20asmahsbu:1002: AMsa_9.20 yathākāśe avicchinnā dṛśyante lokataḥ kriyāḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:1004: AMsa_9.21 yathākāśe kriyāṇāṃ hi hānir abhyudayaḥ sadā /
SA20asmahsbu:1007: ākāśa iva lokakriyāṇām avicchede 'pi cānyānyakriyodayavyayas tathaiva /
SA20asmahsbu:1010: na śuddhā nāpi cāśuddhā tathatā buddhatā matā //
SA20asmahsbu:1011: paurvāparyeṇa viśiṣṭatvān na śuddhā / paścāt sarvāvaraṇanirmalatvān nāśuddhā malavigamāt /
SA20asmahsbu:1015: tatra cānāsrave dhātau buddhānāṃ paramātmā nirdiśyate /
SA20asmahsbu:1018: agraṃ nairātmyaṃ viśuddhā tathatā sā ca buddhānām ātmā svabhāvārthena tasyāṃ viśuddhāyām agraṃ nairātmyam ātmānaṃ buddhā labhante śuddhaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:1019: ataḥ śuddhātmalābhitvāt buddhā ātmamāhātmyaṃ prāptā ity anenābhisaṃdhinā buddhānām anāsrave dhātau paramātmā vyavasthāpyate /
SA20asmahsbu:1020: AMsa_9.24 na bhāvo nāpi cābhāvo buddhatvaṃ tena kathyate /
SA20asmahsbu:1022: tenaiva kāraṇena buddhatvaṃ na bhāva ucyate /
SA20asmahsbu:1025: ato buddhasya bhāvābhāvapraśne bhavati tathāgataḥ paraṃ maraṇān na bhavatīty evamādir avyākṛtanayo mataḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:1026: AMsa_9.25 dāhaśāntir yathā lohe darśane timirasya ca /
SA20asmahsbu:1027: cittajñāne tathā bauddhe bhāvābhāvo na śasyate //
SA20asmahsbu:1028: yathā ca lohe dāhaśāntir darśane ca timiram etasya śāntir na bhāvo dāhatimirayor abhāvalakṣaṇatvāt /
SA20asmahsbu:1030: evaṃ buddhānāṃ cittajñāne ca dāhatimirasthānīyayo rāgāvidyayoḥ śāntir na bhāvaḥ śasyate tadabhāvaprabhāvitatvāc cetaḥprajñāvimuktyā nābhāvas tena tena vimuktilakṣaṇena bhāvāt /
SA20asmahsbu:1031: AMsa_9.26 buddhānām amale dhātau naikatā bahutā na ca /
SA20asmahsbu:1033: buddhānām anāsravadhātau naikatvaṃ pūrvadehānusāreṇa / na bahutvaṃ dehābhāvād ākāśavat /
SA20asmahsbu:1039: etau ratnākarameghopamatve pūrṇacandramahādityopamatve ca ślokau gatārthau /
SA20asmahsbu:1040: AMsa_9.29 ameyā raśmayo yadvad vyamiśrā bhānumaṇḍale /
SA20asmahsbu:1049: ekakāle sarvaraśmiviniḥsṛtyā sa ca buddhānām ekakāle jñānapravṛttiṃ darśayati /
SA20asmahsbu:1052: AMsa_9.33 yathā sūryaikamuktābhai raśmibhir bhāsyate jagat /
SA20asmahsbu:1053: sakṛt jñeyaṃ tathā sarvaṃ buddhajñānaiḥ prabhāsyate //
SA20asmahsbu:1054: mamatvābhāve jagajjñeyaprabhāsena ca / yathākramaṃ ślokau gatārthau /
SA20asmahsbu:1058: tathā buddhajñānānām āvaraṇaṃ satvānām ābhājanatvena duṣṭatā pañcakaṣāyātyutsadatayā /
SA20asmahsbu:1061: yathā pāṃśuviśeṣeṇa vastre raṅgavicitratā kvacid avicitratā /
SA20asmahsbu:1062: tathaiva pūrvaprāṇidhānacaryābalādhānaviśeṣāt [Msa_40] buddhānāṃ vimuktau jñānavicitratā bhavati /
SA20asmahsbu:1066: etad anāsravadhātau buddhānāṃ trividhaṃ gāmbhīryam evam uktaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:1070: tat punar lakṣaṇagāmbhīryaṃ viśuddhilakṣaṇaṃ paramātmalakṣaṇam avyākṛtalakṣaṇaṃ vimuktilakṣaṇaṃ cārabhyoktaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:1072: seyamanāsrave dhātau niṣprapañcatvād ākāśopame gāmbhīryaprabhedadeśanā yathā raṅgair ākāśacitraṇī veditavyā /
SA20asmahsbu:1073: AMsa_9.37 sarveṣām aviśiṣṭāpi tathatā śuddhim āgatā /
SA20asmahsbu:1075: sarveṣāṃ nirviśiṣṭā tathatā tadviśuddhisvabhāvaś ca tathāgataḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:1076: ataḥ sarve satvās tathāgatagarbhā ity ucyate /
SA20asmahsbu:1082: ābhyāṃ tāvad dvābhyāṃ prabhāvotkarṣaviśeṣeṇa buddhānāṃ vibhutvaṃ darśayati /
SA20asmahsbu:1083: AMsa_9.40 aprameyam acintyaṃ ca vibhutvaṃ bauddham iṣyate /
SA20asmahsbu:1084: yasya yatra yathā yāvat kāle yasmin pravartate //
SA20asmahsbu:1085: anena tṛtīyena prakāraprabhedagāmbhīryaviśeṣābhyāṃ katham aprameyaṃ kathaṃ vācintyam ity āha /
SA20asmahsbu:1086: yasya pudgalasyārthe tat pravartate yatra lokadhātau yathā tādṛśaiḥ prakārair yāvad alpaṃ [Msa_41] vā bahu vā yasmin kāle /
SA20asmahsbu:1093: AMsa_9.42 manaso 'pi parāvṛttau vibhutvaṃ labhyate param /
SA20asmahsbu:1095: manasaḥ parāvṛttau vibhutvānucare nirvikalpe suviśuddhe jñāne paramaṃ vibhutvaṃ labhyate /
SA20asmahsbu:1099: arthaparāvṛttau udgraharparāvṛttau ca kṣetraviśuddhivibhutvaṃ paramaṃ labhyate yena yathākāmaṃ bhogasaṃdarśanaṃ karoti /
SA20asmahsbu:1101: vikalpaparāvṛttau sarveṣāṃ jñānānāṃ karmaṇāṃ ca sarvakālam avyāghāte paramaṃ vibhutvaṃ labhyate /
SA20asmahsbu:1102: AMsa_9.45 pratiṣṭhāyāḥ parāvṛttau vibhutvaṃ labhyate param /
SA20asmahsbu:1104: pratiṣṭhāparāvṛttāv apratiṣṭhitanirvāṇaṃ paramaṃ vibhutvaṃ labhyate buddhānām anāsrave dhātau /
SA20asmahsbu:1105: AMsa_9.46 maithunasya parāvṛttau vibhutvaṃ labhyate param /
SA20asmahsbu:1108: maithunasya parāvṛttau dvayor buddhasukhavihāre ca dārā 'saṃkleśadarśane ca /
SA20asmahsbu:1111: ākāśasaṃjñāvyāvṛttau dvayor eva cintitārthasamṛddhau ca yena gaganagarbho bhavati /
SA20asmahsbu:1116: tatra cāprameyaṃ vibhutvam acintyakarmānuṣṭhānaṃ buddhānām anāsrave dhātau veditavyaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:1118: AMsa_9.49 śubhe vṛddho loko vrajati suviśuddhau paramatāṃ śubhe cānārabdhvā vrajati śubhavṛddhau paramatām /
SA20asmahsbu:1119: vrajaty evaṃ loko diśi diśi jinānāṃ sukathitair apakvaḥ pakvo vā na ca punar aśeṣaṃ dhruvam iha //
SA20asmahsbu:1120: anena yādṛśasya paripākasya nimittaṃ bhavati taddarśayati /
SA20asmahsbu:1121: upacitakuśalamūlānāṃ ca vimuktau paramatāyām anupacitakuśalamūlānāṃ ca kuśalamūlopacaye /
SA20asmahsbu:1122: apakvaḥ śubhavṛddhau paramatāṃ vrajanapākaṃ vrajati pakvaḥ suviśuddhau paramatāṃ vrajati /
SA20asmahsbu:1123: evaṃ ca nityakālaṃ vrajati na ca niḥśeṣaṃ lokasyānantatvāt /
SA20asmahsbu:1124: AMsa_9.50 tathā kṛtvā caryāṃ kṛcchrāvāpyāṃ paramaguṇayogād bhutavartī mahābodhiṃ nityāṃ dhruvam aśaraṇānāṃ ca śaraṇam /
SA20asmahsbu:1125: labhante yaddhīrā daśadig sadā sadā sarvasamayaṃ tad āścaryaṃ loke suvidhacaraṇān nādbhutam api //
SA20asmahsbu:1126: anena dvitīyena paripakvānāṃ bodhisatvānāṃ paripākasyāścaryaṃ nāścaryaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:1127: [Msa_43] lakṣaṇaṃ sadā sarvasamayam iti nityaṃ nirantaraṃ ca tad anubhūya mārgacaraṇaṃ suvidhicaraṇaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:1128: AMsa_9.51 kvaciddharmāñ ca kaṃ dharmyaṃ cakraṃ bahumukhaśatair darśayati yaḥ kvacij janmāntardhiṃ kvacid api vicitrāṃ janacarīm /
SA20asmahsbu:1129: kvacitkṛtsnāṃ bodhiṃ kvacid api ca nirvāṇam asakṛt na ca sthānāt tasmād vicalati sa sarvaṃ ca kurute //
SA20asmahsbu:1133: na ca sthānāc calatīty anāsravād dhātoḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:1134: AMsa_9.52 na buddhānām evaṃ bhavati mama pakvo 'yam iti cāprapācyo 'yaṃ dehī api ca adhunāpācyata iti /
SA20asmahsbu:1135: vinā saṃskāraṃ tu prapacam upayāty eva janatā śubhair dharmair nityaṃ diśi diśi samantāt trayamukham //
SA20asmahsbu:1138: AMsa_9.53 yathāyatnaṃ bhānuḥ pratataviṣadair aṃśavisaraiḥ prapākakaṃ sasyānāṃ diśi diśi samantāt prakurūte /
SA20asmahsbu:1139: tathā dharmārko 'pi praśamavidhidharmāṃśuvisaraiḥ prapākaṃ sasyānāṃ diśi diśi samantāt prakurūte //
SA20asmahsbu:1141: AMsa_9.54 yathaikasmād dīpād bhavati sumahān dīpanicayo 'prameyo 'saṃkhyeyo na ca sa punar eti vyayamataḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:1142: yathaikasmād buddhād pākābhavati sumahān paripākapākanicayo 'prameyo 'saṃkhyeyo na ca punar eti punar upaiti vyayamataḥ //
SA20asmahsbu:1145: AMsa_9.55 yathā toyais tṛptiṃ vrajati na mahāsāgara iva na vṛddhiṃ vā yāti pratataviṣadāmbu praviśanaiḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:1146: tathā bauddhau dhātuḥ satatasamitaiḥ śuddhiviśanair na tṛptiṃ vṛddhiṃ vā vrajati paramāścaryam iha tat //
SA20asmahsbu:1147: anena saptamena paripakvānāṃ vimuktipraveśe samudrodāharaṇena dharmadhātor atṛptiṃ cāvakāśadānād avṛddhiṃ dhyānādhikatvāt /
SA20asmahsbu:1156: eṣa hetvarthaṃ phalārthaṃ cārabhya dvitīyaḥ ślokaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:1162: eṣa karmārthaṃ yogārthaṃ cārabhya tṛtīyaḥ ślokaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:1163: trividhiṃ kāyādinirmāṇaṃ karma samādhidhāraṇīmukhābhyāṃ dvayena cāprameyeṇa puṇyajñānasaṃbhāreṇa samanvāgamo yogaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:1171: kāyabhedā hi buddhānāṃ prathamas tu dvayāśrayaḥ //
SA20asmahsbu:1178: tatra sāṃbhogikaḥ sarvalokadhātuṣu parṣanmaṇḍalabuddhakṣetranām aśarīradharmasaṃbhogakriyābhir bhinnaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:1179: AMsa_9.62 samaḥ sūkṣmaś ca tacchiṣṭaḥ kāyaḥ svābhāviko mataḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:1183: tena sāṃbhogikena kāyena saṃbaddhaḥ saṃbhogavibhutve ca hetur yatheṣṭaṃ bhogadarśanāya /
SA20asmahsbu:1184: AMsa_9.63 ameyaṃ buddhanirmāṇaṃ kāyo nairmāṇiko mataḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:1186: nairmāṇikas tu kāyo buddhānām aprameyaprabhedaṃ buddhanirmāṇaṃ sāṃbhogikaḥ svāthasaṃpattilakṣaṇaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:1188: evaṃ dvayārthasaṃpattir yathākramaṃ dvayoḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥ sāṃbhogike ca kāye nairmāṇike ca /
SA20asmahsbu:1191: sa punar nirmāṇakāyaḥ sadā vineyārthaṃ śilpasya vīṇāvādanādibhiḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:1193: nirvāṇasya ca darśanair vimocane mahopāyatvāt parārthasaṃpattilakṣaṇo veditavyaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:1194: AMsa_9.65 tribhiḥ kāyais tu vijñeyo buddhānāṃ kāyasaṃgrahaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:1195: sāśrayaḥ svaparārtho yas tribhiḥ kāyair nirdarśitaḥ //
SA20asmahsbu:1196: tribhiś ca kāyair buddhānāṃ sarvakāyasaṃgraho veditavyaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:1197: ebhis tribhiḥ kāyaiḥ sāśrayaḥ svaparārtho nidarśitaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:1198: dvayoḥ svaparārthaprabhāvitatvāt dvayoś ca tadāśritatvād yathā pūrvam uktaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:1199: AMsa_9.66 āśrayeṇāśayenāpi karmaṇā te samā matāḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:1201: te ca trayaḥ kāyāḥ sarvabuddhānāṃ yathākramaṃ tribhir nirviśeṣā āśrayeṇa dharmadhātor abhinnatvāt āśayena pṛthak buddhāśayasyābhāvāt /
SA20asmahsbu:1203: teṣu ca triṣu kāyeṣu yathākramaṃ trividhā nityatā veditavyā yena nityakāyās tathāgatā ucyante /
SA20asmahsbu:1210: caturvidhaṃ buddhānāṃ jñānam ādarśajñānaṃ samatājñānaṃ pratyavekṣājñānaṃ kṛtyānuṣṭhānajñānaṃ ca /
SA20asmahsbu:1211: ādarśajñānam acalaṃ trīṇi jñānāni tadāśritāni calāni /
SA20asmahsbu:1213: sarvajñeyeṣv asaṃmūḍhaṃ na ca teṣv āmukhaṃ sadā //
SA20asmahsbu:1214: ādarśajñānam amamam aparicchinnaṃ deśataḥ sadānugaṃ kālataḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:1215: sarvajñeyeṣv asaṃmūḍhaṃ sadāvaraṇavigamāt na ca teṣv āmukham anākāratvāt /
SA20asmahsbu:1219: teṣāṃ ca samatādijñānānāṃ sarvaprakārāṇāṃ hetutvāt sarvajñānānāmākaropamaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:1223: yadbodhisatvenābhisamayakāleṣu samatājñānaṃ pratilabdhaṃ tadbhāvanāśuddhito budhiprāptasyāpratiṣṭhitanirvāṇe niviṣṭaṃ samatājñānamiṣyate /
SA20asmahsbu:1226: mahāmaitrīkaruṇābhyāṃ sarvakālānugaṃ yathādhimokṣaṃ ca satvānāṃ buddhabimbanidarśakaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:1227: yataḥ kecit satvās tathāgataṃ nīlavarṇaṃ paśyanti kecit pītavarṇam ity evamādi /
SA20asmahsbu:1228: AMsa_9.72 pratyavekṣaṇakaṃ jñāne jñeyeṣv avyāhataṃ sadā /
SA20asmahsbu:1235: kṛtyānuṣṭhānajñānaṃ sarvalokadhātuṣu nirmāṇair nānāprakārair aprameyair acintyaiś ca sarvasatvārthakaraṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:1236: AMsa_9.75 kṛtyaniṣpattibhir bhedaiḥ saṃkhyākṣetraiś ca sarvadā /
SA20asmahsbu:1237: acintyaṃ buddhanirmāṇaṃ vijñeyaṃ tac ca sarvathā //
SA20asmahsbu:1238: tac ca buddhanirmāṇaṃ sadā sarvathā cācintyaṃ veditavyaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:1247: AMsa_9.77 gotrabhedād avaiyarthyāt sākalyād apy anāditaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:1249: eka eva buddha ity etann eṣyate /
SA20asmahsbu:1255: puṇyajñānasaṃbhāravaiyarthyaṃ ca syād anyeṣāṃ bodhisatvānām anabhisaṃbodhān na ca yuktaṃ vaiyarthyaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:1256: tasmād avaiyarthyād api naika eva buddhaḥ satvārthakriyāsākalyaṃ ca na syāt /
SA20asmahsbu:1257: buddhasya buddhatve kasyacit apratiṣṭhāpanād etac ca na yuktaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:1258: na ca kaścid ādibuddho 'sti vinā saṃbhāreṇa buddhatvāyogād vinā cānyena buddhena saṃsthānāyogād ity anāditvād apy eko buddho na yuktaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:1259: bahutvam api neṣyate buddhānāṃ dharmakāyasyābhedād anāsrave dhātau /
SA20asmahsbu:1263: yā parikalpitena svabhāvenāvidyamānatā saiva paramā vidyamānatā pariniṣpannena svabhāvena /
SA20asmahsbu:1264: yaś ca sarvathā 'nupalambhaḥ parikalpitasya svabhāvasya sa eva parama upalambhaḥ pariniṣpannasvabhāvasya /
SA20asmahsbu:1265: AMsa_9.79 bhāvanā paramā ceṣṭā bhāvanām avipaśyatām /
SA20asmahsbu:1266: pratilambhaḥ paraś ceṣṭaḥ pratilambhaṃ ca paśyatām //
SA20asmahsbu:1267: saiva paramā bhāvanā yo bhāvanāyā anupalambhaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:1268: sa eva paramaḥ pratilambho yaḥ pratilambhānupalambhaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:1269: AMsa_9.80 paśyatāṃ gurutvaṃ tāṃ dīrghaṃ nimittaṃ vīryam ātmanaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:1271: ye ca gurutvaṃ bahutvaṃ paśyanti adbhutadharmayuktaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:1274: ātmanaś ca vīryaṃ vayam ārabdhavīryā [Msa_59] buddhatvaṃ prāpsyāma iti /
SA20asmahsbu:1275: teṣām evaṃ mānināṃ bodhisatvānām aupalambhikatvāt dūre bodhir nirūpyate /
SA20asmahsbu:1276: AMsa_9.81 paśyatām kalpanāmātraṃ sarvam etad yathoditaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:1278: kalpanāmātraṃ tv etat sarvam iti paśyatāṃ tasyāpi kalpanāmātrasyāvikalpanād akalpabodhisatvānām anutpattikadharmakṣāntilābhāvasthāyām arthataḥ prāptaiva bodhir ity ucyate /
SA20asmahsbu:1280: AMsa_9.82 bhinnāśrayā bhinnajalāś ca nadyaḥ alpodakāḥ kṛtyapṛthaktvakāryāḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:1282: AMsa_9.83 samudraviṣṭāś ca bhavanti sarvā ekāśrayā ekamahājalāś ca /
SA20asmahsbu:1284: AMsa_9.84 bhinnāśrayā bhinnamatāś ca dhīrāḥ svalpāvabodhāḥ pṛthagātmakṛtyāḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:1286: AMsa_9.85 buddhatvaviṣṭāś ca bhavanti sarve ekāśrayā ekamahāvabodhāḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:1287: miśrekakāryāś ca mahopabhogyāḥ sadā mahāsatvagaṇasya te hi //
SA20asmahsbu:1293: AMsa_9.86 iti nirupamaśukladharmayogād hitasukhahetutayā ca buddhabhūmeḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:1304: AMsa_10.1 ādiḥ siddhiḥ śaraṇaṃ gotraṃ citte tathaiva cotpādaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:1306: eṣa ca bodhyadhikāra ādim ārabhya yāvat bodhipaṭalānusāreṇānugantavyaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:1308: AMsa_10.2 jātājātā grāhikā grāhyabhūtā mitrādāttā svātmato bhrāntikā ca /
SA20asmahsbu:1309: abhrāntānyā āmukhā naiva cānyā ghoṣācārā caiṣikā cekṣikā ca //
SA20asmahsbu:1323: AMsa_10.3 hāryā kīrṇā 'vyāvakīrṇā vipakṣair hīnodārā āvṛtā 'nāvṛtā ca /
SA20asmahsbu:1324: yuktā 'yuktā saṃbhṛtā 'saṃbhṛtā ca gāḍhaṃ viṣṭā dūragā cādhimuktiḥ //
SA20asmahsbu:1353: AMsa_10.6 anudvegas tathodvega āvṛtiś cāpy ayuktatā /
SA20asmahsbu:1361: AMsa_10.7 puṇyaṃ mahadakaukṛtyaṃ saumanasyaṃ sukhaṃ mahat /
SA20asmahsbu:1371: bhrāntikāyāmāmukhāyāṃ śrutamayādikāyāṃ ca yāvat madhyāyāṃ viśeṣagamanaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:1376: AMsa_10.9 kāmināṃ sā śvasadṛśī kūrmaprakhyā samādhinām /
SA20asmahsbu:1378: yathā śvā duḥkhārtaḥ satatam avitṛptaḥ kṣudhitako yathā kūrmaś cāsau jalavivarake saṃkucitakaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:1380: yathā rājā rājñāṃ viṣaye vaśavartī viharati /
SA20asmahsbu:1381: AMsa_10.10 tathā kāmisthātṛsvaparajanakṛtyārtham udite viśeṣo vijñeyaḥ satatam adhimuktayā vividhayā /
SA20asmahsbu:1382: mahāyāne tasya vidhivad iha matvā paramatāṃ bhṛśaṃ tasmin dhīraḥ satatam iha tām eva vṛṇuyāt //
SA20asmahsbu:1383: api khalu kāminām adhimuktiḥ śvasadṛśī laukikasamādhigatānāṃ kūrmaprakhyā svārthavatāṃ bhṛtyopamā /
SA20asmahsbu:1387: AMsa_10.11 manuṣaṣya bhūtāḥ saṃbodhiṃ prāpnuvanti pratikṣaṇam /
SA20asmahsbu:1394: AMsa_10.12 yathā puṇyaṃ prasavate pareṣāṃ bhojanaṃ dadat /
SA20asmahsbu:1395: na tu svayaṃ sa bhuñjānas tathā puṇyamahodayaḥ //
SA20asmahsbu:1398: na tu svārthāśrayād dharmād deśitād upalabhyate //
SA20asmahsbu:1399: yathā bhojanaṃ dadataḥ puṇyam utpadyate parārthādhikārāt /
SA20asmahsbu:1401: evaṃ parārthāśrayadeśitāt mahāyānadharmāt teṣu teṣu sūtreṣūktaḥ puṇyodayo mahāṃl labhyate /
SA20asmahsbu:1404: AMsa_10.14 iti vipulagatau mahoghamahāryadharme janiya sadā matimān mahādhimuktim /
SA20asmahsbu:1405: vipulasatatapuṇyatadvivṛddhiṃ vrajati guṇair asamair mahātmatāṃ ca //
SA20asmahsbu:1407: vistīrṇe mahāyānadharme 'pariṇīyayodārādhimuktyā matimān trividhaṃ phalaṃ parigṛhṇāti /
SA20asmahsbu:1408: vipulapuṇyavṛddhiṃ tasyā evādhimukter vṛddhiṃ taddhetukāṃ cātulyaguṇamahātmatāṃ buddhatvaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:1413: AMsa_11.1 piṭakatrayaṃ dvayaṃ vā saṃgrahataḥ kāraṇair navabhir iṣṭam /
SA20asmahsbu:1416: tad eva trayaṃ hīnayānāgrayānabhedena dvayaṃ bhavati /
SA20asmahsbu:1418: tatpunas trayaṃ dvayaṃ vā kenārthena piṭakam ity āha /
SA20asmahsbu:1421: navabhiḥ kāraṇair vicikitsāpratipakṣeṇa sūtraṃ yo yatrārthe saṃśayitas tasya tanniścayārthaṃ deśanāt /
SA20asmahsbu:1424: [Msa_54] punaḥ śikṣātrayadeśanā sūtreṇa adhiśīlādhicittasaṃpādanatā vinayena śīlavato 'vipratisārādavipratisāreṇa samādhilābhāt /
SA20asmahsbu:1439: te ca sūtravinayābhidharmāḥ pratyekaṃ caturvidhārthāḥ samāsatas teṣāṃ jñānād bodhisatvaḥ sarvajñatāṃ prāpnoti /
SA20asmahsbu:1440: śrāvakas tv ekasyā api gāthāyā artham ājñāyāsravakṣyaṃ prāpnoti /
SA20asmahsbu:1441: AMsa_11.3 āśrayato lakṣaṇato dharmād arthāc ca sūcanāt sūtram /
SA20asmahsbu:1445: tatrāśrayo yatra deśe deśitaṃ yena yasmai ca /
SA20asmahsbu:1449: abhimukhatvād abhīkṣṇatvād abhibhavanād abhigamanāc cābhidharmo veditavyaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:1451: abhīkṣṇaṃ dharmo 'bhidharma ekaikasya dharmasya rūpyarūpisanidarśanādiprabhedena bahulanirdeśāt /
SA20asmahsbu:1454: AMsa_11.4 āpatter utthānād vyutthānān niḥsṛteś ca vinayatvam /
SA20asmahsbu:1456: āpattitaḥ samutthānato vyutthānato niḥsaraṇataś ca veditavyaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:1458: samutthānam āpattīnām ajñānāt pramādāt kleśaprācuryādanādarāc ca /
SA20asmahsbu:1464: ajñānāt prasrabdhiḥ samagreṇa saṃghena śikṣāpadastha pratiprasrambhaṇāt /
SA20asmahsbu:1470: prajñaptito yadā 'rocite pudgalāparādhe śāstā saṃnipātya saṃghaśikṣāṃ prajñāpayati /
SA20asmahsbu:1471: pravibhāgato yaḥ prajñapte śikṣāpade tad uddeśasya vibhāgaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:1472: viniścayataś ca tatrāpattiḥ kathaṃ bhavaty anāpattir veti nirdhāraṇāt /
SA20asmahsbu:1474: AMsa_11.5 ālambanaṃ mato dharmaḥ ādhyātmaṃ bāhyakaṃ dvayam /
SA20asmahsbu:1477: tatra grāhakabhūtaṃ kāyādikamādhyātmikaṃ grāhyabhūtaṃ bāhyaṃ tayor eva tathatādvayaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:1478: tatra dvayor ādhyātmikabāhyayor ālambanayor dvayārthena lābho yathākramaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:1479_0: yadi grāhyārthād grāhakārtham abhinnaṃ paśyati grāhakārthāc ca grāhyārthaṃ dvayasya
SA20asmahsbu:1479_1: punaḥ samastasyādhyātmikabāhyālambanasya tathatāyā lābhas tayor eva dvayor anupalambhād veditavyaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:1481: arthakhyānasya jalpāc ca nāmni sthānāc ca cetasaḥ //
SA20asmahsbu:1483: AMsa_11.7 dharmālambanalābhaḥ syāt tribhir jñānaiḥ śrutādibhiḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:1485: dharmālambanalābhaḥ punas tribhir jñānair bhavati śrutacintābhāvanāmayaiḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:1486: tatra samāhitena cetasā manojalpair yathoktārthaprasannasya tatpradhāraṇāt /
SA20asmahsbu:1487: śrutamayena jñānena tallābhaḥ manojalpair iti saṃkalpaiḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:1491: yadi manojalpād evāyam arthaḥ khyātīti paśyati nānyan manojalpād yathoktaṃ dvayālambanalābhe /
SA20asmahsbu:1492: cittasya nāmni sthānāt bhāvanāmayena jñānena tallābho veditavyo dvayānupalambhād yathoktaṃ dvayālambanalābhe /
SA20asmahsbu:1493: ata eva ca sa pūrvoktas trividhālambanalābho dharmālambanalābhasaṃniśrito veditavyaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:1497: AMsa_11.9 hīnapūrṇāśrayo dvedhā sajalpo 'jalpa eva ca /
SA20asmahsbu:1499: AMsa_11.10 saṃbhinnālambanaś cāsau vibhinnālambanaḥ sa ca /
SA20asmahsbu:1500: pañcadhā saptadhā caiva parijñā pañcadhā 'sya ca //
SA20asmahsbu:1501: AMsa_11.11 catvāraḥ saptatriṃśac ca ākārā bhāvanāgatāḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:1503: AMsa_11.12 prayogī vaśavartī ca parītto vipulātmakaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:1504: yogināṃ hi manaskāra eṣa sarvātmako mataḥ //
SA20asmahsbu:1513: jñānasaṃprayukto yo yogopaniṣad yogasahagataḥ sa punaryathākramaṃ śrutacintāmanyo bhāvanāmayaś ca /
SA20asmahsbu:1515: vibhinnālambanaḥ saptavidho nāmālambanaḥ padālambano vyañjanālambanaḥ pudgalanairātmyālambano dharmanairātmyālambano rūpidharmālambano 'rūpidharmālambanaś ca /
SA20asmahsbu:1518: parijñāniyato yaḥ parijñeye vastuni parijñeye 'rthe parijñāyāṃ parijñāphale tatpravedanāyāṃ ca /
SA20asmahsbu:1519: tatra parijñeyaṃ vastu duḥkhaṃ parijñeyo 'rthas tasyaivānityaduḥkhaśūnyānātmatā /
SA20asmahsbu:1524: tatra caturākārabhāvanaḥ pudgalanairātmyākārabhāvano dharmanairātmyākārabhāvano darśanākārabhāvano jñānākārabhāvanaś ca /
SA20asmahsbu:1533_1: evaṃ vyavasāyākārabhāvano dharmāsaṃpramoṣākārabhāvanaś cittasthityākārabhāvanaḥ pravicayākārabhāvana indriyeṣu /
SA20asmahsbu:1539: pratīcchako yo dharmasrotasi buddhabodhisatvānām antikād avavādagrāhakaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:1542: vṛttyupalakṣaṇaprāyogiko yena dvividhāṃ vṛttim upalakṣayate parimāṇavṛttiṃ ca vyañjanānām aparimāṇavṛttiṃ ca nāmapadayoḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:1543: parikalpopalakṣaṇaprāyogiko yena dvayam upādāya dvayaparikalpam upalakṣayate /
SA20asmahsbu:1544: nāmaparikalpam upādāyārthaparikalpam arthaparikalpamupādāya nāmaparikalpam aparikalpam akṣaraṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:1547_0: sa punar ekādaśavidho veditavya āgantukatvaprativedhataḥ saṃprakhyānanimittaprativedhato
SA20asmahsbu:1550: AMsa_11.13 tatvaṃ yat satataṃ dvayena rahitaṃ bhrānteś ca saṃniśrayaḥ śakyaṃ naiva ca sarvathābhilapituṃ yañ cāprapañcātmakam /
SA20asmahsbu:1551: jñeyaṃ heyam atho viśodhyamamalaṃ yac ca prakṛtyā matam yasyākāśasuvarṇavārisadṛśī kleśād viśuddhirmatā //
SA20asmahsbu:1552: satataṃ dvayena rahitaṃ tatvaṃ parikalpitaḥ svabhāvo grāhyagrāhakalakṣaṇenātyantamasatvāt /
SA20asmahsbu:1555: tatra prathamaṃ tatvaṃ parijñeyaṃ dvitīyaṃ praheyaṃ tṛtīyaṃ viśodhyaṃ cāgantukamalādviśuddhaṃ ca prakṛtyā yasya prakṛtyā viśuddhasyākāśasuvarṇavārisadṛśī kleśād viśuddhiḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:1557: na cāgantukamalāpagamād eṣāṃ viśuddhir neṣyata iti /
SA20asmahsbu:1558: AMsa_11.14 na khalu jagati tasmād vidyate kiṃcid anyaj jagad api tad aśeṣaṃ tatra saṃmūḍhabuddhi /
SA20asmahsbu:1559: katham ayam abhirūḍho lokamohaprakāro yadasadabhiniviṣṭaḥ satsamantād vihāya //
SA20asmahsbu:1561: na khalu tasmād evaṃlakṣaṇād dharmadhātoḥ kiṃcit anyal loke vidyate dharmatāyā dharmasyābhinnatvāt /
SA20asmahsbu:1566: yathā māyā yantraparigṛhītaṃ bhrāntinimittaṃ kāṣṭhaloṣṭādikaṃ tathābhūtaparikalpaḥ paratantraḥ svabhāvo veditavyaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:1567_0: yathā māyākṛtaṃ tasyāṃ māyāyāṃ hastyaśvasuvarṇādyākṛtis tadbhāvena pratibhāsitā tathā
SA20asmahsbu:1567_1: tasminn abhūtaparikalpe dvayabhrāntirgrāhyagrāhakatvena pratibhāsitā parikalpitasvabhāvākārā veditavyā /
SA20asmahsbu:1568: AMsa_11.16 yathā tasmin na tadbhāvaḥ paramārthas tatheṣyate /
SA20asmahsbu:1570: yathā tasmin na tadbhāvo māyākṛte hastitvādyabhāvas tathā tasmin paratantre paramārtha iṣyate parikalpitasya dvayalakṣaṇasyābhāvaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:1571: yathā tasya māyākṛtasya hastyādibhāvenopalabdhis tathābhūtaparikalpasya saṃvṛtisatyatopalabdhiḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:1572: AMsa_11.17 tadabhāve yathā vyaktis tannimittasya labhyate /
SA20asmahsbu:1574: yathā māyākṛtyasyābhāve tasya nimittasya kāṣṭhādikasya vyaktir bhūtārthopalabhyate tathāśrayaparāvṛttau dvayabhrāntyabhāvād abhūtaparikalpasya bhūto 'rtha upalabhyate /
SA20asmahsbu:1575: AMsa_11.18 tannimitte yathā loko hy abhrāntaḥ kāmataś caret /
SA20asmahsbu:1576: parāvṛttāv aparyas taḥ kāmacārī tathā patiḥ yatiḥ //
SA20asmahsbu:1577: yathā tannimitte kāṣṭhādāv abhrānto lokaḥ kāmataś carati svatantras tathā 'śrayaparāvṛttvaparyasta āryaḥ kāmacārī bhavati svatantraḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:1578: AMsa_11.19 tadākṛtiś ca tatrāsti tadbhāvaś ca na vidyate /
SA20asmahsbu:1582: AMsa_11.20 na bhāvas tatra cābhāvo nābhāvo bhāva eva ca /
SA20asmahsbu:1584: na bhāvas tatra cābhāvo yas tadākṛtibhāvo nāsau na bhāvaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:1585: nābhāvo bhāva eva ca yo hastitvādyabhāvo nāsau na bhāvaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:1586: tayoś ca bhāvābhāvayor aviśeṣo māyādiṣu vidhīyate /
SA20asmahsbu:1589: ya eva hastitvādyabhāvaḥ sa eva tadākṛtibhāvaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:1590: AMsa_11.21 tathā dvayābhatātrāsti tadbhāvaś ca na vidyate /
SA20asmahsbu:1594: AMsa_11.22 na bhāvas tatra cābhāvo nābhāvo bhāva eva ca /
SA20asmahsbu:1596: na bhāvas tatra cābhāvaḥ / yā dvayābhāsatā /
SA20asmahsbu:1600: ya eva hi ābhāsatāyā bhāvaḥ sa eva dvayasyābhāva iti /
SA20asmahsbu:1603: kim arthaṃ punar ayaṃ bhāvābhāvayor aikāntikatvam aviśeṣaś ceṣyate /
SA20asmahsbu:1607: abhāvasya hy abhāvatvaṃ viditvā samāropaṃ na karoti /
SA20asmahsbu:1609: tayoś cāviśeṣaṃ viditvā na bhāvād udvijayate tasmān na hīnayānena niryāti /
SA20asmahsbu:1610: AMsa_11.24 bhrānter nimittaṃ bhrāntiś ca rūpavijñaptir iṣyate /
SA20asmahsbu:1611: arūpiṇī ca vijñaptir abhāvāt syān na cetarā //
SA20asmahsbu:1612: rūpabhrānter yā nimittavijñaptiḥ sā rūpavijñaptir iṣyate rūpākhyā /
SA20asmahsbu:1614: abhāvād rūpāvijñapter itarāpi na syād arūpiṇī vijñaptiḥ / kāraṇābhāvāt /
SA20asmahsbu:1616: dvayaṃ tatra yathā nāsti dvayaṃ caivopalabhyate //
SA20asmahsbu:1618: dvayaṃ tatra yathā nāsti dvayaṃ caivopalabhyate //
SA20asmahsbu:1620: grāhyaṃ grāhakaṃ ca tatra yathā nāsti dvayaṃ caivopalabhyate /
SA20asmahsbu:1621: pratibimbaṃ saṃkalikāṃ ca manasikurvataḥ tadgrāhabhrānter dvayam udāhṛtaṃ pūrvavat /
SA20asmahsbu:1624: ye dharmā bhrāntilakṣaṇā vipakṣasvabhāvās te sadasanto māyopamāś ca /
SA20asmahsbu:1628: tayoś ca bhāvābhāvayor aviśiṣṭatvāt santo 'pya santo 'pi māyāpi caivaṃlakṣaṇās tasmān māyopamāḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:1629: AMsa_11.28 tathā 'bhāvāt tathā '; bhāvāt tathā 'bhāvād alakṣaṇāḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:1630: māyopamāś ca nirdiṣṭā ye dharmāḥ prātipakṣikāḥ //
SA20asmahsbu:1631: ye 'pi prātipakṣikā dharmā buddhenopadiṣṭāḥ smṛtyupasthānādayas te 'pyalakṣaṇā māyāś ca nirdiṣṭāḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:1632: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ tathā 'bhāvād yathā bālair gṛhyante /
SA20asmahsbu:1635: evam alakṣaṇā avidyamānāś ca khyānti tasmān māyopamāḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:1637: ye sarvadharmān paśyanti nirmārās te jinātmajāḥ //
SA20asmahsbu:1639: ye prātipakṣikā dharmās te māyārājasthānīyāḥ saṃkleśaprahāṇe vyavadānādhipatyāt /
SA20asmahsbu:1640: ye 'pi sāṃkleśikā dharmās te 'pi rājasthānīyāḥ saṃkleśanirvṛttāv ādhipatyāt /
SA20asmahsbu:1641: atas taiḥ prātipakṣikaiḥ saṃkleśaparājayo māyārājñeva rājñaḥ parājayo draṣṭavyaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:1642: tajjñānāc ca bodhisatvā nirmānāḥ] bhavanti ubhayapakṣe /
SA20asmahsbu:1644: AMsa_11.30 māyāsvapnamarīcibimbasadṛśāḥ prodbhāsaśrutkopamā vijñeyodakacandrabimbasadṛśā nirmāṇatulyāḥ punaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:1645: ṣaṭ ṣaṭ dvau ca punaś ca ṣaṭ dvayamatā ekaikaśaś ca trayaḥ saṃskārāḥ khalu tatra tatra kathitā buddhair vibuddhottamaiḥ //
SA20asmahsbu:1646: yat tūktaṃ bhagavatā māyopamā dharmā yāvan nirmāṇopamā iti /
SA20asmahsbu:1650: marīcikopamau dvau dharmo cittaṃ caitasikāś ca bhrāntikaratvāt /
SA20asmahsbu:1651: pratibimbopamāḥ punaḥ ṣaḍ evādhyātmikāny āyatanāni pūrvakarmapratibimbatvāt /
SA20asmahsbu:1652: pratibhāsopamāḥ ṣaḍ eva bāhyāny āyatanāny ādhyātmikānām āyatanānāṃ chāyābhūtatvāt tadādhipatyotpattitaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:1655: udakacandrabimbopamāḥ samādhisaṃniśritā dharmāḥ samādher udakasthānīyatvād acchatayā /
SA20asmahsbu:1658: AMsa_11.31 abhūtakalpo na bhūto nābhūto 'kalpa eva ca /
SA20asmahsbu:1659: na kalpo nāpi cākalpaḥ sarvaṃ jñeyaṃ nirucyate //
SA20asmahsbu:1661: na bhūto nābhūto yas tadanukūlo yāvan nirvedhabhāgīyaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:1663: na kalpo [Msa_63] nāpi cākalpo lokottarapṛṣṭhalabdhaṃ laukikaṃ jñānaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:1670: sahāvidyayā kleśaiś ca vṛttir eṣāṃ ta ime sāvidyākleśavṛttayaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:1674: ta eva hy advayābhāsā vartante carmakāṇḍavat //
SA20asmahsbu:1675: ālambanaviśeṣāptir iti yo dharmālambanalābhaḥ pūrvam uktaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:1676: svadhātusthānayogata iti svadhātur vikalpānāṃ tathatā tatra sthānaṃ nāmni sthānāc cetasaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:1678: bhāvanāmārgeṇa ta eva vikalpā advayābhāsā vartante parāvṛttāśrayasya /
SA20asmahsbu:1680: yathā hi kharatvāpagamāt tad eva carma mṛdu bhavati /
SA20asmahsbu:1681: agnisaṃtāpanayā tad eva kāṇḍaṃ ṛju bhavati /
SA20asmahsbu:1682: evaṃ śamathavipaśyanābhāvanābhyāṃ cetaḥprajñāvimuktilābhe parāvṛttāśrayasya ta eva vikalpā na punar dvayābhāsāḥ pravartante ity eva vyavadānaṃ paryeṣitavyaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:1684: AMsa_11.34 cittaṃ dvayaprabhāsaṃ rāgādyābhāsam iṣyate tadvat /
SA20asmahsbu:1686: cittamātram eva dvayapratibhāsam iṣyate grāhyapratibhāsaṃ grāhakapratibhāsaṃ ca /
SA20asmahsbu:1689: na tu tadābhāsād anyaḥ kliṣṭo dharmo 'sti rāgādilakṣaṇaḥ kuśalo vā śraddhādilakṣaṇaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:1690: AMsa_11.35 yathā dvayapratibhāsād anyo na dvayalakṣaṇaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:1693: tatra cittam eva vastu tac citrābhāsaṃ [Msa_64] pravartate /
SA20asmahsbu:1694: paryāyeṇa rāgābhāsaṃ vā dveṣābhāsaṃ vā tadanyadharmābhāsaṃ vā /
SA20asmahsbu:1697: na tu dharmāṇāṃ kuśalānāṃ tatpratibhāsavyatirekeṇa tallakṣaṇābhāvāt /
SA20asmahsbu:1700: AMsa_11.36 lakṣyaṃ ca lakṣaṇaṃ caiva lakṣaṇā ca prabhedataḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:1704: lakṣyam etat samāsena hy apramāṇaṃ prabhedataḥ //
SA20asmahsbu:1708: avikāritā asaṃskṛtam ākāśādikaṃ tadvijñapter nityaṃ tathāpravṛtteḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:1709: ity etat samāsena pañcavidhaṃ lakṣyaṃ prabhedenāpramāṇaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:1713: tatra parikalpitalakṣaṇaṃ trividhaṃ yathājalpārthasaṃjñāyā nimittaṃ tasya jalpasya vāsanā tasmāc ca vāsanādyo 'rthaḥ khyāti avyavahārakuśalānāṃ vināpi yathājalpārthasaṃjñayā /
SA20asmahsbu:1715: tasyā yad ālambanaṃ tannimittam evaṃ yac ca parikalpyate yataś ca kāraṇād vāsanatas tad ubhayaṃ parikalpitalakṣaṇamatrābhipretaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:1716: AMsa_11.39 yathā nāmārtham arthasya nāmnaḥ prakhyānatā ca yā /
SA20asmahsbu:1718: aparaparyāyo yathā nāma cārthaś ca yathānāmārtham arthasya nāmnaś ca prakhyānatā yathānāmārthaprakhyānatā /
SA20asmahsbu:1719: yadi yathānāmārthaḥ khyāti yathārthaṃ vā nāma ity etad abhūtaparikalpālambanaṃ parikalpitalakṣaṇaṃ etāvad dhi parikalpyate yad uta nāma vā artho veti /
SA20asmahsbu:1720: AMsa_11.40 aparaparyāyo yathā nāma cārthaś ca yathānāmārtham arthasya nāmnaś ca prakhyānatā yathānāmārthaprakhyānatā /
SA20asmahsbu:1721: yadi yathānāmārthaḥ khyāti yathārthaṃ vā nāma ity etad abhūtaparikalpālambanaṃ parikalpitalakṣaṇaṃ etāvad dhi parikalpyate yad uta nāma vā artho veti /
SA20asmahsbu:1736: pariniṣpannalakṣaṇaṃ punas tathatā sā hy abhāvatā ca sarvadharmāṇāṃ parikalpitā nābhāvatā ca tadabhāvatvena bhāvāt /
SA20asmahsbu:1738: aśāntā cāgantukair upakleśaiḥ śāntā ca prakṛtipariśaddhatvāt /
SA20asmahsbu:1740: etena trividhaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ tathatāyāḥ paridīpitaṃ svalakṣaṇaṃ kleśavyavadānalakṣaṇam avikalpalakṣaṇaṃ ca /
SA20asmahsbu:1745: ādhāra ādhānam ādarśa āloka āśrayaś ca /
SA20asmahsbu:1746: tatrādhāro niṣpandadharmo yo buddhenādhigamo deśitaḥ sa tasyādhigamasya niṣpandaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:1748: ādarśaḥ cittasya dhātau sthānaṃ samādhir yad etat pūrvaṃ nāmni sthānam uktaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:1749: ālokaḥ sadasatvenārthadarśanaṃ lokottarā prajñā tathā sac ca sato yathābhūtaṃ paśyaty asaccāsataḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:1751: AMsa_11.43 samatāgamanaṃ tasminn āryagotraṃ hi nirmalam /
SA20asmahsbu:1762: na ca tasyonatvaṃ saṃkleśapakṣanirodhe nādhikatvaṃ vyavadānapakṣotpāda ity eṣā [Msa_66] pañcavidhā yogabhūmir lakṣaṇā /
SA20asmahsbu:1768: padārthadehanirbhāsānāṃ vijñānānāṃ parāvṛttir anāsravo dhātur vimuktiḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:1770: AMsa_11.45 caturdhā vaśitā vṛtter manasaś codgrahaś ca ca /
SA20asmahsbu:1772: manasaś codgrahasya ca vikalpasya cāvṛtteḥ parāvṛtter ity arthaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:1773: caturdhā vaśitā bhavati yathākramam avikalpe kṣetre jñānakarmaṇoś ca /
SA20asmahsbu:1774: AMsa_11.46 acalāditribhūmau ca vaśitā sā caturvidhā /
SA20asmahsbu:1776: sā ceyam acalādibhūmitraye caturdhā vaśitā veditavyā /
SA20asmahsbu:1780: tadanyasyāṃ bhūmāv ekaikā vaśitā sādhumatyaṃ jñānavaśitā pratisaṃvidviśeṣalābhāt /
SA20asmahsbu:1782: AMsa_11.47 viditvā nairātmyaṃ dvividham iha dhīmān bhavagataṃ samaṃ tac ca jñātvā praviśati sa tatvaṃ grahaṇataḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:1783: tatas tatra sthānān manasa iha na khyāti tad api tadakhyānaṃ muktiḥ parama upalambhasya vigamaḥ //
SA20asmahsbu:1785: dvividhaṃ nairātmyaṃ viditvā bhavatrayagataṃ bodhisatvaḥ samaṃ tac ca jñātvā dvividhinair ātmyaṃ parikalpitapudgalābhāvāt parikalpitadharmābhāvāt na tu sarvathaivābhāvataḥ /

SA20asmahsbu:2341: AMsa_13.11 dharmadhātuvinirmukto yasmād dharmo na vidyate /

SA20asmahsbu:2348: AMsa_13.12 dharmadhātuvinirmukto yasmād dharmo na vidyate /

SA20asmahsbu:2369: AMsa_13.18 yathaiva toye lutiṭite prasādite na jāyate sā punar acchatānyataḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:2370: malāpakarṣas tu sa tatra kevalaḥ svacittaśuddhau vidhir eṣa eva hi //

SA20asmahsbu:2388: AMsa_13.23 maitrī yataḥ pratighacittam ato viruddhaṃ śāntir yato vyasanacittam ato viruddhaṃ /

SA20asmahsbu:2402: AMsa_13.26 yathaiva rajako vastre karmaṇe pratipadyate /

SA20asmahsbu:2444: AMsa_14.6 avadhṛtya ca tān arthān dharme saṃkalayet punaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:2447: sūtrageyādike dharme yatsūtrādināma daśabhūmikam ity evamādi tatra cittaṃ prathamato badhnīyāt /

SA20asmahsbu:2465: āśāsticittaṃ yadarthaṃ prayukto bhavati samā tatparipūryarthaṃ vā śrāmaṇyaphalārthaṃ vā bhūmipraveśārthaṃ vā viśeṣagamanārthaṃ vā tacchandasahagataṃ vartate /
SA20asmahsbu:2466: cittam eva hy ālambanapratibhāsaṃ vartate na cittād anyad ālambanam astīti jānato vā cittamātram ajānato vā cittam evālambanaṃ nānyat /

SA20asmahsbu:2497: AMsa_14.15 tataḥ sa tanukāṃ labdhvā praśrabdhiṃ kāyacetasoḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:2498: vijñeyaḥ samanaskāraḥ punas tāns tāṃ sa vivardhayan //
SA20asmahsbu:2499: AMsa_14.16 vṛddhidūraṃgamatvena maulī sa labhate sthitiṃ /

SA20asmahsbu:2503: AMsa_14.18 aprameyān upāsyāsau buddhān kalpair ameyagaiḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:2505: eti karmaṇyatāṃ parāṃ dhyāne iti saṃbandhanīyaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:2508: AMsa_14.19 tato 'nuśaṃsān labhate pañca śuddhaiḥ sa pūrvagān /

SA20asmahsbu:2514: AMsa_14.22 prapūrau ca viśuddhau ca dharmakāyasya sarvathā /

SA20asmahsbu:2522: eteṣāṃ pañcānām anuśaṃsānāṃ trayaḥ śamathapakṣā dvau vipaśyanāpakṣau veditavyau /
SA20asmahsbu:2524: AMsa_14.23 tataś cāsau tathābhūto bodhisatvaḥ samāhitaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:2526: AMsa_14.24 dharmalokasya vṛddhyarthaṃ vīryam ārabhate dṛḍhaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:2529: prahīno grāhyanivikṣepas tadā tasya bhavaty asau //
SA20asmahsbu:2531: ānantaryasamādhiṃ ca spṛśaty āśu tadā punaḥ //
SA20asmahsbu:2533: tathābhūto bodhisatvaḥ samāhitacitto manojalpād vinirmuktān sarvadharmān na paśyati svalakṣaṇasāmānyalakṣaṇākhyān manojalpamātram eva khyāti /

SA20asmahsbu:2537: sa tasyaiva dharmālokasya vivṛddhyartham āsthitakriyayā dṛḍhaṃ vīryam ārabhate /
SA20asmahsbu:2552: nirvikalpaṃ malāpetaṃ jñānaṃ sa labhate punaḥ //
SA20asmahsbu:2559: etena virajo vigatamalam ity uktaṃ bhavati /

SA20asmahsbu:2563: AMsa_14.30 dharmadhātoś ca samatāṃ pratividhya punas tadā /

SA20asmahsbu:2573: tadanyabodhisatvasamatayā ca yathā tair abhisamitaṃ tathābhisamayāt /
SA20asmahsbu:2576: sa traidhātukātmasaṃskārān abhūtaparikalpanāmātrān paśyati / suviśuddhena jñānena lokottaratvāt /
SA20asmahsbu:2577: AMsa_14.33 tadabhāvasya bhāvaṃ ca vimuktaṃ dṛṣṭihāyibhiḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:2578: labdhvā darśanamārgo hi tadā tena nirūcyate //
SA20asmahsbu:2579: tasya grāhyagrāhakābhāvasya bhāvaṃ dharmadhātūn darśanaprahātavyaiḥ kleśair vimuktaṃ paśyati /
SA20asmahsbu:2580: AMsa_14.34 abhāvaśūnyatāṃ jñātvā tathā bhāvasya śūnyatāṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:2581: prakṛtyā śūnyatāṃ jñātvā śūnyajña iti kathyate //
SA20asmahsbu:2583: sa ca bodhisatvaḥ śūnyajña ity ucyate /
SA20asmahsbu:2586: tathā bhāvasya śūnyatā paratantrasya sa hi na tathābhāvo yathā kalpyate svena lakṣaṇena bhāvaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:2588: AMsa_14.35 animittapadaṃ jñeyaṃ vikalpānāṃ ca saṃkṣayaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:2591: abhūtaparikalpas tadapraṇidhānasya padam ālambanam ity arthaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:2592: AMsa_14.36 tena darśanamārgeṇa saha lābhaḥ sadā mataḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:2594: tena darśanamārgeṇa saha bodhisatvasya sarveṣāṃ bodhipakṣāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ lābho veditavyaḥ smṛtyupasthānādīnāṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:2595: AMsa_14.37 saṃskāramātraṃ jagad etya buddhyā nirātmakaṃ duḥkhivirūḍhimātraṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:2597: AMsa_14.38 vinātmadṛṣṭyā ya ihātmadṛṣṭir vināpi duḥkhena suduḥkhitaś ca /
SA20asmahsbu:2598: sarvārthakartā na ca kārakāṅkṣī yathātmanaḥ svātmahitāni kṛtvā //
SA20asmahsbu:2599: AMsa_14.39 yo muktacittaḥ parayā vimuktyā baddhaś ca gāḍhāyatabandhanena /
SA20asmahsbu:2600: duḥkhasya paryantam apaśyamānaḥ prayujyate caiva karoti caiva //
SA20asmahsbu:2601: AMsa_14.40 svaṃ duḥkham udvoḍhum ihāsamartho lokaḥ kutaḥ piṇḍitam anyaduḥkhaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:2602: janmaikam ālokayate gataṃ tvacinto viparyayāt tasya tu bodhisatvaḥ //
SA20asmahsbu:2603: AMsa_14.41 yatprema yā vatsalatā prayogaḥ satveṣv akhedaś ca jinātmajānāṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:2604: āścaryam etat paramaṃ bhaveṣu na caiva satvātmasamān abhāvāt //
SA20asmahsbu:2605: ebhiḥ pañcabhiḥ ślokair darśanamārgalābhino bodhisatvasya māhātmyodbhāvanaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:2607: mahātmadṛṣṭir iti mahārthā yā sarvasatveṣv ātmasamacittalābhātmadṛṣṭiḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:2609: vinātmadṛṣṭyā anarthamayyātmadṛṣṭir mahārthā yā vināpi duḥkhena svasaṃtānajena suduḥkhitā sarvasatvasaṃtānajena /
SA20asmahsbu:2610: yo vimuktacitto darśanaprahātavyebhyaḥ parayā vimuktyānuttareṇa yānena /
SA20asmahsbu:2611_0: baddhaś ca gāḍhāyatabandhanena sarvasatvasāṃntāniṃkena [Msa_96] duḥkhasya paryantaṃ
SA20asmahsbu:2611_1: na paśyati svadhātor anantatvād ākāśavat prayujyate ca duḥkhasyāntakriyāyai satvānāṃ
SA20asmahsbu:2612: viparyayāt tasya tu bodhisatvaḥ sa hi saṃpiṇḍitasarvasatvaduḥkhaṃ yāval lokagatam udvoḍhuṃ samarthaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:2613: yā satveṣu bodhisatvasya priyatā yā ca hitasukhaiṣitā yaś ca tadarthaṃ prayogo yaś cittaprayuktasyākheda etat sarvam āścaryaṃ paramaṃ lokeṣu /
SA20asmahsbu:2621: AMsa_14.45 vajropamaṃ samādhānaṃ vikalpābhedyam etya ca /
SA20asmahsbu:2628: yathāvyavasthānaṃ ca lokottarapṛṣṭhalabdhaṃ laukikaṃ yena satvān paripācayati /
SA20asmahsbu:2629: asaṃkhyeyadvayasya samāptau paścimāṃ bhāvanām āgamyāvasānagatām abhiṣikto vajropamaṃ samādhiṃ labhate /
SA20asmahsbu:2632: sarvākārajñatāṃ cānuttarapadaṃ yatrastho yāvat saṃsāram abhisaṃbodhinirvāṇasaṃdarśanādibhiḥ satvānāṃ hitāya pratipadyate /
SA20asmahsbu:2633: AMsa_14.47 kathaṃ tathā durlabhadarśane munau bhaven mahārthaṃ na hi nityadarśanaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:2635: AMsa_14.48 apracodyamānaḥ satataṃ ca saṃmukhaṃ tathāgatair dharmasumukhe vyavasthitaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:2636: nigṛhya keśeṣv iva doṣagahvarāt nikṛṣya bodhau sa balān niveśyate //
SA20asmahsbu:2637: AMsa_14.49 sa sarvalokaṃ suviśuddhadarśanair akalpabodhair abhibhūya sarvathā /
SA20asmahsbu:2641: yo hi dharmamukhaśrotasy avavādaṃ labhate tasya nityaṃ buddhadarśanaṃ bhavati /
SA20asmahsbu:2643: yato 'syātyarthaṃ prasādaḥ prasādavegair āpyāyitacetasas tannityadarśanaṃ buddhānāṃ mahārthaṃ bhavati / śeṣaṃ gatārthaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:2644: AMsa_14.50 buddhāḥ samyakpraśaṃsāṃ vidadhati satataṃ svārthasamyakprayukte nindām īrṣyāprayukte sthitivicayapare cāntarāyānukūlān /
SA20asmahsbu:2645: dharmān sarvaprakārān vidhivad iha jinā darśayanty agrasatve yān varjyāsevya yoge bhavati vipulatā saugate śāsane 'smim //
SA20asmahsbu:2648: adhicittam adhiprajñaṃ cādhikṛtya sthitivicayapare tadantarāyāṇāṃ tadanukūlānāṃ ca sarvaprakārāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ deśanataḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:2649: yān varjyāsevyety antarāyān anukūlāṃś ca yathākramaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:2651: AMsa_14.51 iti satataśubhācayaprapūrṇaḥ suvipulam etya sa cetasaḥ samādhiṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:2660: AMsa_15.2 yathā pratiṣṭhā vanadehiparvatapravāhinīnāṃ pṛthivī samantataḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:2661: tathaiva dānādiśubhasya sarvato budheṣu karma trividhaṃ nirucyate //
SA20asmahsbu:2668: na kāyavākcittamayasya karmaṇo jinātmajānāṃ bhavatīha saṃnatiḥ //
SA20asmahsbu:2669: AMsa_15.4 yathā viṣāc chastramahāśanād ripor nivārayed ātmahitaḥ svam āśrayaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:2670: nihīnayānād vividhāj jinātmajo nivārayet karma tathā trayātmakaṃ //
SA20asmahsbu:2674: viṣādisādharmyaṃ hīnayānapratisaṃyuktasya karmaṇo hīnayānacittapariṇāmanāt mahāyāne kuśalamūlasamucchedanāt anutpannakuśalamūlānutpādāya /
SA20asmahsbu:2677: AMsa_15.5 na karmiṇaḥ karma na karmaṇaḥ kriyāṃ sadāvikalpaḥ samudīkṣate tridhā /
SA20asmahsbu:2678: tato 'sya tatkarma viśuddhipāragaṃ bhavaty anantaṃ tadupāyasaṃgrahāt //
SA20asmahsbu:2679: anena ślokena caturthena viśuddhyupāyaṃ karmaṇo darśayati /
SA20asmahsbu:2686: AMsa_16.1 sāṃkhyātha tallakṣaṇam ānupūrvī niruktir abhyāsaguṇaś ca tāsāṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:2687: prabhedanaṃ saṃgrahaṇaṃ vipakṣo jñeyo guṇo 'nyonyaviniścayaś ca //
SA20asmahsbu:2697: tathā hi tadāsevanād āyatyād bahujanasupriyo bhavati /
SA20asmahsbu:2701: ity abhyudayaḥ tatra cāsaṃkleśamaviparītakṛtyārambhaṃ cādhikṛtya ṣaṭ pāramitā vyavasthitāḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:2705: satvārtheṣu samyakprayukto bodhisatvas tisṛbhir dānaśīlakṣāntipāramitābhir yathākramaṃ tyāgenānupaghātenāupaghātamarṣaṇena ca satvārthaṃ kurute /
SA20asmahsbu:2706: tisṛbhiḥ sanidānatayā cittasthityā vimuktyā ca sarvaprakāram ātmārthaṃ carati /
SA20asmahsbu:2707: vīryaṃ niśritya yathākramaṃ dhyānaprajñābhyāsamāhitasya cittasya samavadhānāt samāhitasya mocanāt /
SA20asmahsbu:2708: iti parārtham ātmārthaṃ cārabhya ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:2719: AMsa_16.5 bhogeṣu cānabhiratis tīvrā gurutādvaye akhedaś ca /
SA20asmahsbu:2720: yogaś ca nirvikalpaḥ samas tam idam uttamaṃ yānaṃ //
SA20asmahsbu:2724: kṣāntyā vīryeṇa cākhedo dvaye yathākramaṃ duḥkhe ca satvāsatvakṛte kuśalaprayoge ca /
SA20asmahsbu:2730: tatra dānaṃ viṣayeṣv asaktimārgas tyāgābhyāsena tatsaktivigamāt /
SA20asmahsbu:2731: śīlaṃ tadāptivikṣepasaṃyameṣu bhikṣusaṃvarasthasya viṣayāprāptaye sarvakarmāntavikṣepāṇām apravṛtteḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:2734: dhyānaṃ prajñā cāvaraṇaviśodhaneṣu mārgas tābhyāṃ kleśajñeyāvaraṇaviśodhanāt /
SA20asmahsbu:2737: AMsa_16.7 śikṣātrayam adhikṛtya ca ṣaḍ pāramitā jinaiḥ samākhyātāḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:2738: ādyā tisro dvedhā antyadvayatas tisṛṣv ekā //
SA20asmahsbu:2740: tatrādyā adhiśīlaṃ śikṣā tisraḥ pāramitāḥ sasaṃbhārasaparivāragrahaṇāt /
SA20asmahsbu:2741: dānena hi bhoganirapekṣaḥ śīlaṃ samādatte samāttaṃ ca kṣāntyā rakṣaty ākruṣṭāpratyākrośanādibhiḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:2742: dvidhety adhicittam adhiprajñaṃ ca śikṣā sā antena dvayena saṃgṛhītā yathākramaṃ dhyānena prajñayā ca /
SA20asmahsbu:2743: tisṛṣv api śikṣāsv ekā vīryapāramitā veditavyā /
SA20asmahsbu:2746: AMsa_16.8 dānaṃ vipakṣahīnaṃ jñānena gataṃ ca nirvikalpena /
SA20asmahsbu:2750: nirvikalpajñānasahagataṃ dharmanairātmyaprativedhayogāt sarvecchāparipūrakaṃ yo yad icchati tasmai tasya dānāt /
SA20asmahsbu:2751: satvaparipācakaṃ tredhā dānena satvān saṃgṛhya triṣu yāneṣu yathābhavyaniyojanāt /
SA20asmahsbu:2752: AMsa_16.9 śīlaṃ vipakṣahīnaṃ jñānena gataṃ ca nirvikalpena /
SA20asmahsbu:2754: AMsa_16.10 kṣāntirvipakṣahīnā jñānena gatā ca nirvikalpena /
SA20asmahsbu:2757: AMsa_16.11 vīryaṃ vipakṣahīnaṃ jñānena gataṃ ca nivikalpena /
SA20asmahsbu:2759: AMsa_16.12 dhyānaṃ vipakṣahīnaṃ jñānena gataṃ ca nirvikalpena /
SA20asmahsbu:2761: AMsa_16.13 prajñā vipakṣahīnā jñānena gatā ca nirvikalpena /
SA20asmahsbu:2763: yathā dānalakṣaṇaṃ caturvidham evaṃ śīlādīnāṃ veditavyaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:2764: eṣāṃ tu vipakṣā dauḥśīlyaṃ krodhaḥ kauśīdyaṃ vikṣepo dauṣprajñyaṃ yathākramaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:2766: satvaparipācakatvaṃ śīlādibhir āvarjya triṣu yāneṣu paripācanāt /
SA20asmahsbu:2770: tribhiḥ kāraṇais teṣāṃ dānādīnāṃ krameṇa nirdeśaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:2772: bhoganirapekṣo hi śīlaṃ samātte śīlavān kṣamo bhavati kṣamāvān vīryam ārabhate ārabdhavīryaḥ samādhim utpādayati samāhitacitto yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
SA20asmahsbu:2774: hīnaṃ hi dānam utkṛṣṭaṃ śīlam evaṃ yāvad dhīnaṃ dhyānam utkṛṣṭā prajñeti /
SA20asmahsbu:2776: audārikaṃ hi dānaṃ supraveśatvāt sukaratvāc ca /
SA20asmahsbu:2777: sūkṣmaṃ śīlaṃ tato duṣpraveśatvād duṣkaratvāc ca /
SA20asmahsbu:2778: evaṃ yāvad audārikaṃ dhyānaṃ sūkṣmā prajñeti /
SA20asmahsbu:2780: AMsa_16.15 dāridyasyāpanayāc chaityasya ca lambhanāt kṣayāt kruddheḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:2783: śaityaṃ lambhayatīti śīlaṃ tadvato viṣayanimittakleśaparidāhābhāvāt kṣayaḥ kruddher iti kṣāntis tayā krodhakṣayāt /
SA20asmahsbu:2789: upāyaṃ ca vibhutvaṃ ca sarvāsām eva kathyate //
SA20asmahsbu:2792: tatropadhisaṃniśritā caturākārā hetusaṃniśritā yo gotrabalena pāramitāsu pratipattyabhyāsaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:2802: atṛptāśayena vipulāśayena muditā--āśayena upakārāśayena nirlepāśayena kalyāṇāśayena ca /
SA20asmahsbu:2803: tatra bodhisatvasya dāne 'tṛptāśayo yad bodhisatva ekasatvasyaikakṣaṇe gaṃgānadīvālukāsamān lokadhātūn saptaratnaparipūrṇān kṛtvā pratipādayet /
SA20asmahsbu:2805: evaṃ ca pratikṣaṇaṃ gaṃgānadīvālikāsamān kalpān pratipādayet /
SA20asmahsbu:2806: yathā caikasya satvasyaivaṃ yāvān satvadhātur anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau paripācayitavyas tam anena paryāyeṇa pratipādayet /
SA20asmahsbu:2809: na ca bodhisatva evaṃrūpāṃ dānaparaṃparāṃ kṣaṇamātram api hāpayati /
SA20asmahsbu:2811: ya evaṃrūpa āśayo 'yaṃ bodhisatvasya dāne vipulāśaya iti /
SA20asmahsbu:2812: muditataraś ca bodhisatvo bhavati tān satvān dānena tathānugṛhṇan /
SA20asmahsbu:2813: na tv eva te satvās tena dānenānugṛhyamāṇā iti /
SA20asmahsbu:2814: ya evaṃrūpa āśayo 'yaṃ bodhisatvasya dāne muditāśayaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:2815: upakārakatarāṃś ca sa bodhisatvas tān satvān ātmanaḥ samanupaśyati /
SA20asmahsbu:2819: na ca bodhisatvaḥ satveṣu tathā vipulam api dānamayaṃ puṇyam abhisaṃskṛtya pratikāreṇa vā artho bhavati vipākena vā iti /
SA20asmahsbu:2820: ya evaṃrūpa āśayo 'yaṃ bodhisatvasya dānapāramitābhāvanāyāṃ nirlepāśayaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:2821: yadbodhisatvas tathā vipulasyāpi [Msa_103] dānaskandhasya vipākam satveṣv abhinandati nātmanaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:2822: sarvasatvasādhāraṇaṃ ca kṛtvānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayati iti /
SA20asmahsbu:2823: ya evaṃrūpa āśayo 'yaṃ bodhisatvasya dānapāramitābhāvanāyāṃ kalyāṇāśayaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:2824: tatra bodhisatvasya śīlapāramitābhāvanāyāṃ yāvat prajñāpāramitābhāvanāyām atṛptāśayaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:2825_2: īryāpathaṃ kalpayann ekaṃ śīlapāramitākṣaṇaṃ yāvat prajñāpāramitākṣaṇaṃ bhāvayed
SA20asmahsbu:2825_3: etena paryāyeṇa yāvāṃś chīlaskandho yāvān ca prajñāsakandho yenānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim
SA20asmahsbu:2825_4: abhisaṃbudhyate śīlaskandhaṃ yāvat prajñāskandhaṃ bhāvayed atṛpta eva bodhisatvasya
SA20asmahsbu:2825_5: śīlapāramitābhāvanāyām āśayo yāvat prajñāpāramitābhāvanāyām āśaya iti /
SA20asmahsbu:2826: ya evaṃrūpa āśayo 'yaṃ bodhisatvasya śīlapāramitābhāvanāyām atṛptāśayo yāvat prajñāpāramitābhāvanāyām āśayaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:2827: yadbodhisatvāstāṃ śīlapāramitābhāvanāparaṃparāṃ yāvat prajñāpāramitābhāvanā paraṃparāmā bodhimaṇḍaniṣadanān na sraṃsayati na vicchinatti iti /
SA20asmahsbu:2828: ya evaṃrūpa āśayo 'yaṃ bodhisatvasya śīlapāramitābhāvanāyāṃ yāvat prajñāpāramitābhāvanāyāṃ vipulāśayaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:2829: muditataraś ca bodhisatvo bhavati tayā śīlapāramitābhāvanayā yāvat prajñāpāramitābhāvanayā satvānanugṛhlan /
SA20asmahsbu:2830: na tv eva te satvā anugṛhyamāṇā iti /
SA20asmahsbu:2831: ya evaṃrūpa āśyo 'yaṃ bodhisatvasya śīlapāramitābhāvanāyāṃ yāvat prajñāpāramitābhāvanāyāṃ muditāśayaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:2833: yeṣāṃ tathā śīlapāramitābhāvanayā yāvat prajñāpāramitābhāvanayā upakaroti nātmānaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:2835: ya evaṃrūpa āśayo 'yaṃ bodhisatvasya śīlapāramitābhāvanāyāṃ yāvat prajñāpāramitābhāvanāyām upakārāśayaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:2836: na ca bodhisatvastathā vipulam api śīlapāramitābhāvanāmayaṃ yāvat prajñāpāramitābhāvanāmayaṃ puṇyam abhisaṃskṛtya pratikāreṇa vārtho bhavati vipākena vā iti /
SA20asmahsbu:2837: ya evaṃrūpa āśayo 'yaṃ bodhisatvasya śīlapāramitābhāvanāyāṃ yāvat prajñāpāramitābhāvanāyāṃ nirlepāśayaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:2838: tatra yad bodhisatva evaṃ śīlapāramitābhāvanāmayasya yāvat prajñāpāramitābhāvanāmayapuṇyaskandhasya vipākaṃ satveṣv evābhinandati nātmanaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:2840: ya evaṃrūpa āśayo 'yaṃ bodhisatvasya śīlapāramitābhāvanāyāṃ yāvat prajñāpāramitābhāvanāyāṃ kalyāṇāśayaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:2843: tathā hi sa upāyaḥ sarvamanasikārāṇām abhiniṣpattaye /
SA20asmahsbu:2848: tatra kāyavibhutvaṃ [Msa_104] tathāgate dvau kāyau draṣṭavyau svābhāvikaḥ sāṃbhogikaś ca /
SA20asmahsbu:2850: yena sarvākārāṃ sarvasatvānāṃ sahadhārmikacaryāṃ darśayati / deśanāvibhutvaṃ
SA20asmahsbu:2872: ṣaḍaṅgīti śīlavān viharati yāvat samādāya śikṣate śikṣāpadeṣv iti /
SA20asmahsbu:2883: saṃketadharmatālabdhaṃ saṃvarastheṣu vidyata iti vṛttis tatra saṃketalabdhaṃ prātimokṣasaṃvarasaṃgṛhītaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:2884: dharmatāpratilabdhaṃ dhyānānāsravasaṃvarasaṃgṛhītam eṣāsya prabhedavṛttiḥ trividhena prabhedena vartanāt /
SA20asmahsbu:2888: pañcānuśaṃsam ākhyātaṃ dvayor arthakaraṃ ca tat //
SA20asmahsbu:2889: AMsa_16.22 tapaḥ prābalyasaṃyuktaṃ teṣu tattrividhaṃ mataṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:2904: kāyasya na bhedāt sugatau svargaloke deveṣūpapadyate iti /
SA20asmahsbu:2905: dvayor arthakaraṃ ca tad iti marṣādhivāsanam ity adhikṛtaṃ idaṃ karma / yathoktaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:2906: dvayor arthaṃ sa kurūte ātmanaś ca parasya ca /
SA20asmahsbu:2907: yaḥ paraṃ kupitaṃ jñātvā svayaṃ tatropaśāmyati // iti //
SA20asmahsbu:2911: teṣu tad ity ādhāravṛttiḥ kṣamiṣu tadvṛtteḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:2912: trividhaṃ matam iti prabhedavṛttis trividhakṣāntiprabhedena yathoktaṃ prāk /
SA20asmahsbu:2916: AMsa_16.24 alobhādiguṇopetas teṣu saptavidhaś ca saḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:2919: kuśala iti tadanyakṛtyotsāhavyudāsātha samyag ity anyatīrthikamokṣārthotsāhavyudāsārthaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:2920: śraddhāc chandapratiṣṭhita iti hetuḥ śraddadhāno hy atīva vīryam ārabhati /
SA20asmahsbu:2924: yathoktaṃ ārabdhavīryas tu sukhaṃ viharaty avyavakīrṇaḥ pāpakair akuśalair dharmair iti /
SA20asmahsbu:2928: sa punar adhiśīlādiśikṣātraye kāyikaṃ cetasikaṃ ca sātatyena satkṛtya ca yad vīryaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:2932: AMsa_16.26 dharmāṇāṃ pramukhaṃ teṣu vidyate trividhaś ca saḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:2944: teṣu vidyata iti dhyāyiṣv iyam ādhāravṛttiḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:2945: trividhaś ca sa iti savitarkaḥ savicāraḥ avitarko vicāramātraḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:2954: AMsa_16.28 dharmāṇām uttaras teṣu vidyate trividhaś ca saḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:2957: samyag iti na mithyā jñeya iti laukikakṛtyasamyakpravicayavyudāsārthaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:2963: prajñājīvasudeśana iti prajñājīvaḥ sudeśanā cāsya karma /
SA20asmahsbu:2969: teṣu vidyate trividhaś ca sa iti vṛttiḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:2974: AMsa_16.29 sarve śuklā dharmā vikṣiptasamāhitobhayā jñeyāḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:2977: tatra vikṣiptā dvābhyāṃ pāramitābhyāṃ saṃgṛhītāḥ prathamābhyāṃ dānasamādānaśīlayor asamāhitatvāt /
SA20asmahsbu:2982: AMsa_16.30 na ca saktaṃ na ca saktaṃ na ca saktaṃ saktam eva na ca dānaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:2983: na ca saktaṃ na ca saktaṃ na ca saktaṃ bodhisatvānām //
SA20asmahsbu:2985: bhogasaktiḥ vilambanaśaktiḥ tanmātrasaṃtuṣṭisaktiḥ pakṣapātasaktiḥ pratikārasaktiḥ vipākasaktiḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:2992: AMsa_16.31 na ca saktaṃ na ca saktaṃ na ca saktaṃ saktam eva na ca śīlaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:2993: na ca saktaṃ na ca saktaṃ na ca saktaṃ bodhisatvānām //
SA20asmahsbu:2994: AMsa_16.32 na ca saktā na ca saktā na ca saktā saktikā na kṣāntiḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:2995: na ca saktā na ca saktā na ca saktā bodhisatvānām //
SA20asmahsbu:2996: AMsa_16.33 na ca saktaṃ na ca saktaṃ na ca saktaṃ saktam eva ca na vīryaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:2997: na ca saktaṃ na ca saktaṃ na ca saktaṃ bodhisatvānām //
SA20asmahsbu:2998: AMsa_16.34 na ca saktaṃ na ca saktaṃ na ca saktaṃ saktam eva na ca dhyānaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:2999: na ca saktaṃ na ca saktaṃ na ca saktaṃ bodhisatvānām //
SA20asmahsbu:3000: AMsa_16.35 na ca saktā na ca saktā na ca saktā saktikā na ca prajñā /
SA20asmahsbu:3001: na ca saktā na ca sakta na ca saktā bodhisatvānām //
SA20asmahsbu:3003: yathā dānāsaktir uktā evaṃ śīle yāvat prajñāyāṃ veditavyā /
SA20asmahsbu:3004: atra tu viśeṣabhogasaktiparivartena dauḥśīlyādyāsaktir veditavyā vipakṣasaktis tadvipakṣānuśayāsamudghātanāt /
SA20asmahsbu:3007: AMsa_16.36 tyaktaṃ buddhasutaiḥ svajīvitam api prāpyārthinaṃ sarvadā kāruṇyāt parato na ca pratikṛtir neṣṭaṃ phalaṃ prārthitaṃ /
