SA20asmahsbu:3008: dānenaiva ca tena sarvajanatā bodhitraye ropitā dānaṃ jñānaparigraheṇa ca punar loke 'jñayaṃ sthāpitam //
SA20asmahsbu:3010: AMsa_16.37 āttaṃ buddhasutair yamodyamamayaṃ śīlatrayaṃ sarvadā svargo nābhimataḥ sametya ca punaḥ saktirna tatrāhitā /
SA20asmahsbu:3011: śīlenaiva ca tena sarvajanatā bodhitraye ropitā śīlaṃ jñānaparigraheṇa ca punar loke 'kṣayaṃ sthāpitam //
SA20asmahsbu:3018: AMsa_16.38 kṣāntaṃ buddhasutaiḥ suduṣkaramatho sarvāpakāraṃ nṛṇāṃ na svargārtham asaśaktimato na ca bhayān naivopakārekṣaṇāt /
SA20asmahsbu:3019: kṣāntyānuttarayā ca sarvajanatā bodhitraye ropitā kṣāntir jñānaparigraheṇa ca punar loke 'kṣayā sthāpitā //
SA20asmahsbu:3020: iti / kṣāntyānuttarayā caiti duḥkhādhivāsanakṣāntyā ca parāpakāramarṣaṇakṣāntyā ca yathākramaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:3021: AMsa_16.39 vīryaṃ buddhasutaiḥ kṛtaṃ nirūpamaṃ saṃnāhayogātmakaṃ hantuṃ kleśagaṇaṃ svato 'pi parataḥ prāptuṃ ca bodhiṃ parāṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:3022: vīryeṇaiva ca tena sarvajanatā bodhitraye ropitā vīryaṃ jñānaparigraheṇa ca punar loke 'kṣayaṃ sthāpitam //
SA20asmahsbu:3025: AMsa_16.40 dhyānaṃ buddhasutaiḥ samādhibahulaṃ saṃpāditaṃ sarvathā śreṣṭhair dhyānasukhair vihṛtya kṛpayā hīnāpapattiḥ śritā /
SA20asmahsbu:3026: dhyānenaiva ca tena sarvajanatā bodhitraye ropitā dhyānaṃ jñānaparigraheṇa ca punar loke 'kṣayaṃ sthāpitam //
SA20asmahsbu:3028: AMsa_16.41 jñātaṃ buddhasutaiḥ satatvam akhilaṃ jñeyaṃ ca yat sarvathā saktir naiva ca nirvṛtau prajanitā buddhaiḥ kutaḥ saṃvṛtau /
SA20asmahsbu:3029: jñānenaiva ca tena sarvajanatā bodhitraye ropitā jñānaṃ satvaparigraheṇa punar loke 'kṣayaṃ sthāpitam //
SA20asmahsbu:3032: jñeyaṃ ca yat sarvathety anantasvasaṃketādilakṣaṇabhedabhinnaṃ yad ajñeyaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:3034: jñānasya punaḥ satvaparigraheṇa karuṇayā satvānām aparityāgāt /
SA20asmahsbu:3035: eṣāṃ punaḥ ṣaṇāṃ ślokānāṃ piṇḍārthaḥ saptamena ślokena nirdiṣṭaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:3037: dānādīnāṃ samas taṃ hi jñeyaṃ guṇacatuṣṭayam //
SA20asmahsbu:3042: caturthenākṣayatā ity eṣāṃ guṇacatuṣṭayam ebhiḥ ślokair veditavyaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:3045: yācanake hi jane dāyakadarśanāt tataś ca yathā-īpsitaṃ labdhvā manorathaparipūraṇādyā tuṣṭir utpadyate /
SA20asmahsbu:3047: āśāstiś ca yā taddarśane manorathaparipūraṇe ca /
SA20asmahsbu:3048: sā bodhisatvasyādhikotpadyate [Msa_110] sarvakālaṃ yācanakadarśanāt tanmanorathaparipūraṇāc ca /
SA20asmahsbu:3050: ato dātā kṛpālus tāṃ sarvam abhibhavaty ādhikyayogāt /
SA20asmahsbu:3051: AMsa_16.44 prāṇān bhogān dārān satveṣu sadānyatyajanakṛpālutvāt /
SA20asmahsbu:3055: AMsa_16.45 nirapekṣaḥ samacitto nirbhīḥ sarvapradaḥ kṛpāhetoḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:3069: bodhisatvaḥ sarvasatveṣu samaṃ hitakāmaḥ sa kathaṃ pareṣāṃ mitrabhedārthaṃ paiśunyaṃ kariṣyatīti /
SA20asmahsbu:3071: paraduḥkhotpādane cātyarthaṃ bhīruḥ sa kathaṃ pareṣāṃ duḥkhotpādanārthaṃ paruṣaṃ vakṣyati /
SA20asmahsbu:3072: satvānāṃ vinaye samyakprayuktaḥ sa kathaṃ saṃbhinnapralāpaṃ kariṣyati tasmād asau suvidūre trividhavāgdoṣāt paiśunyāt pāruṣyāt saṃbhinnapralāpāc ca /
SA20asmahsbu:3073: AMsa_16.47 sarvapradaḥ kṛpāluḥ pratītyadharmodaye sukuśalaś ca /
SA20asmahsbu:3074: adhivāsayet katham asau sarvākāraṃ manaḥ kleśam //
SA20asmahsbu:3077: AMsa_16.48 upakarasaṃjñāmodaṃ hy apakāriṇiparahita saṃjñāṃparahite sadā duḥkhe /
SA20asmahsbu:3078: labhate yadā kṛpāluḥ kṣamitavyaṃ tasya kiṃ na syāt //
SA20asmahsbu:3084: tatra sakṛpe yat parārthaṃ duṣkaracaraṇād vīrthaṃ tadaduṣkaraṃ ca suduṣkaraṃ ca /
SA20asmahsbu:3089: yad evaṃ parasaṃjñāpagataṃ ca svatodhikatarasnehaṃ ca tadvīryaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:3090: AMsa_16.50 alpasukhaṃ hy ātmasukhaṃ līnaṃ parihāṇikaṃ kṣayi samohaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:3093: līnaṃ laukikānāṃ satkāye śrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ ca nirvāṇe /
SA20asmahsbu:3094: parihāṇikaṃ laukikānāṃ kṣayi śrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ nirupadhiśeṣanirvāṇe tatkṣayāt /
SA20asmahsbu:3096: bodhisatvānāṃ punar dhyānaṃ bahusukham ātmaparasukham alīnamaparihāṇikam akṣayyasamohaṃ ca /
SA20asmahsbu:3097: AMsa_16.51 āmoṣais tamasi yathā dīpair nunnaṃ tathā trayajñānaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:3099: yathā hastāmoṣais tamasi jñānaṃ parīttaviṣayamapratyakṣam avyaktaṃ ca tathā pṛthagjanānāṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:3100: yathāvacarake dīpairjñānaṃ prādeśikaṃ pratyakṣaṃ nātinirmalaṃ tathā śrāvakāṇāṃ pratyekabuddhānāṃ ca /
SA20asmahsbu:3101: yathā dinakarakiraṇair jñānaṃ samantāt pratyakṣaṃ sunirmalaṃ ca tathā bodhisatvānāṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:3103: AMsa_16.52 āśrayād vastuto dānaṃ nimittāt pariṇāmanāt /
SA20asmahsbu:3104: hetuto jñānataḥ kṣetrān niśrayāc ca paraṃ matam //
SA20asmahsbu:3112: jñānaṃ nirvikalpaṃ yena trimaṇḍalapariśuddhaṃ dānaṃ dadāti dātṛdeyapratigrāhakāvikalpanāt /
SA20asmahsbu:3114: arthī duḥkhito niḥpratisaraṇo duścaritacārī guṇavāṃś ca /
SA20asmahsbu:3121: samādhir ādir yathā tatraiva vibhutvam uktaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:3124: yaś ca dadāti yac ca yena ca yasmai ca yataś ca yasya ca parigraheṇa yatra ca yāvat prakāraṃ tad dānaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:3125: AMsa_16.53 āśrayād vastutaḥ śīlaṃ nimittāt pariṇāmanāt /
SA20asmahsbu:3126: hetuto jñānataḥ kṣetrān niśrayāc ca paraṃ matam //
SA20asmahsbu:3127: AMsa_16.54 āśrayād vastuto vīryaṃ nimittāt pariṇāmanāt /
SA20asmahsbu:3128: hetuto jñānataḥ kṣetrān niśrayāc ca paraṃ matam //
SA20asmahsbu:3129: AMsa_16.55 āśrayād vastuto dhyānaṃ nimittāt pariṇāmanāt /
SA20asmahsbu:3130: hetuto jñānataḥ kṣetrān niśrayāc ca paraṃ matam //
SA20asmahsbu:3131: AMsa_16.56 āśrayād vastutaḥ prajñā nimittāt pariṇāmanāt /
SA20asmahsbu:3132: hetuto jñānataḥ kṣetrān niśrayāc ca parā matā //
SA20asmahsbu:3141: priyaṃ syād bodhisatvānāṃ prāg eva tadviparyayāt //
SA20asmahsbu:3142: yadi bodhisatvānāṃ dānam ekasyaiva satvasya sukhadaṃ syād ātmanaś ca bahukalpavighātakṛt /
SA20asmahsbu:3143: tathāpi tat teṣāṃ priyaṃ syāt karuṇāviśeṣāt kiṃ punar yad anekasatvasukhaṃ ca bhavatyā tmanaś ca bahukalpānugrahakṛt /
SA20asmahsbu:3144: AMsa_16.58 yad artham icchanti dhanāni dehinas tadeva dhīrā visṛjanti dehiṣu /
SA20asmahsbu:3145: śarīrahetor dhanam iṣyate janais tad eva dhīraiḥ śataśo visṛjyate //
SA20asmahsbu:3148: AMsa_16.59 śarīram evotsṛjato na duḥkhyate yadā manaḥ kā draviṇe 'vare kathā /
SA20asmahsbu:3149: tadasya lokottaram iti yan mudaṃ sa tena tat tasya tad uttaraṃ punaḥ //
SA20asmahsbu:3150: atra śarīram evāutsṛjato yadā mano na duḥkhyate tadasya lokottaram iti saṃdarśitaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:3151: eti yan mudaṃ sa tena duḥkhena tat tasya taduttaram iti tasmāl lokottarād uttaraṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:3152: AMsa_16.60 pratigrahair iṣṭanikāmalabdharna tuṣṭim āyāti tathārthiko 'pi /
SA20asmahsbu:3153: sarvastidānena yatheha dhīmān tuṣṭiṃ vrajaty arthijanasya tuṣṭyā //
SA20asmahsbu:3154: iṣṭanikām alabdhair ity abhipretaparyāptalabdhaiḥ / sarvāstidāneneti yāvat svajīvitadānena /
SA20asmahsbu:3155: AMsa_16.61 saṃpūrṇabhogo na tathāstimantam ātmānam anvīkṣati yācako 'pi /
SA20asmahsbu:3156: sarvastidānād adhano 'pi dhīmān ātmānam anveti yathāstimantaṃ //
SA20asmahsbu:3157: AMsa_16.62 suvipulam api vittaṃ prāpya naivopakāraṃ vigaṇayati tathārthī dāyakāl lābhahetoḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:3158: vidhivad iha sudānair arthinas tarpayitvā mahadupakarasaṃjñāṃ teṣu dhīmān yathaiti //
SA20asmahsbu:3160: AMsa_16.63 svayam apagataśokā dehinaḥ svastharūpā vipulam api gṛhītvā bhuñjate yasya vittaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:3161: pathi paramaphalāḍhyād bhogavṛkṣād yathaiva pravisṛtir atibhogī bodhisatvān na so 'nyaḥ //
SA20asmahsbu:3162: pravisṛtir atibhogaś cāsyeti pravisṛtir atibhogī sa ca nānyo bodhisatvād veditavyaḥ / śeṣaṃ gatārthaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:3173: AMsa_16.65 vīryaṃ paraṃ śuklagaṇasya madhye tanniśritas tasya yato 'nulābhaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:3174: vīryeṇa sadyaḥ susukho vihāro lokottarā lokagatāṃ ca siddhiḥ //
SA20asmahsbu:3175: vīryaṃ paraṃ śuklagaṇasya madhye iti sarvaśuklagaṇasya madhye iti sarvakuśaladharmaprādhānyaṃ vīryasya nirdiṣṭaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:3178: vīryeṇa sadyaḥ susukho vihāro lokottarā lokagatā ca siddhir iti karma nirdiṣṭaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:3180: sarvā ca lokottarā siddhir laukikī ca kriyate /
SA20asmahsbu:3181: AMsa_16.66 vīryāvad avāptaṃ bhavabhogam iṣṭaṃ vīryeṇa śuddhiṃ prabalām upetāḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:3182: vīryeṇa satkāyam atītya muktā vīryeṇa bodhiṃ paramāṃ vibuddhāḥ //
SA20asmahsbu:3187: AMsa_16.67 punar mataṃ hānivivṛddhivīryaṃ mokṣādhipaṃ pakṣavipakṣam anyat /
SA20asmahsbu:3188: tattve praviṣṭaṃ parivartakaṃ ca vīryaṃ mahārthaṃ ca niruktam anyat //
SA20asmahsbu:3189: AMsa_16.68 saṃnāhavīryaṃ prathamaṃ tataś ca prayogavīryaṃ vidhivatprahitaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:3190: alīnam akṣobhyam atuṣṭivīryaṃ sarvaprakāraṃ pravadanti buddhāḥ //
SA20asmahsbu:3192: tatra hānivivṛddhivīryaṃ samyakprahāṇeṣu ca dvayoḥ kuśaladharmābhivṛddhaye /
SA20asmahsbu:3205: sthāmavān vīryavānutsāhī dṛḍhaparākramo anikṣiptadhuraḥ kuśaleṣu dharmeṣv ity ucyate yathākramaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:3209: yānatraye prayukto yo janas tadāśrayeṇa yathākramaṃ nikṛṣṭamadhyottamaṃ vīryaṃ veditavyaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:3212: līno hi buddhyāśayo yānadvaye prayuktānāṃ kevalātmārthādhikārāt /
SA20asmahsbu:3214: ata eva yathākramaṃ vīryaṃ ta dalpārthaṃ mahārtham iva svārthādhikārāc ca /
SA20asmahsbu:3215: AMsa_16.70 na vīryavān bhogaparājito 'sti no vīryavān kleśaparājito 'sti /
SA20asmahsbu:3216: na vīryavān khedaparājito 'sti no vīryavān prāptiparājito 'sti //
SA20asmahsbu:3218: caturvidho dānādīnāṃ vibandho yena dānādiṣu na pravartate /
SA20asmahsbu:3225: AMsa_16.71 anyonyaṃ saṃgrahataḥ prabhedato dharmato nimittāc ca /
SA20asmahsbu:3228: abhayapradānena śīlakṣāntisaṃgraho yasmāt tābhyām abhayaṃ dadāti /
SA20asmahsbu:3229: dharmadānena dhyānaprajñayor yasmāt tābhyāṃ dharmaṃ dadāti /
SA20asmahsbu:3234: dānaṃ ṣaḍvidhaṃ dānadānaṃ śīladānaṃ yāvat prajñādānaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:3237: ye sūtrādayo yeṣu dānādiṣv artheṣu saṃdṛśyante /
SA20asmahsbu:3238: ye ca dānādayo yeṣu sūtrādiṣu dharmeṣu saṃdṛśyante /
SA20asmahsbu:3243: śīlam api dānādīnāṃ bhikṣusaṃvarasamādānaṃ sarvasvaparigrahatyāgāc chīlapratiṣṭhitasya ca kṣāntyādiyogāt /
SA20asmahsbu:3249: AMsa_16.72 dānaṃ samaṃ priyākhyānam arthacaryā samārthatā /
SA20asmahsbu:3251: dānaṃ samam iṣyate yathā pāramitāsu priyākhyānaṃ taddeśanā /
SA20asmahsbu:3253: tac chabdena pāramitānāṃ grahaṇāt pāramitādeśanā pāramitāsamādāpanety arthaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:3254: samānārthatā yatra paraṃ samādāpayati tatra svayam anuvṛttiḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:3255: kim arthaṃ punar etāni catvāri saṃgrahavastūnīṣyante / eṣa hi pareṣāṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:3265: yathāvāditathākāriṇaṃ hi samādāpakaṃ viditvā yatra kuśale tena pravartitāḥ pare bhavanti tad anuvartante /
SA20asmahsbu:3275: yad apy anyat saṃgrahavastudvayam uktaṃ bhagavatā āmiṣasaṃgraho dharmasaṃgrahaś ca /
SA20asmahsbu:3276: tābhyām etāny eva [Msa_117] catvāri saṃgrahavastūni saṃgṛhītāni /
SA20asmahsbu:3281: AMsa_16.76 hīnamadhyottamaḥ prāyo vandhyo 'vandhyaś ca saṃgrahaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:3282: abandhyaḥ sarvathā caiva jñeyo hy ākārabhedataḥ //
SA20asmahsbu:3284: tatra hīnamadhyottamaḥ saṃgraho bodhisatvānāṃ yānatrayaprayukteṣu veditavyo yathākramaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:3287: avandhyaḥ sarvathā aṣṭamyādiṣu bhūbhiṣu satvārthasyāvaśyaṃ saṃpādanāt /
SA20asmahsbu:3290: ye kecit parṣatkarṣaṇe prayuktāḥ sarvais tair ayam evopāyaḥ samāśrito yaduta catvāri saṃgrahavastūni /
SA20asmahsbu:3291: tathā hi sarvārthasiddhaye sarveṣāṃ sukhaś caiṣa upāyaḥ praśasyate buddhaiḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:3292: AMsa_16.78 saṃgṛhītā grahīṣyante saṃgṛhyante ca ye 'dhunā /
SA20asmahsbu:3293: sarve ta evaṃ tasmāc ca vartma tat satvapācane //
SA20asmahsbu:3294: etena lokatraye 'pi sarvasatvānāṃ paripācane caturṇāṃ saṃgrahavastūnām ekāyanamārgatvaṃ darśayati / anyamārgābhāvāt /
SA20asmahsbu:3295: AMsa_16.79 iti satatam asaktabhogabuddhiḥ śamayamanodyamapāragaḥ sthitātmā /
SA20asmahsbu:3297: etena yathoktāsu ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu sthitasya bodhisatvasya saṃgrahavastuprayoga darśayati svaparārthasaṃpādanāt pāramitābhiḥ saṃgrahavastubhiś ca yathākramaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:3303: AMsa_17.1 saṃmukhaṃ vimukhaṃ pūjā buddhānāṃ cīvarādibhiḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:3312: AMsa_17.5 āśrayād vastutaḥ pūjā nimittāt pariṇāmanāt /
SA20asmahsbu:3313: hetuto jñānataḥ kṣetrān niśrayāc ca pradarśitā //
SA20asmahsbu:3324: tathoktaiś cādhimuktyādibhir yad uta mahāyānadharmādhimuktaḥ bodhicittotpādataḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:3325: praṇidhānam eva hi nidhānam atroktaṃ ślokavattvānurodhāt /
SA20asmahsbu:3334: tathā tv ato mahābodhiprāpter ity ayaṃ pūjāyāḥ prakārabhedaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:3335: AMsa_17.6 hetutaḥ phalataś caiva ātmanā ca parair api /
SA20asmahsbu:3336: lābhasatkārataś caiva pratipatter dvidhā ca sā //
SA20asmahsbu:3338: AMsa_17.7 parīttā mahatī pūjā samānāmānikā ca sā /
SA20asmahsbu:3339: prayogād gatitaś caiva praṇidhānāc ca sā matā //
SA20asmahsbu:3341: tatrātītā hetuḥ pratyutpannā phalaṃ pratyutpannā hetur anāgatā phalam ity evaṃ hetuphalato 'tītānāgatapratyutpannā veditavyā /
SA20asmahsbu:3346: punaḥ samānā hīnā nirmānā praṇītā trimaṇḍalāvikalpanāt /
SA20asmahsbu:3351: punar yāṃ pūjām āyatyāṃ prayojayituṃ praṇidadhāti sā dūre yāṃ praṇihitaḥ kartuṃ sāntike /
SA20asmahsbu:3352: katamā punar buddhapūjā paramā veditavyety āha /
SA20asmahsbu:3353: AMsa_17.8 tatrātītā hetuḥ pratyutpannā phalaṃ pratyutpannā hetur anāgatā phalam ity evaṃ hetuphalato 'tītānāgatapratyutpannā veditavyā /
SA20asmahsbu:3358: punaḥ samānā hīnā nirmānā praṇītā trimaṇḍalāvikalpanāt /
SA20asmahsbu:3363: punar yāṃ pūjām āyatyāṃ prayojayituṃ praṇidadhāti sā dūre yāṃ praṇihitaḥ kartuṃ sāntike /
SA20asmahsbu:3364: katamā punar buddhapūjā paramā veditavyety āha /
SA20asmahsbu:3365: buddheṣu pūjā paramā svacittāt dharmādhimuktyāśayato vibhutvāt /
SA20asmahsbu:3367: ity ebhiḥ pañcabhir ākāraiḥ svacittapūjā buddheṣu paramā veditavyā /
SA20asmahsbu:3371: atṛptavipulam uditopakaranirlepakalyāṇāśayaiś ca ye pāramitābhāvanāyāṃ nirdiṣṭāḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:3377: AMsa_17.9 āśrayād vastutaḥ sevā nimittāt pariṇāmanāt /
SA20asmahsbu:3378: hetuto jñānataḥ kṣetrān niśrayāc ca pradarśitā //
SA20asmahsbu:3379: AMsa_17.10 mitraṃ śrayed dāntaśamopaśāntaṃ guṇādhikaṃ sodyamam āgamāḍhyaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:3380: prabuddhatatvaṃ vacas ābhyupetaṃ kṛpātmakaṃ khedavivarjitaṃ ca //
SA20asmahsbu:3385: guṇair adhikaṃ na samaṃ vā nyūnaṃ vā /
SA20asmahsbu:3392: satkāralābhaiḥ paricaryayā ca seveta mitraṃ pratipattitaś ca /
SA20asmahsbu:3394: AMsa_17.11 dharme tathājñāśaya eva dhīmān mitraṃ pragacchet samaye nataś ca //
SA20asmahsbu:3395: iti trividhaṃ nimittaṃ / ājñātukāmatā / kālajñatā / nirmānatā ca /
SA20asmahsbu:3396: satkāralābheṣu gataspṛho 'sau prapattaye taṃ pariṇāmayec ca /
SA20asmahsbu:3397: iti pariṇāmanā pratipattyarthaṃ sevanān na lābhasatkārārthaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:3398: AMsa_17.12 yathānuśiṣṭapratipattitaś ca saṃrādhayec cittam ato 'sya dhīraḥ //
SA20asmahsbu:3400: yānatraye kauśalam etya buddhyā svasyaiva yānasya yateta siddhau /
SA20asmahsbu:3402: AMsa_17.13 satvān ameyān paripācanāya kṣetrasya śuddhasya ca sādhanāya //
SA20asmahsbu:3404: aprameyāś ca satvāḥ pariśuddhaṃ ca buddhakṣetraṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:3407: dharmeṣu dāyād aguṇena yukto naivāmiṣeṇa pravesat sa mitram /
SA20asmahsbu:3408: iti niśrayaḥ sevāyāḥ / dharmadāyādatāṃ niśritya kalyāṇamitraṃ seveta / nāmiṣadāyādatāṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:3409: ata ūrdhvamadhyardhena ślokena prakārabhedaḥ sevāyā veditavyaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:3410: AMsa_17.14 hetoḥ phalād dharmamukhānuyānāt seveta mitraṃ bahitaś ca dhīmān //
SA20asmahsbu:3412: hetoḥ phalād ity atītādibhedataḥ pūrvavat dharmamukhānuyānāt seveta mitraṃ [Msa_121] bahitaś ca dhīmān ity ādhyātmikabāhyabhedaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:3413: dharmamukhasroto hi dharmamukhānuyānaṃ bahirdhā bahitaḥ śrutaśravāc cetasi yogataś cety audārikasūkṣmabhedaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:3417: AMsa_17.15 gatiprayogapraṇidhānataś ca kalyāṇamitraṃ hi bhajet dhīmān //
SA20asmahsbu:3419: katamā punaḥ paramā seveti saptamaḥ ślokaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:3420: AMsa_17.16 sanmitrasevā paramā svacittād dharmādhimuktyāśayato vibhutvaiḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:3423: AMsa_17.17 brāhmā vipakṣahīnā jñānena gatāś ca nirvikalpena /
SA20asmahsbu:3435: punaḥ katamasmin satvanikāye dharme vā pravartante /
SA20asmahsbu:3437: AMsa_17.18 saukhyārthini duḥkhārte sukhite kliṣṭe ca te pravartante /
SA20asmahsbu:3438: taddeśite ca dharme tat tathatāyāṃ ca dhīrāṇām //
SA20asmahsbu:3439: satvālambanāḥ sukhārthini yāvat kliṣṭe satvanikāye pravartante /
SA20asmahsbu:3447: te hy avikalpatvād anālambanā ivety anālambanāḥ / api khalu /
SA20asmahsbu:3448: AMsa_17.19 tasyāś ca tathatārthatvāt kṣāntilābhād viśuddhitaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:3451: ebhiś caturbhiḥ kāraṇair anālambanā maitrī veditavyā /
SA20asmahsbu:3459: manomayānāṃ granthānāṃ prahāṇād ucchidyate ālambanam iti vacanāt /
SA20asmahsbu:3460: te niścalāś ca calāś ca kṛpaṇair āsvāditā na ca jñeyāḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:3461: te ca brāhmyā vihārāś caturvidhā veditavyāḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:3470: hīnāśayāḥ samānā hīnās te hy anyathā tv adhikāḥ //
SA20asmahsbu:3478: ye 'nutpattikadharmakṣāntirahitā hīnās te mṛdukā ity arthaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:3479: anyathā tv adhikā iti yathoktaviparyayeṇādhimātratā veditavyā /
SA20asmahsbu:3480: AMsa_17.22 brāhmyair vihṛtavihāraḥ kāmiṣu saṃjāyate yadā dhīmān /
SA20asmahsbu:3481: saṃbhārān pūrayate satvāṃś ca vipācayati tena //
SA20asmahsbu:3482: AMsa_17.23 sarvatra cāvirahito brāhmyai rahitaś ca tadvipakṣeṇa /
SA20asmahsbu:3483: tatpratyayair api bhṛśair na yāti vikṛtiṃ pramatto 'pi //
SA20asmahsbu:3485: tatra brāhmyair vihṛto vihārair iti hetuḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:3489: sarvatra cāvirahito brāhmyair vihārair jāyata iti niṣpandaphalaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:3490: rahitaś ca tadvipakṣeṇeti visaṃyogaphalaṃ bhṛśair api tatpratyayair avikṛtigamanaṃ liṅgaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:3494: yukto hi bodhisatvo bahuvidham ādīnavaṃ spṛśati //
SA20asmahsbu:3500: AMsa_17.25 kleśair hantyātmānaṃ satvān upahanti śīlam upahanti /
SA20asmahsbu:3502: AMsa_17.26 sādhikaraṇo 'śayasvī paratra saṃjāyate 'kṣaṇeṣu sa ca /
SA20asmahsbu:3504: tatra prathamais tribhiḥ padair ātmavyābādhāya cetayate paravyābādhāyobhayavyābādhāyety etam ādīnavaṃ darśayati /
SA20asmahsbu:3505: savilekhādibhiḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ padair dṛṣṭadhārmikam avadyaṃ prasavatīti darśayati /
SA20asmahsbu:3510: digvidikṣu cāsya pāpako 'varṇaśabdaśloko niścaratīty evaṃ savilekho yāvad ayaśas vīty anena yathākramaṃ darśayati /
SA20asmahsbu:3511: śeṣais tribhiḥ padair yathākramaṃ sāṃparāyikaṃ dṛṣṭadharmasāṃparāyikam avadyaṃ prasavati /
SA20asmahsbu:3512: tajjaṃ caitasikaṃ duḥkhadaurmanasyaṃ pratisaṃvedayata ity etad ādīnavaṃ darśayati /
SA20asmahsbu:3513: AMsa_17.27 ete sarve doṣā maitryādiṣu susthitasya na bhavanti /
SA20asmahsbu:3514: akliṣṭaḥ saṃsāraṃ satvārthaṃ no ca saṃtyajati //
SA20asmahsbu:3518: AMsa_17.28 na tathaikaputrakeṣv api guṇavatsv api bhavati sarvasatvānāṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:3521: ity ete ca bodhisatvamaitrādīnāṃ tīvratāṃ darśayati /
SA20asmahsbu:3528: śatruvaśagā mārakṛtāntarāyāḥ kuśale 'prayuktāḥ duḥkhākrāntāḥ duḥkhābhūtā narakādiṣu /
SA20asmahsbu:3541: ity ete daśavidhāḥ satvā bodhisatvakaruṇāyā ālambanaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:3543: AMsa_17.31 heṭhāpahaṃ hy uttamabodhibījaṃ sukhāvahaṃ tāyapakam iṣṭahetuṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:3544: svabhāvadaṃ dharmam upāśritasya bodhir na dūre jinātmajasya //
SA20asmahsbu:3550: evaṃ pañcavidhāṃ karuṇām āśritya buddhatvam adūre veditavyaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:3552: AMsa_17.32 vijñāya saṃsāragataṃ samagraṃ duḥkhātmakaṃ caiva nirātmakaṃ ca /
SA20asmahsbu:3553: nodvegam āyāti na cāpi doṣaiḥ prabādhyate kāruṇiko 'grabuddhiḥ //
SA20asmahsbu:3554: sarvaṃ saṃsāraṃ yathābhūtaṃ parijñāya bodhisatvo nodvegam āyāti kāruṇikatvāt /
SA20asmahsbu:3556: evaṃ nirvāṇe pratiṣṭhito bhavati na saṃsāre yathākramaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:3558: AMsa_17.33 duḥkhātmakaṃ lokam avekṣamāṇo duḥkhāyate vetti ca tadyathāvat /
SA20asmahsbu:3559: tasyābhyupāyaṃ parivarjane ca na khedam āyaty api vā kṛpāluḥ //
SA20asmahsbu:3561: vetti ca tad yathāvad iti duḥkhaṃ yathābhūtaṃ tasya ca duḥkhasya parivarjane 'bhyupāyaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:3563: etena jānann api saṃsāraduḥkhaṃ yathābhūtaṃ tatparityāgopāyaṃ ca na khedam āpadyate bodhisatvaḥ karuṇāviśeṣād iti pradarśayati /
SA20asmahsbu:3565: AMsa_17.34 kṛpā prakṛtyā pratisaṃkhyayā ca pūrvaṃ tadabhyāsavidhānayogāt /
SA20asmahsbu:3572: AMsa_17.35 na sā kṛpā yā na samā sadā vā nādhyāśayād vā pratipattito vā /
SA20asmahsbu:3573: vairāgyato nānupalambhato vā na bodhisatvo hy akṛpas tathā yaḥ //
SA20asmahsbu:3574: tatra samā sukhitādiṣu yatkiṃcid veditam idam atra duḥkhasyeti viditvā /
SA20asmahsbu:3581: AMsa_17.36 karuṇā kṣāntiś cintā praṇidhānaṃ janmasatvaparipākaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:3582: karuṇā tarur eṣa mahān mūlādiḥ puṣpapatraphalaḥ //
SA20asmahsbu:3590: AMsa_17.37 mūlaṃ karuṇā na bhaved duṣkaracaryāsahiṣṇutā na bhavet /
SA20asmahsbu:3591: duḥkhākṣamaś ca dhīmān satvārthaṃ cintayen naiva //
SA20asmahsbu:3593: AMsa_17.38 cintāvihīnabuddhiḥ praṇidhānaṃ śuklajanmasu na kuryāt /
SA20asmahsbu:3595: ābhyāṃ ślokābhyāṃ pūrvottaraprasavasādharmyāt karuṇādīnāṃ mūlādibhāvaṃ sādhayati /
SA20asmahsbu:3596: AMsa_17.39 karuṇāseko maitrī tadduḥkhe saukhyato vipulapuṣṭiḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:3602: tasyāḥ seko maitrī tayā tadāpy āyanāt /
SA20asmahsbu:3604: tataś ca karuṇodbhavaduḥkham utpadyate bodhisatvasya svārthaprayuktasya tatra saukhyotpādād vipulapuṣṭiḥ kṣāntipuṣṭir ity arthaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:3611: ādhyātmikapratyayasiddhitaḥ svasaṃtānaparipākāt puṣpam iva janmābandhyaṃ veditavyaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:3614: AMsa_17.41 kaḥ kurvīta na karuṇāṃ satveṣu mahākṛpāguṇakareṣu /
SA20asmahsbu:3615: duḥkhe 'pi saukhyam atulaṃ bhavati yad eṣāṃ kṛpājanitaṃ //
SA20asmahsbu:3616: atra mahākaruṇāguṇa uttarārdhena saṃdarśitaḥ / śeṣo gatārthaḥ / karuṇāniḥsaṅgatāyāṃ ślokāḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:3617: AMsa_17.42 aviṣṭānāṃ kṛpayā na tiṣṭhati manaḥ śame kṛpālūnāṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:3618: kuta eva lokasaukhye svajīvite vā bhavet snehaḥ //
SA20asmahsbu:3619: sarvasya hi lokasya laukike saukhye svajīvite ca snehaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:3620: tatrāpi ca niḥsnehānāṃ śrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ sarvaduḥkhopaśame nirvāṇe pratiṣṭhitaṃ manaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:3621: bodhisatvānāṃ [Msa_127] tu karuṇāviṣṭatvān nirvāṇe 'pi mano na pratiṣṭhitaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:3624: AMsa_17.43 sneho na vidyate 'sau yo 'niravadyo na laukiko yaś ca /
SA20asmahsbu:3628: bodhisatvānāṃ tu karuṇāmayaḥ sneho niravadyaś ca laukikātikrāntaś ca /
SA20asmahsbu:3629: kathaṃ ca punar niravadya ity āha /
SA20asmahsbu:3630: AMsa_17.44 duḥkhājñānamahāughe mahāndhakāre ca niśritaṃ lokaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:3631: uddhartuṃ ya upāyaḥ katham iva na syāt sa niravadyaḥ //
SA20asmahsbu:3632: duḥkhamahāugha ajñānamahāndhakāre ceti yojyaṃ / śeṣaṃ gatārthaṃ / kathaṃ lokātikrānta ityāha /
SA20asmahsbu:3633: AMsa_17.45 sneho na so 'sty arihatāṃ loke pratyekabodhibuddhānāṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:3634: prāg eva tad anyeṣāṃ katham iva lokottaro na syāt //
SA20asmahsbu:3635: pratyekāṃ bodhiṃ buddhāḥ / śeṣaṃ gatārthaṃ / trāsābhinandananimittatve ślokaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:3636: AMsa_17.46 duḥkhābhāve duḥkhaṃ yatkṛpayā bhavati bodhisatvānāṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:3637: saṃtrāsayati tad ādau spṛṣṭaṃ tv abhinandayati gāḍhaṃ //
SA20asmahsbu:3639: satveṣu karuṇayā bodhisatvānāṃ yad duḥkham utpadyate tadādau saṃtrāsayati adhimukticaryābhūmau /
SA20asmahsbu:3641: spṛṣṭaṃ tu śuddhādhyāśayabhūmāv abhinandayaty evety arthaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:3643: AMsa_17.47 kim ataḥ paramāścaryaṃ yad duḥkhaṃ saukhyam abhibhavati sarva /
SA20asmahsbu:3644: kṛpayā janitaṃ laukyaṃ yena vimukto api kṛtārthaḥ //
SA20asmahsbu:3645: nāsty ata āścaryataraṃ yad duḥkham eva karuṇājanitaṃ bodhisatvānāṃ tathā sukhaṃ [Msa_128] bhavati /
SA20asmahsbu:3647: yena sukhena vimuktā arhanto 'pi kṛtārthāḥ prāg evānye /
SA20asmahsbu:3649: AMsa_17.48 kṛpayā sahitaṃ dānaṃ yad dānasukhaṃ karoti dhīrāṇāṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:3650: traidhātukam upabhogair na tatsukhaṃ tatkalāṃ spṛśati //
SA20asmahsbu:3651: yacca traidhātukaṃ sukham upabhogaiḥ kṛtaṃ na tatsukhaṃ tasya sukhasya kalāṃ spṛśatīty ayam uttarārdhasyārthaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:3654: AMsa_17.49 duḥkhamayaṃ saṃsāraṃ yatkṛpayā na tyajati satvārthaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:3655: parahitahetor duḥkhaṃ kiṃ kārūṇikair na samupetam //
SA20asmahsbu:3659: AMsa_17.50 karūṇā dānaṃ bhogāḥ sadā kṛpālor vivṛddhim upayānti /
SA20asmahsbu:3665: tasmāc ca trayāt phalaṃ trividhaṃ sukhaṃ bhavati /
SA20asmahsbu:3670: AMsa_17.51 vardhe ca vardhayāmi ca dāne paripācayāmi sukhayāmi /
SA20asmahsbu:3681: AMsa_17.52 duḥkhe duḥkhī kṛpayā sukhāny anādhāya kena sukhitaḥ syāt /
SA20asmahsbu:3682: sukhayaty ātmānam ataḥ kṛpālur ādhāya parasaukhyam //
SA20asmahsbu:3683: karuṇayā bodhisatvaḥ paraduḥkhair duḥkhitaḥ satveṣv anādhāya sukhaṃ kathaṃ sukhitaḥ [Msa_129] syāt /
SA20asmahsbu:3684: tasmāt pareṣu sukham ādhāya bodhisatva ātmānam eva sukhayatīti veditavyaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:3686: AMsa_17.53 svaṃ dānaṃ kāruṇikaḥ śāstīva sadaiva niḥsvasukhakāmaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:3687: bhogaiḥ sukhaya paraṃ vā māma py ayutasaukhyam //
SA20asmahsbu:3688: na hi kāruṇikasya vinā parasukhenāsti sukhaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:3689: tasyāyutasaukhyatvād bodhisatvas tena vinā no dānasya phalaṃ sukhaṃ necchati /
SA20asmahsbu:3690: AMsa_17.54 saphalaṃ dānaṃ dattaṃ tan me satveṣu tat sukhasukhena /
SA20asmahsbu:3691: phala teṣv eva nikāmaṃ yadi me kartavyatā te 'sti //
SA20asmahsbu:3692: dānaṃ dadatā dānaṃ ca dānaphalaṃ ca tanmayā satveṣu dattaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:3694: atas teṣv eva yāvat phalitavyaṃ tāvat phaleti loṭ /
SA20asmahsbu:3696: AMsa_17.55 bhoge dveṣṭur dātur bhogā bahuśubhataropasarpanti /
SA20asmahsbu:3697: na hi tatsukhaṃ mataṃ me dāne pāraṃparo 'smi yataḥ //
SA20asmahsbu:3701: na hi tatsukhaṃ mataṃ me yad bhogās tathopatiṣṭhate /
SA20asmahsbu:3702: yasmād ahaṃ dāne pāraṃparas tatprabandhakāmatvān na sukhe /
SA20asmahsbu:3703: AMsa_17.56 sarvastiparityāge yatkṛpayā māṃ nirīkṣase satataṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:3704: nanu te tena jñeyaṃ na matphalenārthitā 'syeti //
SA20asmahsbu:3705: yo 'haṃ dānaphalaṃ sarvam eva karuṇayā nityaṃ parityajāmi nanv ata eva veditavyaṃ nāsti me dānaphalenārthitvam iti bodhisatvo dānaṃ samanuśāsti /
SA20asmahsbu:3706: dānābhirato na syāṃ prāptaṃ cet tatphalaṃ na visṛjeyaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:3708: AMsa_17.57 kṣaṇam api dānena vinā dānābhirato bhavati naiva //
SA20asmahsbu:3710: akṛtaṃ na phalasi yasmāt pratikārāpekṣayā na me tulyaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:3712: yas tvā karoti tasya tvaṃ phalasi / tasmāt tvaṃ pratikārāpekṣayā na mattulyaṃ / tathā hy ahaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:3713: AMsa_17.58 pratikāranirvyapekṣaḥ paratra phalado 'sya kāmaṃ te //
SA20asmahsbu:3715: AMsa_17.59 niravadyaṃ śuddhapadaṃ hitāv ahaṃ caiva sānurakṣaṃ ca /
SA20asmahsbu:3722: nirmṛgyam ayācamāne 'py arthitvaṃ vighātaṃ vāvagamya svayam eva dānāt dakṣiṇīyāparimārgaṇāc ca /
SA20asmahsbu:3724: AMsa_17.60 sakalaṃ vipulaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ satataṃ muditaṃ nirāmiṣaṃ śuddhaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:3736: AMsa_17.61 na tathopabhogatuṣṭiṃ labhate bhogī yathā parityāgāt /
SA20asmahsbu:3738: tatra sukhatrayaṃ dānaprītiḥ parānugrahaprītiḥ bodhisaṃbhārasaṃbharaṇaprītiś ca /
SA20asmahsbu:3741: AMsa_17.62 kṛpaṇakṛpā raudrakṛpā saṃkṣubdhakṛpā kṛpā pramatteṣu /
SA20asmahsbu:3749: eṣu pāramitāvipakṣadharmāvasthiteṣu yā karuṇā sā kṛpaṇādikaruṇā /
SA20asmahsbu:3753: AMsa_17.63 karuṇā bodhisatvānāṃ sukhād duḥkhāt tadanvayāt /
SA20asmahsbu:3756: trividhāṃ vedanām ālambya tisṛbhir duḥkhatābhiḥ karuṇāyanāt /
SA20asmahsbu:3757: aduḥkhāsukhā hi vedanā sukhaduḥkhayor anvayaḥ punas tadāvāhanāt /
SA20asmahsbu:3758: uttarārdhena yathākramaṃ hetumitrasvabhāvaiḥ karuṇāyā hetvadhipatisamanantarapratyayān saṃdarśayati /
SA20asmahsbu:3760: AMsa_17.64 karuṇā bodhisatvānāṃ samā jñeyā tadāśayāt /
SA20asmahsbu:3762: tatra samā trividhavedanāvastheṣu yat kiṃcid veditam idam atra duḥkhasyeti viditvā /
SA20asmahsbu:3773: etena yathoktānāṃ pūjāsevā'pramāṇānām anukramaṃ guṇaṃ ca samāsena saṃdarśayati /
SA20asmahsbu:3774: mahopadhibhir dhruvaṃ satkriyā cātyarthaṃ pūjanān mahadupadhidhruvasatkriyābhipūjī veditavyaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:3784: AMsa_18.1 lajjā vipakṣahīnā jñānena gatā ca nirvikalpena /
SA20asmahsbu:3786: etena svabhāvasahāyālambhanakarmapadā caturvidhaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ bodhisatvalajjāyāḥ saṃdarśayati /
SA20asmahsbu:3792: tasyām eva lajjāpāramitāvipakṣavṛddhyā tatpratipakṣaparihāṇyā cātyarthaṃ lajjotpādanāt /
SA20asmahsbu:3793: AMsa_18.2 ṣaṇṇāṃ pāramitānāṃ niṣevaṇālasyato bhavati lajjā /
SA20asmahsbu:3796: kleśānukuleṣu dharmeṣv indriyāguptadvāratvādiṣu ca prayogena lajjotpādanāt /
SA20asmahsbu:3798: hīnāśayā samānā hīnā hi tadanyathā tv adhikā //
SA20asmahsbu:3801: ataḥ paraṃ caturbhis tribhiś ca ślokair yathākramaṃ lajjāvipakṣe lajjāyāṃ ca doṣaguṇabhedaṃ darśayati /
SA20asmahsbu:3802: AMsa_18.4 lajjārahito dhīmān kleśān adhivāsayaty ayoniśataḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:3805: ity atra ātmavyābādhāya cetayate paravyābadhāyobhayavyābhādhāya cety saṃdarśitaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:3809: AMsa_18.5 kaukṛtyāt savilekho bhavati sa saṃmānahānim āpnoti /
SA20asmahsbu:3813: ity etena dṛṣṭadhārmikam avadyaṃ prasavatīti darśanaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:3819: ity anena dṛṣṭadharmasāṃparāyikam avadyaṃ prasavatīty saṃdarśitam prāptakuśaladharmaparihānitaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:3821: AMsa_18.7 duḥkhaṃ viharati tasmān manaso 'py asvasthatām eti //
SA20asmahsbu:3822: ity etena lajjaṃ caitasikaṃ duḥkhaṃ daurmanasyaṃ pratisaṃvedayata ity saṃdarśitaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:3823: ete sarve doṣā hrīmatsu bhavanti no jinasuteṣu /
SA20asmahsbu:3824: ity ata upādāya lajjāguṇo veditavyaḥ / yad ete ca doṣā na bhavanti /
SA20asmahsbu:3825: AMsa_18.8 deveṣu ca manujeṣu ca nityaṃ saṃjāyate ca budhaḥ //
SA20asmahsbu:3827: saṃbhārāṃś ca sa bodheḥ kṣipraṃ pūrayati lajjayā dhīmān /
SA20asmahsbu:3829: AMsa_18.9 satvānāṃ pācanayā na khidyate caiva jinaputraḥ //
SA20asmahsbu:3832: sa vipakṣapratipakṣai rahito 'rahitaś ca jāyate satataṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:3833: ity ete visaṃyoganiṣpandaphalaṃ / yad uta vipakṣarahitatvaṃ pratipakṣārahitatvaṃ ca /
SA20asmahsbu:3834: AMsa_18.10 ity etam ānuśaṃsaṃ hrīmān āpnoti jinaputraḥ //
SA20asmahsbu:3835: iti yathoktadoṣābhāvaṃ guṇayogaṃ ca prāpnotīti saṃdarśitaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:3836: AMsa_18.11 doṣamalino hi bālo hrīvirahāt suvasanaiḥ sugupto 'pi /
SA20asmahsbu:3841: ākāśam iva na lipto hrīyuktaḥ jinasuto bhavati dharmaiḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:3843: AMsa_18.12 hrībhūṣitaś ca śobhati saṃparkagato jinasutānām //
SA20asmahsbu:3845: mātur iva vatsalatvaṃ hriyo vineyeṣu bodhisatvānāṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:3847: AMsa_18.13 ārakṣā cāpi hrīḥ saṃsaratāṃ sarvadoṣebhyaḥ //
SA20asmahsbu:3849: ebhir vastrādidṛṣṭāntair vihāre kleśapratipakṣatāṃ cāre lokadharmapratipakṣatāṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:3852: AMsa_18.14 sarveṣu nādhivāsā sarveṣv adhivāsanāpravṛttiś ca /
SA20asmahsbu:3853: sarveṣu ca pravṛttir hrīvihitaṃ hrīmato liṅgam //
SA20asmahsbu:3855: etena caturvidhaṃ hrīkṛtaṃ liṅgam hrīmato darśayati /
SA20asmahsbu:3856: yad uta sarvadoṣeṣv anadhivāsanā cāpravṛttiś ca /
SA20asmahsbu:3858: AMsa_18.15 hrībhāvanā pradhānā svacittato dharmato 'dhimokṣāc ca /
SA20asmahsbu:3860: ity asya nirdeśo yathāpūrvaṃ / dhṛtivibhāge sapta ślokāḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:3861: AMsa_18.16 dhṛtiś ca bodhisatvānāṃ lakṣaṇena prabhedataḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:3863: AMsa_18.17 vīryaṃ samādhiḥ prajñā ca satvaṃ dhairyaṃ dhṛtirmatā /
SA20asmahsbu:3864: nirbhīto bodhisatvo hi trayād yasmāt pravartate //
SA20asmahsbu:3869: katamasmāt trayān nirbhītaḥ pravartate ity āha /
SA20asmahsbu:3870: AMsa_18.18 līnatvāc ca calatvāc ca mohāc cotpadyate bhayaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:3871: kṛtyeṣu tasmād vijñeyā dhṛtisaṃjñā nije traye //
SA20asmahsbu:3872: sravakāryeṣu hi līnacittatayā vā bhayam utpadyate tadanutsāhataḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:3876: tasmān nijavīryāditraye dhṛtisaṃjñā veditavyā nija ity apratisaṃkhyānakaraṇīye
SA20asmahsbu:3877: AMsa_18.19 prakṛtyā praṇidhāne ca nirapekṣatva eva ca /
SA20asmahsbu:3881: AMsa_18.21 niḥsaṃkleśe ca tatraiva dhṛtir dhīrasya jāyate /
SA20asmahsbu:3882: asamā ca tadanyebhyaḥ so 'gre dhṛtimatāṃ yataḥ mataḥ //
SA20asmahsbu:3895: śalabhaiḥ pakṣavātaiś ca samudraiś ca sumeruvat //
SA20asmahsbu:3899: AMsa_18.23 akhedo bodhisatvānām asamas triṣu vastuṣu /
SA20asmahsbu:3901: AMsa_18.24 tīvracchando mahābodhāv akhedo dhīmatāṃ mataḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:3902: aniṣpannaś ca niṣpannaḥ suniṣpannaś ca bhūmiṣu //
SA20asmahsbu:3910: tābhyāṃ hi khedotpattito lajjayate na cotpādayati /
SA20asmahsbu:3917: AMsa_18.25 vastunā cādhikāreṇa karmaṇā ca viśiṣyate /
SA20asmahsbu:3922: adhyātmavidyā hetuvidyā śabdavidyā cikitsāvidyā śilpakarmasthānavidyā ca /
SA20asmahsbu:3924: karma prathamavastuni svayaṃ pratipattiḥ parebhyaś ca tatsamākhyānaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:3929: lakṣaṇaṃ śāstrajñatāyā etāny evas pañca vastuni śrutāni bhavanti /
SA20asmahsbu:3941: sā punar eṣā śāstrajñatā bodhisatvānāṃ samādhimukhair dhāraṇīmukhaiś ca saṃgṛhītā /
SA20asmahsbu:3946: AMsa_18.27 kāyena vacasā caiva satyajñānena cāsamā /
SA20asmahsbu:3952: sā punaḥ kim artham ity āha /
SA20asmahsbu:3957: AMsa_18.29 satyadvayād yataś ceṣṭo lokānām udayo 'sakṛt /
SA20asmahsbu:3958: dvayād astaṃgamas tasmāt tajjño lokajña ucyate //
SA20asmahsbu:3959: dvābhyāṃ satyābhyāṃ lokasya udayaḥ punaḥ punaḥ saṃsāro yaś codayo yena ceti kṛtvā /
SA20asmahsbu:3964: AMsa_18.30 śamāya prāptaye teṣāṃ dhīmān satyeṣu yujyate /
SA20asmahsbu:3965: satyajñānād yato dhīmān lokajño hi nirucyate //
SA20asmahsbu:3970: AMsa_18.31 ārṣaś ca deśanādharmo artho 'bhiprāyiko 'sya ca /
SA20asmahsbu:3971: prāmāṇikaś ca nītārtho nirjalpā prāptir asya ca //
SA20asmahsbu:3973: tatra prāmāṇika 'rtho yaḥ pramāṇabhūtena nīto vibhaktaḥ śāstrā vā tatpramāṇīkṛtena vā /
SA20asmahsbu:3978: prathame pratisaraṇe ārṣadharmapratikṣeptuḥ pudgalasya pratiṣedgo deśitaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:3983: AMsa_18.33 adhimukter vicārāc ca yathāvat parataḥ śravāt /
SA20asmahsbu:3984: nirjalpād api ca jñānād apraṇāśo hi dhīmatāṃ //
SA20asmahsbu:3992: paryāye lakṣaṇe vākye jñāne jñānāc ca tā matāḥ //
SA20asmahsbu:3993: prathamā paryāye jñānam ekaikasyārthastha yāvanto nāma paryāyāḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:3995: tṛtīyā vākye pratyekaṃ janapadeṣu yā bhāṣāḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:3998: AMsa_18.35 deśanāyāṃ prayuktasya yasya yena ca deśanā /
SA20asmahsbu:3999: dharmārthayor dvayor vācā jñānenaiva ca deśanā //
SA20asmahsbu:4003: deśanāyāṃ hi prayuktasya yasya ca deśanā yena ca /
SA20asmahsbu:4004: tatra jñānena prayojanaṃ kasya punar deśanā //
SA20asmahsbu:4008: dharmasyoddeśanirdeśāt vākyena deśanā tayor eva dvayor sarvathā prāpaṇāt /
SA20asmahsbu:4010: ato yac ca yena ca deśyate tajjñānāt catasraḥ pratisaṃvido vyavasthāpitāḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:4011: AMsa_18.37 pratyātmaṃ samatām etya yottaratra pravedanā /
SA20asmahsbu:4013: etena pratisaṃvidāṃ nirvacanaṃ karam ca darśitaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:4014: pratyātmaṃ lokottareṇa jñānena sarvadharmasamatāṃ tathatāṃ etya uttarakālaṃ tatpṛṣṭalabdhena jñānena pravedanā paryāyādīnāṃ pratisaṃvid iti nirvacanaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:4019: yaś ca saṃbhāro yad arthaṃ ca saṃdarśayati /
SA20asmahsbu:4023: AMsa_18.39 dānaṃ śīlaṃ ca puṇyasya prajñā jñānasya saṃbhṛtiḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:4028: punaḥ prajñāyāṃ pariṇāmanāt sarvāḥ pañca pāramitā jñānasaṃbhāro veditavyaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:4029: AMsa_18.40 saṃtatyā bhāvanām etya bhūyo bhūyaḥ śubhasya hi /
SA20asmahsbu:4030: āhāro yaḥ sa saṃbhāro vīdhīre sarvārthasādhakaḥ //
SA20asmahsbu:4050: AMsa_18.43 niśrayāt pratipakṣāc ca avatārāt tathaiva ca /
SA20asmahsbu:4054: ity ebhiś caturdaśabhir ākārair bodhisatvānāṃ smṛtyupastānabhāvanā viśiṣyate /
SA20asmahsbu:4055: katham āśrayato mahāyāne śrutacintābhāvanāmayīṃ prajñām āśritya /
SA20asmahsbu:4056: kathaṃ pratipakṣataḥ caturviparyāsapratipakṣāṇām apy aśuciduḥkhānityānātmasaṃjñānaṃ pratipakṣatvāt kāyādidharmanairātmyapraveśataḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:4058: caturbhiḥ smṛtyupasthānair yathākramaṃ duḥkhasamudayanirodhamārgasatyāvatārāt svayaṃ pareṣāṃ cāvatāraṇāt /
SA20asmahsbu:4062: kathaṃ prāptitaḥ kāyādīnāṃ na visaṃ yogāya nāvasaṃyogāya /
SA20asmahsbu:4064: katham anuvṛttitaḥ laukikānāṃ śrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ cānuvṛttyā tadupasaṃhitasmṛtyupasthānabhāvanāt tebhyas tadupadeśārthaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:4070: katham utpattitaḥ saṃcintyabhavopapattau cakravartyādibhūtasya viśiṣṭakāyavedanādisaṃpattau tadasaṃkleśataḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:4071: kathaṃ mātrataḥ mṛdvā api smṛtyupasthānabhāvanāyās tad anyebhyo adhimātratvāt /
SA20asmahsbu:4074: kathaṃ bhāvanātaḥ atyantaṃ tadbhāvanāt nirupadhiśeṣanirvāṇe 'pi tadakṣayāt /
SA20asmahsbu:4080: yāvatyaḥ smṛtyupasthānabhāvanā uktāḥ tadvipakṣāṇāṃ pratipakṣeṇa samyakprahāṇabhāvaneti samastaṃ samyakprahāṇalakṣaṇaṃ / prabhedena punaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:4081: AMsa_18.46 saṃsārasyopabhoge ca tyāge nivaraṇasya ca /
SA20asmahsbu:4082: manaskārasya ca tyāge praveśe caiva bhūmiṣu //
SA20asmahsbu:4084: AMsa_18.47 satvānāṃ paripāke ca abhiṣeke ca dhīmatāṃ //
SA20asmahsbu:4085: AMsa_18.48 kṣetrasya ca viśuddhyarthaṃ niṣṭhāgamana eva ca /
SA20asmahsbu:4098: ye [Msa_142] ca vipakṣās teṣāṃ pratipakṣeṇa samyakprahāṇabhāvanā veditavyā /
SA20asmahsbu:4100: AMsa_18.49 chandaṃ niśritya yogasya bhāvanā sanimittikā /
SA20asmahsbu:4107: chandaṃ hi niśritya śamathavipaśyanākhyaṃ yogaṃ bhāvayatīti vyāyacchate /
SA20asmahsbu:4108: sā ca bhāvanā śamathapragrahopekṣānimittaiḥ saha bhāvyatge /
SA20asmahsbu:4111: yac chamathapragrahopakleśayor layāuddhatyayoḥ pratipakṣeṇa vīryam ārabhate /
SA20asmahsbu:4114: eṣā yogabhāvanā yathoktaprabhedeṣu sarvasamyakprahāṇeṣu pratipakṣa ucyate /
SA20asmahsbu:4116: AMsa_18.50 ṛddhipādāś ca catvāro dhīrāṇām agralakṣaṇāḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:4117: sarvārthasiddhau jāyante ātmanaś ca parasya ca //
SA20asmahsbu:4118: sarvārthasiddhir laukikī lokottarā ca veditavyā ca / śeṣaṃ gatārthaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:4119: AMsa_18.51 niśrayāc ca prabhedāc ca upāyād abhinirhṛteḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:4122: AMsa_18.52 dhyānapāramim āśritya prabhedo hi caturvidhaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:4131: aṣṭānāṃ prahāṇasaṃskārāṇāṃ chando vyāyāmaḥ śaddhā vyāvasāyikaḥ
SA20asmahsbu:4134: praśrabdhir anugrahātmakaḥ smṛtiḥ saṃ prajanyaṃ copanibandhakaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:4141: praṇidher vaśitāyaś ca dharmaprāpteś ca nirhṛtiḥ //
SA20asmahsbu:4142: tatra darśanaṃ cakṣuḥ pañcavidhaṃ māṃsacakṣuḥ divyaṃ cakṣuḥ āryaṃ prajñācakṣuḥ dharmacakṣuḥ buddhacakṣuś ca /
SA20asmahsbu:4144: tābhir upasaṃkramya bhāṣā cittaṃ cāgatiṃ ca gatiṃ ca viditvā niḥsaraṇāyāvavadanāt /
SA20asmahsbu:4145: sthitivikrīḍitaṃ yasmāt bodhisatvānāṃ bahuvidhaṃ nirmāṇādibhiḥ samādhivikrīḍitaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:4146: praṇidhir yena praṇidhijñānena praṇidhānabalikā bodhisatvāḥ praṇidhānavaiśeṣikatayā vikrīḍanti /
SA20asmahsbu:4147: yeṣāṃ na sukaraṃ saṃkhyā kartuṃ kāyasya vā prabhāyā vā svarasasya veti vistareṇa yathā daśabhūmike sūtre /
SA20asmahsbu:4148: vaśitā yathā tatraiva daśa vaśitā nirdiṣṭāḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:4152: AMsa_18.55 bodhiś caryā śruta cātra śamatho 'tha vipaśyanā /
SA20asmahsbu:4154: śraddhendriyasya bodhiḥ padam ālambanam ity arthaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:4167: etena yasyām avasthāyāṃ yasyāvabodhāt bodhyaṅgāni vyavasthāpyante tadupadiṣṭaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:4168: bhūmipraviṣṭāvasthāyāṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ sarvasatvānāṃ ca samatāvabodhād yathākramaṃ dharmanairātmyenātmaparasamatā ca /
SA20asmahsbu:4176: AMsa_18.59 dharmālokavivṛddhyā ca prītyā āpūryate dhruvam //
SA20asmahsbu:4178: tataḥ prītiḥ sarvaṃ kāryaṃ sadā prīṇayati /
SA20asmahsbu:4181: sarvadauṣṭhulyasamutpādanāt / yathā strīratnena cakravartī sukham anubhavati /
SA20asmahsbu:4184: AMsa_18.61 upekṣayā yathākāmaṃ sarvatra viharaty asau /
SA20asmahsbu:4187: upekṣocyate nirvikalpaṃ jñānaṃ tayā bodhisatvaḥ yathākāmaṃ sarvatra viharati tatpṛṣṭhalabdhena ca vihāreṇānyasyopagamāt /
SA20asmahsbu:4189: yathā cakravartinaḥ pariṇāyakaratnaṃ caturaṅgabalakāyam upanetavyaṃ copapraṇayati /
SA20asmahsbu:4191: tatra ca gatvā vāsaṃ kalpayati yatrākhinnaḥ caturaṅgo balakāyaḥ paraiti /
SA20asmahsbu:4197: etena yad bodhyaṅgaṃ yathāṅgaṃ tad abhidyatitaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:4212: tadvyavasthāne ca sūtrādike bhagavatā kṛte sa eva praveśas tena tadrthāvabodhāt /
SA20asmahsbu:4215_0: pratipakṣasya bhāvanā bhāvanā samyagvyāyāmādayo yathākramaṃ jñeyāvaraṇasya mārgāvaraṇasya
SA20asmahsbu:4215_1: ca vaiśeṣikaguṇāvaraṇasya ca samyagvyāyāmena dīrghaṃ [Msa_146] hi kālaṃ akhidyamāno
SA20asmahsbu:4216: samyaksmṛtyā śamathapragrahopekṣānimitteṣu layāuddhatyābhāvān mārgasaṃmukhībhāvāyāvaraṇasya pratipakṣaṃ bhāvayati /
SA20asmahsbu:4217: samyaksamādhinā vaiśeṣikaguṇābhinirhārāyāvaraṇasya pratipakṣaṃ bhāvayaty evam aṣṭau mārgāṅgāni vyavasthāpyante /
SA20asmahsbu:4219: AMsa_18.66 cittasya citte sthānāc ca dharmapravicayād api /
SA20asmahsbu:4222: dharmāṇāṃ ca pravicayād yathākramaṃ śamatho vipaśyanā ca veditavyā /
SA20asmahsbu:4223: na tu vinā samyaksamādhinety etac chamathavipaśyanālakṣaṇaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:4225: sā ca śamathavipaśyanā sarvatragā yaṃ yaṃ guṇam ākaṅkṣati tatra tatra tadbhāvanāt /
SA20asmahsbu:4227: ākaṅkṣed bhikṣur aho vatāhaṃ kāmair iti vistreṇa yāvat tena bhikṣuṇā imāv eva dvau dharmau bhāvayitavyau /
SA20asmahsbu:4228: yad uta śamathaś vipaśyanā cety evam ādi /
SA20asmahsbu:4233: AMsa_18.67 prativedhe ca niryāṇe animitte hy asaṃskṛte //
SA20asmahsbu:4234: AMsa_18.68 pariśuddhau viśuddhau ca śamatho 'tha vipaśyanā /
SA20asmahsbu:4236: ity upaniṣan matety evamādinā śamathavipaśyanāḥ prabhedaḥ karma ca nirdiṣṭaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:4243: saṃskāro hi saṃsṛtaṃ tad atra nāstīty asaṃskṛtaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:4244: tad eva ca bhūmitrayaṃ niśritya buddhakṣetraṃ c pariśodhayitavyaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:4246: tad etad yathākramaṃ pariśuddhir viśuddhiś ca /
SA20asmahsbu:4256: kṣiprābhisaṃbodhe sarvaṃ pāpaṃ pratideśayāmi yāvad bhavatu jñānaṃ saṃbodhāyeti pratideśanā 'numodanādhyeṣaṇā pariṇāmanā /
SA20asmahsbu:4260: asmin pañcavidha upāye sarvabhūmiṣu bodhisatvānām asamaṃ tadanyaiḥ kauśalyam ity ayaṃ prabhedaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:4263: AMsa_18.71 vipākena śrutābhyāsāt dhāraṇy api samādhinā /
SA20asmahsbu:4264: parīttā mahatī sā ca mahatī trividhā punaḥ //
SA20asmahsbu:4267: AMsa_18.73 dhāraṇītāṃ samāśritya bodhisatvā punaḥ punaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:4269: atrāpi prabhedaḥ karma ca dhāraṇyāḥ darśitaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:4276: samādhinā mahatī sāpi mahatī punas trividhā /
SA20asmahsbu:4277: abhūmipraviṣṭānāṃ mṛdvī bhūmipraviṣṭānāṃ akuśalabhūmikānāṃ madhyā saptasu bhūmiṣu /
SA20asmahsbu:4278: pariśuddhabhūmikā tv adhimātrā śeṣāsu bhūmiṣu ity ayaṃ prabhedo dhāraṇyāḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:4281: AMsa_18.74 cetanā chandasahitā jñānena preritā ca tat /
SA20asmahsbu:4283: AMsa_18.75 hetubhūtaṃ ca vijñeyaṃ cittāt sadyaḥ phalaṃ ca tat /
SA20asmahsbu:4288: atra praṇidhānaṃ svabhāvato nidānato bhūmitaḥ prabhedataḥ karmataś ca paridīpitaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:4294: āyatyāṃ vābhipretārthasiddhyarthaṃ cittāt punaḥ sadyaḥphalaṃ cittamātrāt yathārthasamṛddhitā vedutavyā /
SA20asmahsbu:4296: yasya na sukarā saṃkhyā kartuṃ kāyasya veti vistaraḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:4297: citram adhimukticaryābhūmāv evaṃ ca syām iti /
SA20asmahsbu:4299: viśuddhaṃ uttarottarāsu bhūmiṣu viśuddhiviśeṣād ā bodher ity eṣa prabhedataḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:4302: AMsa_18.77 nairātmyaṃ dvividhaṃ jñeyo hy ātmagrāhasya cāśrayaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:4308: sa eva samādhis trividho jñeyo grāhyagrāhakabhāvataḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:4309: trividhasya grāhasya gocarasya grāhakā ye samādhayaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:4310: te śūnyatādisamādhayaḥ iti grāhyagrāhakabhāvena trayaḥ samādhayo jñātavyāḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:4312: AMsa_18.78 nirvikalpo 'pi vimukho ratiyuktaś ca sarvadā //
SA20asmahsbu:4317: AMsa_18.79 parijñāyai prahāṇāya punaḥ sākṣātkriyāya ca /
SA20asmahsbu:4326: tatra saṃskārā anityāḥ sarvasaṃskārā duḥkhāḥ ity apraṇihitasya samādhyupaniṣatbhāvena deśitaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:4329: kaḥ punar anityārtho yāvac chāntārthaḥ ity āha /
SA20asmahsbu:4333: yan nityaṃ nāsti tad anityaṃ teṣāṃ yat parikalpitalakṣaṇaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:4336: evaśabdenāvadhāraṇaṃ parikalpata ātmā nāsti parikalpamātraṃ tv astīti parikalpitalakṣaṇasyābhāvārtho 'nātmārtha ity uktaṃ bhavati /
SA20asmahsbu:4340: AMsa_18.82 ayogād dhetuto 'tpatter virodhāt svayam asthiteḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:4344: tatra kṣaṇikaṃ sarvaṃ saṃskāram iti paścād vacanād iyaṃ pratijñā veditavyā /
SA20asmahsbu:4348: sā cāntareṇa pratikṣaṇam utpādanirodhau na yujyate /
SA20asmahsbu:4349: atha kālāntaraṃ sthitvā pūrvottaranirodhotpādataḥ prabandheneṣyate vṛttiḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:4350: tadanantaraṃ pravṛttir na syāt prabandhābhāvāt naiva cotpannasya vinā prabandhena kālāntaraṃ bhāvo yujyate /
SA20asmahsbu:4352: hetuto hi sarvaṃ saṃskṛtam utpadyate bhavatīty arthaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:4353: tad yadi bhūtvā punar uttarakālaṃ bhavati tasyāvaśyaṃ hetunā bhavitavyaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:4355: na ca tat tenaiva hetunā bhavitum arhati tasyopayuktahetukatvāt /
SA20asmahsbu:4357: tasmāt pratikṣaṇam avaśyaṃ pūrvahetukam anyad bhavatīti veditavyaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:4358: evaṃ vinā prabandhenotpannasya kālāntaraṃ bhāvo no yujyate /
SA20asmahsbu:4359: atha apy evam iṣyata notpannaṃ punar utpadyate yad arthaṃ hetunā bhavitavyaṃ syād utapannaṃ tu kālāntareṇa paścān nirudhyate notpannamātram eveti /
SA20asmahsbu:4364: na hi virodhayos tulyo hetur upalabhyate /
SA20asmahsbu:4370: māyopamās te bhikṣo saṃskārā āpāyikās tāvat kālikā itvarapratyupasthāyina iti /
SA20asmahsbu:4372: te hi saṃskārāṇām udayavyayau manasikurvantaḥ pratikṣaṇaṃ teṣāṃ nirodhaṃ paśyanti /
SA20asmahsbu:4373: anyathā hi teṣām api nirvidvirāgavimuktayo na syur yathānyeṣāṃ maraṇakālādiṣu nirodhaṃ paśyantāṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:4374: yadi cotpannaḥ saṃskāraḥ kālāntaraṃ tiṣṭhet sa svayam eva vā tiṣṭhet svayam eva sthātuṃ samarthaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:4379: kkena vā so 'nte punaḥ sthātuṃ na samarthaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:4382: athāpi syād vināpi sthitikāraṇena vināśakāraṇābhāvāt avatiṣṭhate /
SA20asmahsbu:4383: labdhe tu vināśakāraṇe paścād vināśayati agnineva śyāmateti /
SA20asmahsbu:4385: na hi vināśakāraṇaṃ paścād api kiṃcid asti /
SA20asmahsbu:4388: tathā hi tatsaṃbandhāt śyāmatāyāḥ saṃtatir visadṛśī gṛhyate ma tu sarvathaivāpravṛttiḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:4389: apām api kvathyamānānām agnisaṃbandhād alpataratamotpattito 'timandyād ante punar anutpattir gṛhyate /
SA20asmahsbu:4391: ekāntikaṃ hy saṃskṛtalakṣaṇam uktaṃ bhagavatā yad uta saṃskṛtasyānityatā /
SA20asmahsbu:4393: kaṃcit kālam asyānityatā na syād iti anaikāntikam anityatālakṣaṇaṃ prasahyate /
SA20asmahsbu:4394: athāpi syāt pratikṣaṇam apūrvotpattau tad evedam iti pratyabhijñānaṃ na syād iti /
SA20asmahsbu:4395: tad bhavaty eva sādṛśasya anuvṛtter māyākārapalakavat /
SA20asmahsbu:4399: na hi tathaivāvasthitasyānte nirodhaḥ syād ādilakṣaṇanirviśiṣṭatvāt /
SA20asmahsbu:4400: tasmān na tat tad evety avadhāryate ante pariṇāmopalabdheś ca /
SA20asmahsbu:4402: tad yadi nādita evārabdhaṃ bhaved ādhyātmikabāhyānāṃ bhāvānām ante pariṇāmo nopalabhyeta /
SA20asmahsbu:4403: tasmād ādita evānyathātvam ārabdhaṃ yat krameṇābhivardhamānam ante vyaktim āpadyante kṣīrasyeva dadhyavasthāyāṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:4404: yāvat tu tad anyathātvaṃ sūkṣmatvān na paricchidyate /
SA20asmahsbu:4405: tāvat sādṛśyānuvṛttes tad evedam imi jñāyata iti siddhaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:4412: [Msa_151] kṣaṇikaṃ hi cittaṃ prasiddhaṃ tasya cānye saṃskārāś cakṣūrūpādayo hetutaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:4414: na tv akṣaṇikāt kṣaṇikaṃ bhavitum arhati yathā nityād anytyatam iti /
SA20asmahsbu:4415: cittsya khalv api sarve saṃskārāḥ phalaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:4418: cittena hi sarve saṃskārāś cakṣurādayaḥ sādhiṣṭhānā upāttāḥ sahasaṃmūrchnāḥ tadanugrahānuvṛttitaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:4419: tasmāt te cittasya phalaṃ cittasya cādhipatyaṃ saṃskāreṣu /
SA20asmahsbu:4421: cittenāyaṃ loko nīyate cittena parikṛṣyate cittasyotpannasyotpannasya vaśe vartate iti /
SA20asmahsbu:4422: tathā viñānapratyayaṃ nāma rūpam ity uktaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:4425: śuddhaṃ hi yogināṃ cittaṃ saṃskārā anuvartante /
SA20asmahsbu:4427: dhyāyī bhikṣuḥ ṛddhimāṃś cittavaśe prāpta imaṃ dāruskandhaṃ sacet suvarṇam adhimucyate tad apy asya tahaiva syād iti /
SA20asmahsbu:4430: tathā hi pāpakāreṣu satveṣu bāhyā bhāvā hīnā bhavanti /
SA20asmahsbu:4434: na hi kṣaṇikasyākṣaṇikaṃ phalaṃ yujyate tadanuvidhāyitvāt /
SA20asmahsbu:4435: evaṃ tāvad aviśeṣeṇa saṃskārāṇāṃ kṣaṇikatvaṃ dvābhyāṃ ślokābhyāṃ sādhitaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:4436: ādhyātmikānāṃ punaḥ sādhanārthaṃ pañca ślokā veditavyāḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:4447: ādyas taratamenāpi yāvat kṣaṇikaṃ sarvasaṃskṛtam iti /
SA20asmahsbu:4456: hīnatvena [Msa_152] viśiṣṭatvena ca yo durgatau cotpadyamānānāṃ yathākramaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:4457: bhāsvaratvena yo nirmitakāmeṣu parinirmitakāmeṣu rūpārūpyeṣu copapannānāṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:4462: abījatvena yas teṣām evārhataś caram eṣāṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:4464: yo aṣṭavimokṣadhyāyināṃ samādhivaśena pratibimbānāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ utpādaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:4465: etasyāṃ caturdaśavidhāyām utpattāv ādhyātmikānāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ kṣaṇikatvaṃ hetumān aviśeṣādibhiḥ kāraṇair veditavyaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:4467: yadi hi tasya hetutvena viśeṣo na syāt tad uttarāyāḥ saṃskārapravṛtter uttarottaraviśeṣo nopalabhyeta hetvaviśeṣāt /
SA20asmahsbu:4472: na hi pratikṣaṇaṃ vinā 'nyatvena parimāṇaviśeṣo bhavet /
SA20asmahsbu:4477: na hi pratikṣaṇaṃ vinā puṣṭatarotpattyā yujyetopacayaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:4479: na hi tiṣṭhaty āśraye ca tadāśritasyānavasthānaṃ yujyate /
SA20asmahsbu:4480: yena tiṣṭhati ta ārūḍhānavasthānavad anyathā hy āśrayatvaṃ na saṃbhavet /
SA20asmahsbu:4483: ma hi tathāsthitasyaiva rāgādibhir vikāraḥ saṃbhavati /
SA20asmahsbu:4484: na cāvasthāntareṣu paripāka ādāv avināśe saty ante vikārābhāvāt /
SA20asmahsbu:4485: tathā hīnaviśiṣṭotpattau kaṇikatvaṃ veditavyaṃ yathā vikāraparipākotpattau /
SA20asmahsbu:4486: na hi tahtāsthiteṣv eva saṃskāreṣu karmavāsanā vṛttiṃ labhate yato durgatau vā syād utpattiḥ sugatau vā /
SA20asmahsbu:4492: na hi saṃskārāṇāṃ deśāntarasaṃkrāntilakṣaṇā gatir nāma kācit kriyā yujyate /
SA20asmahsbu:4493: sa hy utpannā vā saṃskāraṃ deśāntaraṃ gamayed anutpannā vā /
SA20asmahsbu:4494: yad utpannā tena gatikāle na kaṃcid gata iti sthitasyaiva gamanaṃ nopapadyate /
SA20asmahsbu:4495: athānutpannā tena asatyāṃ gatau gata iti na yujyate /
SA20asmahsbu:4496: sā ca kriyā yadi taddeśastha eva saṃskāre kāritraṃ karoti na yujyate /
SA20asmahsbu:4500: na ca kriyā tatra vā anyatra vā deśe sthitā saṃskārād anyopalabhyate /
SA20asmahsbu:4501: tasmān nāsti saṃskārāṇāṃ deśāntarasaṃtatyutpādād anyā gatiḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:4509: asti svabhāvavaśena yathā vāyos tiryaggamanam agner ūrdhvaṃ jvalanam apāṃ nimne syandanaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:4515: na hi pratikṣaṇaṃ hetubhāvam antareṇa tathāsthitasyānyasmin kāle punar bījabhāvo yujyate /
SA20asmahsbu:4517: na ca śakyaṃ pūrvaṃ sabījatvaṃ carame kṣaṇe nirbījatvam abhyupagantuṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:4519: tathā hi caramatvam eva na saṃbhavati /
SA20asmahsbu:4522: ekāntāt sādhitam ādhyātmikaṃ sarvasaṃskṛtam kṣaṇikam iti /
SA20asmahsbu:4529: cittānuvṛtteḥ pṛcchātaḥ kṣaṇikaṃ bāhyam apy ataḥ //
SA20asmahsbu:4534: ato bhūtānāṃ ṣaḍvidhārthasya ca kṣaṇikatvaṃ vidhīyate /
SA20asmahsbu:4539: tac cobhayam antareṇa pratikṣaṇaṃ pariṇāmaṃ na syāt paścād viśeṣakāraṇābhāvāt /
SA20asmahsbu:4540: vāyoḥ prakṛtyā ca calatvād vṛddhihānitaś ca /
SA20asmahsbu:4541: na hy avasthitasya calatvaṃ syāt tatsvabhāvād iti prasādhitam etat /
SA20asmahsbu:4544: tac chabenāpaś ca gṛhyante vāyuś ca /
SA20asmahsbu:4545: adbhyo hi vāyusahitābhyaḥ pṛthivī saṃbhūtā vivartakāle /
SA20asmahsbu:4552: sa cāntareṇa pratikṣaṇaṃ anyotpattiṃ na yujyate vināśakāraṇābhāvāt /
SA20asmahsbu:4553: varṇagandharasasparśānāṃ pṛthivyādibhis tulyakāraṇatvāt tathaiva kaṇikatvaṃ veditavyaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:4555: [Msa_154] na hi tejasy utpanne tejaḥsahotpannam indhanaṃ tathaivāvatiṣṭhate /
SA20asmahsbu:4556: na ca dagdhendhanaṃ tejaḥ sthātuṃ samarthaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:4558: ślokabadhānurodhād varṇādīnāṃ pūrvam abhidhānaṃ paścāt tejasaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:4559: śabdaḥ punar yo 'pi kālāntaram upalabhyate ghaṇṭhādīnāṃ tasyāpi kṣaṇikatvaṃ veditavyaṃ tāratamyopalabdheḥ na hy asati kṣaṇikatve pratikṣaṇamandataratamopalabdhiḥ syāt /
SA20asmahsbu:4560: dharmāyatanikasyāpi rūpasya kṣaṇikatvaṃ prasiddham eva cittānuvṛtter yathā pūrvam uktaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:4562: pṛcchrayate khalv api sarvasaṃskārāṇāṃ kṣaṇikatvaṃ sidhyati kathaṃ kṛtvā /
SA20asmahsbu:4564: kasmād bhavān anityatvam icchati na saṃskārārāṃ kṣaṇikatvaṃ necchatīti /
SA20asmahsbu:4565: yady evaṃ vadet pratikṣaṇam anyatvasyāgrahaṇād iti sa idaṃ syād vacanīyaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:4566: prasiddhakṣaṇikabhāveṣv api pradīpādiṣu niścalāvasthāyāṃ tadagrahaṇād akṣaṇikatvaṃ kasmān neṣyate /
SA20asmahsbu:4567: yady evaṃ vadet pūrvavat paścād agrahaṇād iti /
SA20asmahsbu:4570: yady evaṃ vadet vilakṣaṇatvāt pradīpāditadanyasaṃskārāṇām iti /
SA20asmahsbu:4572: dvidhaṃ hi vailakṣaṇyaṃ svabhāvavailakṣaṇyaṃ vṛttivailakṣaṇyaṃ ca /
SA20asmahsbu:4573: tad yadi tāvat svabhāvavailakṣaṇyam abhipretam ata eva dṛṣṭāntatvaṃ yujyate /
SA20asmahsbu:4574: na hi tatsvabhāva eva tasya dṛṣṭānto bhavati yathā pradīpaḥ pradīpasya gaur vā gor iti /
SA20asmahsbu:4575: atha vṛttavailakṣaṇyam ata eva dṛṣṭāntatvaṃ pradīpapradīpānāṃ prasiddhatvāt /
SA20asmahsbu:4577: kaccid icchasi yāne tiṣṭhati yānāruḍho gacched iti /
SA20asmahsbu:4580: cakṣurādiṣu tiṣṭhatsu tad āśritaṃ vijñānaṃ prabandhena gacchatīti na yujyate /
SA20asmahsbu:4581: yady evaṃ vadet nanu ca dṛṣṭaṃ vartisaṃniśrite pradīpe prabandhena gacchati vartyā avathānam iti /
SA20asmahsbu:4583: na dṛṣṭaṃ tatprabandhena vartyā pratikṣaṇaṃ vikārotpatter iti /
SA20asmahsbu:4584: yady evaṃ vadet sati kaṇikatve saṃskārāṇāṃ kasmāt pradīpād iva kṣaṇikatvaṃ na siddham iti /
SA20asmahsbu:4586: sadṛśasaṃtatiprabandhavṛttyā hi kṣaṇikatvam eṣāṃ na prajñāyate /
SA20asmahsbu:4587: yataḥ saty apy aparāparatve tad evedam iti viparyāso jāyate /
SA20asmahsbu:4588: itarathā hi anityanityaviparyāso na syāt tadabhāve saṃkleśo na syāt kutaḥ punar vyavadānam ity evaṃ paryanuyogato 'pi kṣaṇikatvaṃ sarvasaṃskārāṇāṃ prasiddhaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:4590: AMsa_18.92 prajñaptyastitayā vācyaḥ pudgalo dravyato na tu /
SA20asmahsbu:4592: AMsa_18.93 ekatvānyatvato vācyas tasmād doṣadvayād asau /
SA20asmahsbu:4594: AMsa_18.94 dravyasan yady avācyaś ca vacanīyaṃ prayojanaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:4597: AMsa_18.95 lakṣaṇāl lokadṛṣṭāc ca śāstrato 'pi na yujyate /
SA20asmahsbu:4599: AMsa_18.96 dvaye sati ca vijñānasaṃbhavāt pratyayo na saḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:4600: nairarthakyād ato draṣṭā yāvan moktā na yujyate //
SA20asmahsbu:4601: AMsa_18.97 svāmitve sati cānityam aniṣṭaṃ na pravartayet /
SA20asmahsbu:4603: AMsa_18.98 darśanādau ca tadyatnaḥ svayaṃbhūr na trayād api /
SA20asmahsbu:4605: AMsa_18.99 akartṛtvād anityatvāt sakṛtr ity apravṛttitaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:4607: AMsa_18.100 tathā sthitasya naṣṭasya prāg abhāvād anityataḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:4610: ātmopalambhe doṣaś ca deśito yata eva ca //
SA20asmahsbu:4614: ayatnamokṣaḥ sarveṣāṃ na mokṣaḥ pudgalo 'sti vā //
SA20asmahsbu:4615: pudgalaḥ kim astīti vaktavyo nāstīti vaktavyaḥ / āha /
SA20asmahsbu:4616: prajñaptyastitayā vācyaḥ pudgalo dravyato na tu /
SA20asmahsbu:4617: yataś ca prajñaptito 'stīti vaktavyo dravyato nāstīti vaktavyaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:4618: evam anekāṃśavādaparigrahe naivāstitve doṣāvakāśo na nāstitve /
SA20asmahsbu:4619: sa punar dravyato nāstīti kathaṃ veditavyaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:4621: na hi sa dravyata upalabhyate rūpādivat upalabdhir hi nāma buddhyā pratipattiḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:4622: na ca pudgalaṃ buddhyā na pratipadyante pudgalavādinaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:4624: dṛṣṭa eva dharme ātmānam nupalabhate prajñāpayatīti kathaṃ nopalabdhā bhavati /
SA20asmahsbu:4625: na sa evam upalabhyamāno dravyata upalabdho bhavati /
SA20asmahsbu:4627: viparyāsāt tathā hy anātmany ātmeti viparyāsa ukto bhagavatā /
SA20asmahsbu:4628: tasmād ya evaṃ pudgalagrāho viparyāsaḥ saḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:4631: satkāyadṛṣṭikleśalakṣaṇo hy eṣa saṃkleśo yad uta ahaṃ mameti /
SA20asmahsbu:4632: na ca viparyāsaḥ saṃkleśo bhavitum arahati /
SA20asmahsbu:4633: na caiṣa saṃkleśa iti kathaṃ veditavyaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:4635: tathā hi tadhetukāḥ kliṣṭā [Msa_156] rāgādaya utpadyante /
SA20asmahsbu:4636: yatra punar vastuni rūpādisaṃjñake prajñaptiḥ pudgala iti tasmāt kim ekatvena pudgalo vaktavya āhosvid anyatvena / āha /
SA20asmahsbu:4640: ekatve hi skandhānām ātmatvaṃ prasajyate pudgalasya ca dravyasatvaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:4642: evaṃ hi pudgalsya prajñaptito 'stitvād avaktavyatvaṃ yuktaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:4644: ye punaḥ śāstuḥ śāsanam atikramya pudgalsya dravyato 'stitvam icchanti ta idaṃ syur vacanīyāḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:4645: dravyasan yady avācyaś ca vacanīyaṃ prayojanaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:4649: yathāgnir andhanān nānyo nānyo vaktavya iti /
SA20asmahsbu:4651: lakṣaṇāl lokadṛṣṭāc ca śāstrato 'pi na yujyate /
SA20asmahsbu:4653: ekatvenānyatvena ca agnir hi nāma tejodhātur indhanaṃ śeṣāṇi bhūtāni /
SA20asmahsbu:4654: teṣāṃ ca bhinnaṃ lakṣaṇam ity anya evāgnir indhanāt /
SA20asmahsbu:4655: loke ca vināpy agninā dṛṣṭam indhanaṃ kāṣṭād vināpi cendhanenāgnir iti siddham anyatvaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:4656: śāstre ca bhagavatā na kvacid agnīndhanayor avācyatvam uktam ity ayuktam etat /
SA20asmahsbu:4657: vinā punar indhanenāgnir astīti katham idaṃ vijñāyate /
SA20asmahsbu:4658: upalabdhes tathā hi vāyunā vikṣiptaṃ dūram api jvalat paraiti /
SA20asmahsbu:4659: athāpi syād vāyus tatrendhanam iti ata evāgnīndhanayor anyatvam it siddhiḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:4662: dvayaṃ hi tatropalabhyate arcir vāyuś cendhanatvena /
SA20asmahsbu:4663: asty eva pudgalo ya eṣa draṣṭā yāvad vijñāntā kartā bhoktā jñātā moktā [Msa_157] ca /
SA20asmahsbu:4666: sa hi darśanādisaṃjñakānāṃ vijñānānāṃ pratyayabhāvena vā kartā bhavet svāmitvena vā /
SA20asmahsbu:4668: dvayaṃ pratītya vijñānasaṃbhavāt pratyayo na saḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:4669: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ / nairarthakyāt / na hi tatra kiṃcit sāmarthyaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:4670: svāmitve sati cānityam aniṣṭaṃ na pravartayet /
SA20asmahsbu:4671: sa hi vijñānapravṛttau svāmībhavann aniṣṭaṃ vijñānam anityaṃ na pravartayet /
SA20asmahsbu:4674: asau draṣṭā yāvan moktā na yujyate /
SA20asmahsbu:4681: tasmiṃś ca dravyata iṣyamāṇe buddhasya bhagavataḥ
SA20asmahsbu:4686: ni hi pudgalābhisaṃbodhe kiṃcid gambhīram abhisaṃbuddhaṃ bhavati /
SA20asmahsbu:4692: api khalu pudgalo draṣṭā bhavan yāvad vijñātā darśanādiṣu saprayatno vā bhaven niṣpratyatno vā /
SA20asmahsbu:4693: saprayatnasya vā punar asau prayatnaḥ svayaṃbhūr vā bhaved ākasmikaḥ / tatpratyayo
SA20asmahsbu:4694: darśanādau ca tadyatnaḥ svayaṃbhūr na trayād api /
SA20asmahsbu:4697: neti vartate / niṣprayatnasya vā punaḥ sataḥ siddhaṃ bhavati /
SA20asmahsbu:4700: ity asati vyāpare pudgalasya darśanādau katham asau draṣṭā bhavati /
SA20asmahsbu:4701: yāvad vijñātā doṣatrayād ity uktaṃ katamasmād doṣatrayāt /
SA20asmahsbu:4704: yadi darśanādiṣu prayatna ākasmiko yato darśanādīni /
SA20asmahsbu:4705: na tarhi teṣāṃ pudglaḥ karteti katham asau draṣṭā bhavati yāvad vijñātā sati vākasmikatve nirapekṣatvāt na kadācit prayatno na syād anityo na syāt /
SA20asmahsbu:4706: nitye ca prayatne darśnādīnāṃyugapac ca nityaṃ ca pravṛrtiḥ syād iti doṣaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:4707: tasmān na yujyate darśnādiṣu prayatnasya svayaṃbhūtvaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:4708: tathā sthitasya naṣṭasya prāg abhāvād anityataḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:4711: tasya tathā sthitasya prayatnatvaṃ na yujyate /
SA20asmahsbu:4713: sati hi tatprayatnatve na kadācit pudgalo nāstīti /
SA20asmahsbu:4714: kim arthaṃ prāk prayatno na syād yadā notpannaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:4716: tṛtīyaś ca kaścitpakṣo nāsti yan na sthito na vinaṣṭaḥ syād iti /
SA20asmahsbu:4718: evaṃ tāvad yuktima āśritya dravyataḥ pudgalo nopalabhyate /
SA20asmahsbu:4720: ātmopalambhe doṣaś ca deśito yata eva ca //
SA20asmahsbu:4721_0: dharmoddāneṣu hi bhagavatā sarve dharmā anātmāna iti deśitaṃ paramārthaśūnyatāyām
SA20asmahsbu:4721_1: asti karmāsti vipākaḥ kārakas tu nopalabhyate ya imaṃś ca skhandān nikṣipati anyāṃś
SA20asmahsbu:4724: ātmadṛṣṭir bhavati jīvadṛṣṭiḥ nirviśeṣo bhavati tīrthikaiḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:4726: śūnyatāyām asya cittaṃ na praskandati na prasīdati na saṃtiṣṭhate nādhimucyate /
SA20asmahsbu:4729: pudgalo 'pi hi bhagavatā tatra tatra deśitaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:4730: [Msa_159] parijñātāvī bhārahāraḥ śraddhānusāryādipudgalavyavasthānata ity asati dravyato 'stitve kasmād deśitaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:4734: pudgalaprajñaptim antareṇa tadvṛttibhedaḥ saṃtānabhedaś ca deśayituṃ na śakyaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:4735: parijñāsūtre parijñeyā dharmāḥ saṃkleśaḥ parijñā vyavadānaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:4739: tayor vṛttibhedaḥ saṃtānabhedaś cāntareṇa parijñātāvībhārahārapudgalaprajñaptiṃ na śakyeta deśayituṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:4741: teṣāṃ vṛttibhedaḥ saṃtānabhedaś cāntareṇa śraddhānusāryādipudgalaprajñaptiṃ na śakyeta deśayituṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:4742: yenāsati dravyato 'stitve pudgalo deśita ity ayam atra nayo veditavyaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:4744: na hi tāvad asāv ātmadṛṣṭyutpādanārthaṃ yujyate yasmāt
SA20asmahsbu:4747: yadi cātmadarśanena mokṣa ity asau deśyeta / evaṃ sati syāt
SA20asmahsbu:4748: ayatnamokṣaḥ sarveṣāṃ tathā hi sarveṣāṃ na dṛṣṭasatyānām ātmadarśanaṃ vidyate /
SA20asmahsbu:4750: na hi pūrvam ātmānam anātmato gṛhītvā satyābhisamayakāle kaścid ātmato gṛhṇāti /
SA20asmahsbu:4751: yathā duḥkhaṃ duḥkhataḥ pūrvam agṛhītvā paścād gṛhṇātīti yathā pūrvaṃ tathā paścād api mokṣo na syāt /
SA20asmahsbu:4752: sati cātmany avaśyam ahaṃkāramamakārābhyām ātmatṛṣṇayā cānyaiś ca tannidānaiḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:4753: kleśair bhavitavyam iti ato 'pi mokṣo na syāt /
SA20asmahsbu:4755: tasmin hi sati niyatam ete doṣāḥ prasajyante /
SA20asmahsbu:4756: AMsa_18.104 evam ebhir guṇair nityaṃ bodhisatvāḥ samanvitāḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:4757: ātmārthaṃ ca na riñcanti parārthaṃ sādhayanti ca //
SA20asmahsbu:4763: AMsa_19.1 svadehasya parityāgaḥ saṃpatteś caiva saṃvṛttau /
SA20asmahsbu:4765: AMsa_19.2 vīryārambho hy anāsvādo dhyāneṣu sukha eva ca /
SA20asmahsbu:4766: niṣkalpanā ca prajñāyām āścaryaṃ dhīmatāṃ gataṃ //
SA20asmahsbu:4767: AMsa_19.3 tathāgatakule janma lābho vyākaraṇasya ca /
SA20asmahsbu:4768: abhiṣekasya ca prāptir bodheś cāścaryam iṣyate //
SA20asmahsbu:4769: atra dvābhāṃ ślokābhyāṃ pratipattyāścaryam uktaṃ ṣaḍpāramitā ārabhya /
SA20asmahsbu:4770: dānena hi svadehaparityāga āścaryaṃ śīlasaṃvaranimittam udārasaṃpattityāgaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:4772: tṛtīyena ślokena phalāścaryam uktaṃ catvāri bodhisatvaphalāny ārabhya prathamāyām aṣṭabhyāṃ daśabhyāṃ trīṇi śaikṣāṇi phalāni buddhabhūmau caturtham aśaikṣam atra phalaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:4774: AMsa_19.4 vairāgyaṃ karuṇāṃ caitya bhāvanāṃ paramām api /
SA20asmahsbu:4780: paramāṃ bhāvanām āgamyāṣṭabhāṃ bhūmau nirabhisaṃskāranirvikalpo vīryādiprayogo nāścaryaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:4781: ātmaparasamacittatām āgamya sarvāsv eva pāramitāsu prayogo nāścaryam artha iva parārthe khedābhāvāt /
SA20asmahsbu:4783: AMsa_19.5 na tathātmani dāreṣu sutamitreṣu bandhuṣu /
SA20asmahsbu:4784: satvānāṃ pragataḥ sneho yathā satveṣu dhīmatāṃ //
SA20asmahsbu:4785: AMsa_19.6 arthiṣv apakṣapātaś ca śīlasyākhaṇḍanā dhruvaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:4786: kṣāntiḥ sarvatra satvārthaṃ sarvārthaṃ vīryārambho mahān api //
SA20asmahsbu:4787: AMsa_19.7 dhyānaṃ ca kuśalaṃ nityaṃ prajñā caivāvikalpikā /
SA20asmahsbu:4791: na hi satvānām ātmādiṣu snehaḥ samatayā anugato na cātyantaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:4792: tathā hi ātmanam api kadācin mārayanti /
SA20asmahsbu:4793: bodhisatānāṃ tu sarvasatveṣu samatayā atyantaṃ ca pāramitāsu punar dāne samacittatvam arthiṣv apakṣapātāt /
SA20asmahsbu:4796: vīrye satvārthaṃ vīryārambhāt svaparārthaṃ samaṃ prayogāt sarvakuśalārthaṃ ca /
SA20asmahsbu:4799: AMsa_19.8 sthāpanā bhājanatve ca śīleṣv eva ca ropaṇaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:4801: AMsa_19.9 āvarjanā śāsane 'smiṃś chedanā saṃśayasya ca /
SA20asmahsbu:4803: ābhyāṃ ślokābhyāṃ ṣaḍbhiḥ pāramitābhir yathopakāritvaṃ bodhisatvānāṃ tatparidīpitaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:4804: dānena hi satvānāṃ bhājanatve sthāpayanti kuśalakriyāyāḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:4808: AMsa_19.10 samāśayena satvānāṃ dhārayanti sadaiva ye /
SA20asmahsbu:4809: janayanty āryabhūmau ca kuśalair vardhayanti ca //
SA20asmahsbu:4810: AMsa_19.11 duṣkṛtāt parirakṣanti śrutaṃ vyutpādayanti ca /
SA20asmahsbu:4813: mātā hi putrasya pañcavidham upakāraṃ karoti /
SA20asmahsbu:4816: āpāyayati poṣayati saṃvardhayati apāyād rakṣate abhilāpaṃ ca śikṣayati /
SA20asmahsbu:4821: AMsa_19.13 buddhādhyeṣaṇataś caiṣām āvṛteś ca vivarjanāt /
SA20asmahsbu:4823: pitā hi putrāṇāṃ pañcavidham upakāraṃ karoti /
SA20asmahsbu:4827: anṛṇaṃ karoti yathā na paitṛkam ṛṇaṃ dāpyate /
SA20asmahsbu:4828: tatsādharmyeṇa bodhisatvānām etāni pañca karmāṇi veditavyāni /
SA20asmahsbu:4833: AMsa_19.14 anarhadeśanāṃ ye ca satvānāṃ gūhayanti hi /
SA20asmahsbu:4834: śikṣāvipattiṃ nindanti śaṃsanty eva ca saṃpadam //
SA20asmahsbu:4835: AMsa_19.15 avavādaṃ ca yacchanti mārān āvedayanti hi /
SA20asmahsbu:4837: bandhavo hi bandhūnāṃ pañcavidham upakāraṃ kurvanti /
SA20asmahsbu:4840: kuceṣṭitaṃ praśaṃsanti karaṇīyeṣu sāhāyyaṃ gacchantivyasanasthānebhyaś ca nivārayanti /
SA20asmahsbu:4842: [Msa_163] anarthebhyo gambhīradharmadeśanāvinigūhanāt śikṣāvipattisaṃpattyor yathākramaṃ nindanāt praśaṃsanāc ca /
SA20asmahsbu:4844: AMsa_19.16 saṃkleśe vyavadāne ca svayam aśrāntabuddhayaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:4846: AMsa_19.17 sukhe hite cābhinnā akheditvād abhinnā ye sadā sukhahitaiṣiṇaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:4848: tad dhi mitraṃ yan mitrasya hite ca sukhe cāparyastaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:4849: sukhaṃ copasaṃharati hitaṃ cābhidyaṃ ca bhavati /
SA20asmahsbu:4851: tathā bodhisatvāḥ satvānāṃ pañcabhiḥ karmabhiḥ satvamitrakalpā veditavyāḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:4859: dāso hi pañcabhiḥ karabhiḥ samyag vartate /
SA20asmahsbu:4868: AMsa_19.20 anutpattikadharmeṣu kṣāntiṃ prāptāś ca ye matāḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:4870: AMsa_19.21 sumukhāḥ pratikāre ca vipāke cānapekṣiṇaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:4879: AMsa_19.22 satvakṛtyārtham udyuktāḥ saṃbhārān pūrayanti ye /
SA20asmahsbu:4880: saṃbhṛtān mocayanty āśu vipakṣaṃ hāpayanti ca //
SA20asmahsbu:4882: AMsa_19.23 lokasaṃpattibhiś citrair alokair yojayanti ca /
SA20asmahsbu:4884: upādhyāyaḥ pañcavidhena karmaṇā sārdhaṃ vihāriṇām upakārī bhavati / pravrājayati upasaṃpādayati /
SA20asmahsbu:4886: āmiṣeṇa saṃgṛhṇāti dharmeṇa ca tatsādharmyeṇaitāni bodhisatvānāṃ pañca karmāṇi veditavyāni /
SA20asmahsbu:4888: AMsa_19.24 asaktyā caiva bhogeṣu śīlasya ca na khaṇḍanaiḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:4890: AMsa_19.25 ṣaṭsu pāramitāsv eva vartamānā hi dehinaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:4896: upakāribodhisatvasya kṛtajñatayā te hi kṣāntipriyā iti /
SA20asmahsbu:4897: pratipattiyogato vīryajñāsu yena ca pratipadyante yatra ceti kṛtvā /
SA20asmahsbu:4899: AMsa_19.26 vṛddhiṃ hāniṃ ca kāṅkṣanti satvānāṃ ca prapācanaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:4909: caturvidhe satvārthe bodhisatvānām abandhyaḥ prayogo veditavyaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:4915: śīlaṃ kṣāntiś ca sarvatra vīryaṃ sarvaśubhodaye //
SA20asmahsbu:4916: AMsa_19.29 vinā rūpyaṃ tathā dhyānaṃ prajñā copāyasaṃhitā /
SA20asmahsbu:4921: AMsa_19.30 bhogasaktiḥ sacchidratvaṃ mānaś caiva sukhallikā /
SA20asmahsbu:4923: AMsa_19.31 sthitānāṃ bodhisatvānāṃ pratipakṣeṣu teṣu ca /
SA20asmahsbu:4928: AMsa_19.32 pravāraṇāpi kuhanā saumukhyasya ca darśanā /
SA20asmahsbu:4934: ṣaṇṇāṃ pāramitānāṃ pratirūpakāḥ ṣaḍ bodhisatvaguṇāḥ pravāraṇādayo veditavyāḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:4937: AMsa_19.34 te dānādyupaṃsahāraiḥ satvānāṃ vinayanti hi /
SA20asmahsbu:4943: bodhau vyākaraṇe caiva mahāc cānyad udāhṛtaṃ //
SA20asmahsbu:4946: AMsa_19.37 kṣetreṇa nāmnā kālena kalpanāmnā ca tatpunaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:4951: vyākaraṇaṃ vā evaṃnāmā tathāgata evam amuṣmin kāle vyākariṣyatīti /
SA20asmahsbu:4952: anyat punar mahāvyākaraṇaṃ yad yad aṣṭamyāṃ bhūmau anutpattikadharmakṣāntilābhataḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:4957: punaḥ kṣetrādibhir vyākaraṇam īdṛśae buddhakṣetre evaṃnāmā iyatā kālena buddho bhaviṣyati /
SA20asmahsbu:4958: evaṃnāmake kalpe īdṛśaś cāsya parivāro bhaviṣyati /
SA20asmahsbu:4969: samādhānācyutau kṛtasiddhau ca niyatipāto nityaṃ samādhyaparihāṇitaḥ satkṛtyasādhanataś ca /
SA20asmahsbu:4987: AMsa_19.42 dharmadānaṃ śīlaśuddhir notpattikṣāntir eva ca /
SA20asmahsbu:4989: prajñā pāramitānāṃ ca pradhānaṃ dhīmatāṃ matam //
SA20asmahsbu:5000: AMsa_19.45 yoniśaś ca manaskāraḥ samyagdṛṣṭiḥ phalānvitā /
SA20asmahsbu:5002: AMsa_19.46 āśayād deśanāc caiva prayogāt saṃbhṛter api /
SA20asmahsbu:5006: tatra [Msa_168] pañcavidyāsthānavyavasthānaṃ dharmavyavasthānaṃ veditavyaṃ sūtrageyādibhir ākārabhedaiḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:5007: tadantarbhūtāny eva tadanyāni vidyāsthānāni mahāyāne bodhisatvebhyo deśyante /
SA20asmahsbu:5008: satvavyavasthānaṃ tu saptavidhāṃ tathatām āśritya pravṛttitathatāṃ lakṣaṇatathatāṃ vijñaptitathatāṃ saṃniveśatathatāṃ mithyāpratipattitathatāṃ samyakpratipattitathatāṃ ca /
SA20asmahsbu:5019: tam apekṣya tena pratyayena lokottarāyāḥ samyagdṛṣṭer utpādāt /
SA20asmahsbu:5024: siddhā hi dharmatā na punaś cintyā kasmāt /
SA20asmahsbu:5027: tato vā kleśaprahāṇaṃ phalam ity evam ādi /
SA20asmahsbu:5029: āśayato deśanātaḥ prayogataḥ saṃbhārataḥ samudāgamataś ca /
SA20asmahsbu:5030: tatra hīnaṃ āśayadeśanāprayogasaṃbhārasamudāgamāḥ śrāvakayānaṃ madhyāḥ pratyekabuddhayānaṃ uttamā mahāyānaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:5042: tatra nāmno vastuny āgantukatvaparyeṣaṇā nāmaparyeṣaṇā veditavyā /
SA20asmahsbu:5054: AMsa_19.49 pratiṣṭhābhogabījaṃ hi nimittaṃ bandhanasya hi /
SA20asmahsbu:5059: yatra tirvidhe nimitte sāśrayāś cittacaittā badhyante /
SA20asmahsbu:5062: AMsa_19.50 purataḥ sthāpitaṃ yac ca nimittaṃ yat sthitaṃ svayaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:5063: sarvaṃ vibhāvayan dhīmān labhate bodhim uttamām //
SA20asmahsbu:5064: tatra purataḥ sthāpitaṃ nimittaṃ yac chrutacintābhāvanāprayogenālambanīkṛtaṃ parikalpitaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:5065: sthitaṃ svayam eva yat prakṛtiyālambanībhūtam ayatnaparikalpitaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:5070: tatra caturviparyāsānugataṃ pudaglanimittaṃ vibhāvayan yogī śrāvakabodhiṃ pratyekabodhiṃ vā labhate /
SA20asmahsbu:5072: etena yathātatvaṃ parijñāya mokṣāya saṃvartate yathābhūtaṃ parijñānaṃ / tat paridīpitaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:5080: tasyaiva kṣayāya saṃvartate dauṣṭhulyakāyasyālayavijñānasya tatkṣayārthaṃ tatkṣaye /
SA20asmahsbu:5086: sarvanimittānām amanasikārād animittasya ca [Msa_170] dhātor manasikārād animittaṃ samāpadyante /
SA20asmahsbu:5087: bodhisatvās tu tathatāvyatirekeṇa nimittam apaśanto nimittam evānimittaṃ paśyanty atas teṣāṃ tajjñānamanasikārabhāvitaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:5088: sattārthe ca nimitte pratyakṣaṃ vikalpavibhu cocyate /
SA20asmahsbu:5090: AMsa_19.53 tatvaṃ saṃcchādya bālānām atatvaṃ khyāti sarvataḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:5091: tatvaṃ tu bodhisatvānāṃ sarvataḥ khyāty apāsya tat //
SA20asmahsbu:5092: etena yathā bālānāṃ svarasenātatvam eva khyāti nimittaṃ na tatvaṃ tathatā /
SA20asmahsbu:5093: evaṃ bodhisatvānāṃ svarasena tatvaṃ eva khyāty nātatvam ity upadarśitaṃ /

SA20asmahsbu:5560: AMsa_20-21.47 āśraye 'thāśrite deśye vākye jñāne ca deśike /
SA20asmahsbu:5562: atra samāsato yac ca deśyate yena deśyate tatra nityam avyāhatamatitvenabhagavataś catasraḥ pratisaṃvido deśitāḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:5563: tatra dvayaṃ deśyate āśrayaś ca dharmaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:5568: AMsa_20-21.48 upetya vacanais teṣāṃ carijña āgatau gatau /
SA20asmahsbu:5569: niḥsāre caiva satvānāṃ svavavāda namo 'stu te //
SA20asmahsbu:5570: atra ṣaḍbhir abhijñābhiḥ samyagavavādatvaṃ bhagavato darśitaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:5572: teṣāṃ bhāṣayā divyaśrotrābhijñayā cittacaritraṃ jñātvā cetaḥparyāyābhijñayā yathā pūrvāntād ihāgatir yathā ca saṃsārān niḥsāraṇaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:5575: AMsa_20-21.49 satpauruṣyaṃ prapadyante tvāṃ dṛṣṭvā sarvadehinaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:5577: atra lakṣaṇānuvyañjanānāṃ bhagavati mahāpuruṣatvasaṃpratyayena darśanamātrāt prasādajanakatvaṃ karma saṃdarśayitaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:5581: atra bhagavataś caturvidhayā vaśitayā sarvākārāś catasraḥ pariśuddhayaḥ paridīpitāḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:5587: AMsa_20-21.51 upāye śaraṇe śuddhau satvānāṃ vipravādane /
SA20asmahsbu:5588: mahāyāne ca niryāṇe mārabhañja namo 'stu te //
SA20asmahsbu:5589: atra caturṣv artheṣu satvānāṃ vipravādanaya māro yas tadbhañjakatvena bhagavato daśānāṃ balānāṃ karma saṃdarśitaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:5594: sthānāsthānajñānabalena hi bhagavān prathame 'rthe mārabhañjako veditavyaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:5604: nirādhṛṣyatvād anyatīrthyair bhagavato yathākramaṃ caturvidhaṃ vaiśāradyam udbhāvitaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:5608: anena trīṇy arakṣāṇi trīṇi ca smṛtyupasthānāni bhagavataḥ paridīpitāni /
SA20asmahsbu:5610: tair hi yathākramaṃ vigṛhyavaktā ca bhavati parṣatsu nirārakṣatvāt /
SA20asmahsbu:5614: AMsa_20-21.54 cāre vihāre sarvatra nāsty asarvajñaceṣṭitaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:5615: sarvadā tava sarvajña bhūtārthika namo 'stu te //
SA20asmahsbu:5616: anena cāre vihāre vā sarvatra sarvadā vāsarvajñaceṣṭitasyābhāvāt bhagavataḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:5618: asarvajño hi kṣīṇakleśo 'py asamudghātitatvād vāsanāyā ekadā bhrāntena hastinā sārdhaṃ samāgacchati bhrāntena rathenety evamādikam asarvajñaceṣṭitaṃ karoti /
SA20asmahsbu:5624: anena yasya satvasya yo 'rthaḥ karaṇīyo yasmin kāle tatkālānativartanāt /
SA20asmahsbu:5625: abandhyaṃ kṛtyaṃ sadā bhagavata ity asaṃmoṣadharmatvaṃ svabhāvataḥ karmataś ca saṃdarśitaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:5629: atra mahākaruṇā bhagavataḥ karmataḥ svabhāvataś ca paridīpitā /
SA20asmahsbu:5630: mahākaruṇayā hi bhagavān ṣaḍkṛtvo rātrindivena lokaṃ pratyavekṣate ko hīyate ko vardhate ity evamādi /
SA20asmahsbu:5631: tadyogāc ca bhagavataḥ sarvasatveṣu nityaṃ hitāśayaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:5635: atra cārasasṃ gṛhītaiḥ ṣaḍbhir āveṇikair buddhadharmaiḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:5639: tadanyasatvottamānām api śrāvakapratyekabuddhānām antikād uttamatvena sarvasatvottamatvaṃ paridīpitaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:5645: nāsty apratisaṃkhyāyopekṣeti cārasaṃgṛhītāḥ ṣaḍāveṇikā buddhadharmā ye buddhasyaiva saṃvidyante nānyeṣāṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:5646: nāsti chandaparihāṇir nāsti vīryasmṛtisamādhiprajñāvimuktiparihāṇir ity adhigamasaṃgṛhītāḥ ṣaḍ /
SA20asmahsbu:5648: anāgate pratyutpanne adhvani tathāgatasyāsaṅgam apratihataṃ jñānam iti /
SA20asmahsbu:5651: sarvaṃ vākkarma sarvaṃ manaskarmeti karmasaṃgṛhāitās trayaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:5653: AMsa_20-21.58 tribhiḥ kāyair mahābodhiṃ sarvākārām upāgata /
SA20asmahsbu:5655: anena tribhiś ca kāyaiḥ sarvākārabodhyupagamatvāt sarvajñeyasarvākārajñānāc ca sarvākārajñatā bhagavataḥ paridīpitā /
SA20asmahsbu:5656: trayaḥ kāyāḥ svābhāvikaḥ sāṃbhogiko nairmāṇikaś ca /
SA20asmahsbu:5657: sarvajñeyasarvākārajñānaṃ punar atra sarvasatvānāṃ devamanuṣyādīnāṃ sarvasaṃśayacchedena karmaṇā nirdiṣṭaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:5672: AMsa_20-21.61 akṣayair asamair yukto guṇair lokeṣu dṛśyase /
SA20asmahsbu:5673: maṇḍaleṣv apy adṛśyaś ca sarvathā devamānuṣaiḥ //
SA20asmahsbu:5679: nānālokadhātuṣu dṛśyamānatā nirmāṇakāyena [Msa_189] parṣaṇmaṇḍaleṣv api dṛśyamānatā sāṃbhogikena kāyena /
SA20asmahsbu:5680: sarvathā cādṛśyamānatā dharmakāyeneti trividhā prabhedavṛttir iti /
